[Yearly Recap] Trava Finance in 2022
 _‚ÄúYear‚Äôs end is neither an end nor a beginning but a going on, with all the wisdom that experience can instill in us.‚Äù_
 __Hal Borland_
 _Despite the ups and downs of the blockchain world in 2022, with the support from the whole community, Trava Finance has still been on the road to reaching our long-term goals of building a total decentralized lending marketplace. While heading the new year ‚Äî 2023 with more features, and utilities, let‚Äôs look back at the big picture of Trava Finance in 2022._
 
A Glimpse of Trava Finance and the Trava Ecosystem
Trava Finance is a DeFi protocol that aims to build the first decentralized marketplace for cross-chain lending. Following that, besides the Trava Lending pool, Trava Finance will offer a flexible mechanism where users can create and manage their lending pools to start a lending business.
The ecosystem currently contains three main components, including Trava Lending pool, Trava Capital (TraDAO), and Trava Knight NFT, along with various supported features related to the semantic knowledge graph, data analytics, credit score evaluation, cross-chain identification, and cross-chain lending, etc.
 
Trava Finance 2022 Milestones
 _Take a look at the critical achievements that we attained this year:_
Trava Finance 2022 milestones
 
Trava Finance 2022 Milestones
 _Take a look at the critical achievements that we attained this year:_
Trava Finance 2022 milestones

Trava Lending Pool
As the name suggests, Trava Lending Pool provides users with various lending services. In this case, users can deposit their tokens (there are above 15 assets supported) in the lending pools to get rewards with pretty high APY and APR. Besides that, they can also borrow assets from the lending pool by providing collaterals.
In 2022, multiple features related to the lending pool were implemented to maximize users‚Äô experience:


With Trava Governance, we gather the crowd‚Äôs wisdom and give users a chance to speak up and have the authority for the whole community‚Äôs benefit. In the future, we would like to transfer the management decision completely to our users ‚Äî our community. We believe that community is the key to creating real value for our project.
Go along with that, Trava Governance Vault was implemented, allowing users to lock TRAVA and rTRAVA to gain rewards and voting power in the ecosystem.
Trava Governance Empowerment


Fortune Mining is an important component of the Trava minigame series that encourage users to deposit into a special vault named Fortune Mining Vault. All the rewards from the total deposit will then be distributed to a certain number of lucky users. The more money they deposit, the more chances they will be chosen (based on our algorithm).
That means instead of distributing for all users (based on their deposit amount) as a normal lending pool, the total rewards will be spent to be one big prize for the lucky ones.
 
Trava Finance 2022 Milestones
 _Take a look at the critical achievements that we attained this year:_
Trava Finance 2022 milestones

Trava Knight NFT
Trava Knight NFT is one of the three key components in the Trava Ecosystem. It is the first step on our path to reaching our goal of NFT collateralization in our lending pool system.
In 2022, some critical features related to Trava Knight NFT have been opened.
 * **_Trava Knight NFT Auction_**


NFT auction allows sellers and buyers to interact and agree on a price for the NFT that is being auctioned. In the Trava Knight NFT Auction, each NFT is evaluated clearly. These values will verify the position of Knight NFT in the Trava Lending Pool when NFT collateralization is available.
 * **_Trava Knight NFT Heuristic Farming_**


Besides the five initial farming vaults, we provided five more vaults for Heuristic Farming that allows all Knights to participate in one or more vaults. Rewards from Heuristic Farming are rTRAVA tokens and EXP (one EXP for every 3 seconds in the vault). The higher EXP, the higher the APR, and the higher the rTRAVA reward.
 * **_Trava Knight NFT mini-game series_**


Trava Knight NFT mini-game is a special game series that we open to optimize users‚Äô experiences. The first minigame opened is The Battle Hand Mini-Game ‚Äî a battle of wits inspired by a traditional game called Rock, Paper, Scissors. During the battle, Knight will have a chance to choose an appropriate action to compete with the competitor. The actions have the picture of each element in the Rock, Paper, Scissors game, and the rules are similar to the traditional game: Rock beats Scissors, Scissors beats Paper, and Paper beats Rock.
 * **_TOD Listing_**


TOD is the native token of Trava Capital (rebranded from TraDAO). At the beginning of March 2022, we listed TOD on PancakeSwap and opened the Auto-compound staking and bonding mechanism.
Bond installment is a unique feature that allows bonders to buy more TOD with a certain amount of assets and pay the debt later. This type of bond offers users with small amounts of capital to obtain more bonds and then earn more profit from auto-compounding staking.
Since May 2022, TraDAO protocol and the community have adjusted the strategy to adapt to the bad situation. However, the prolonged bear market caused the unstable development of several OHM forks, both big names and smaller ones, like TraDAO. That leads to the desire to make changes for the long-term development of the whole community. Following the community decision, we rebranded TraDAO to Trava Capital, which also means moving away from the OHM mechanism principle to approach the new model as venture capital.
 
Trava Finance 2022 Milestones
 _Take a look at the critical achievements that we attained this year:_
Trava Finance 2022 milestones

**Analytics tools**
 _Besides these main products, Trava Finance provides users with various data analytics tools that support users in using not only Trava Finance products but making a reasonable investing decisions. One of them is BRicher._


BRicher is a unique aggregator that composes multiple investment methods: providing liquidity, swapping, staking, depositing, and borrowing in the lending pools. These composite strategies are automatically built so that users can get the most optimized one to maximize their profit. Moreover, unlike other aggregators, BRicher lets investors own their tokens so that they can take complete control of capital and investment plans.
Trava Finance ‚Äòs new feature named ‚Äî BRicher, an aggregator supporting users in their investing process
As a part of this inevitable wave, Trava Finance is now creating our own path as the first-ever protocol bringing a new type of asset in the form of a ticket ‚Äî Trava Ticket. Going along with the idea, we develop a new generation of Tokenomics for NFT ‚Äî Ticketomics, which includes max circulating supply and mint/burn mechanism.
Following that, a ticket in Trava Finance is an exchangeable asset that allows users to own additional perks or access to products in the Trava Ecosystem. There are three types of tickets: Counter Ticket, Presale Ticket, and Incentive Ticket. Each has different usages, so that benefits users in different ways.
 
Critical achievements in 2022
The support from the whole community leads us to critical achievements, take a look at what we have done and attained in the last 1 year:
Trava achievements in 2022
 
Partnership in 2022
 _Besides these achievements, it is grateful for us to build new relationships with various projects which play significant roles in supporting us in enriching the whole ecosystem._
This is an educational blog that provides readers, who are wise investors and knowledge-craved developers accurate information about the technology landscape, especially blockchain.
Following the partnerships, TechFi and Trava Finance will leverage the background of both parties to tap into each other‚Äôs strengths and provide joint solutions related to technical support, business development, marketing and communication development, and academic support.
Router and Dfyn
Router Protocol and Dfyn are a true representation of the potential of cross-chain capable dApps. In order to further augment the extent of their interoperable functionalities and grow the capabilities of Trava Finance, we are thrilled to reveal the three-pronged strategic partnership that presents some key aspects: Trava Finance will integrate Router Widget, $TRAVA token is listed on the Router App, Dfyn will integrate Trava token health analytics. In addition, there are much more cooperation potentials that will bring mutual benefit given that both aim to enable cross-chain strategy.
NFTb is one of the most secured LaunchPad platforms that allow artists to access DeFi opportunities while delivering the most outstanding user experience. By cooperating with NFTb, we opened a special presale ticket event.
 
Our Community
In the very long journey we have been through, our community plays a key role in supporting us to attain critical achievements. In this one year, we appreciate the companions of the whole community and feel grateful that it‚Äôs expanding. That‚Äôs expressed in the increase in followers and members number on Medium, Twitter, Discord, and Telegram.
Trava Finance community
Thank you so much for being with us through the good and bad times of this year. It‚Äôs the end of 2022, but the long journey is still ahead. We will strive for a better version of Trava Finance in 2023 and beyond."", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://blog.trava.finance/yearly-recap-trava-finance-in-2022-27256d5a8208?source=collection_home_page----75e285c42203-----34-----------------------------------"", ""rrf_score"": 0.0625 }, { ""content"": ""Trava Pool Creation Components
In the Trava Multi-pool Ecosystem, there are three main components: - **Pool Owners** : Who create and manage their own lending pools. - **Users** : who use lending services (of Trava lending pool and user-owned lending pools) such as borrowing, depositing, etc. - **Trava Governance** : Who plays the significant roles in the decision-making process while running the ecosystem.
Each of these components has its own roles and responsibilities that are shown in the infographic below:
As shown on the infographic, while pool owners can freely add new tokens (set risk parameters included) or set reserve conditions, they need to assist Governance‚Äôs opinion if wanting to make changes after that.

After clicking on ‚ÄúAdd asset,‚Äù a setting box will appear that requires you to add assets and set different parameters that you want.
 * To add an asset, first, click on the search bar, and a list of available assets will appear for you to choose from. (Besides these tokens, in the future, you can also propose other assets that you want).


 * After that, our recommendation algorithm will provide a set of parameters, including Reserve Parameter (Loan to Value, Liquidation threshold, Reserve Factor, Liquidation bonus) and Interesting rate strategy (Slope 1 & 2, Utilization optimal, Based interest rate). These parameters are set the same as the Trava Lending pool risk parameters, which are considered effective.


However, you can still set the different parameters by filling in reasonable numbers in these different sections.
If you want to add another asset, click on ‚ÄúAdd asset‚Äù and do the same steps as above.

Following the next requirements that are shown in the pop-up.

 * Choose the tab Reserve Parameter or Interest Rate Strategy.
 * Click on the ‚ÄúEdit‚Äù button in the under-right corner.


 * An information box will appear for you to fill in the new parameters.


_Reserve parameter_
 _Interest rate strategy_
 * After that, click ‚ÄúConfirm‚Äù and confirm your transaction.


 

User Guide for Pool Owners
 _This documentation provides you with a thorough guideline for creating and managing pools with Trava Pool Creation._

How to update and make changes for the pools.
While you can freely create your own pool, if you want to update or make changes, you will need the acceptance of the Governance.
These updates and changes can be: update tToken logic, update debtToken logic, change risk parameter, activate/deactivate reserve, update Interest rate for reserve, and pause lending pool.

Step 4. Waiting for the acceptance of the Governance.
 * As mentioned, these changes will need to be accepted by the Governance. Thus, after finishing step 3, you can check for your request status in the ‚ÄúRequest‚Äù tab.


 * In this tab, you can also can you request by clicking on the ‚ÄúCancel button‚Äù.


 

User Guide for Pool Owners
 _This documentation provides you with a thorough guideline for creating and managing pools with Trava Pool Creation._

How to update and make changes for the pools.
While you can freely create your own pool, if you want to update or make changes, you will need the acceptance of the Governance.
These updates and changes can be: update tToken logic, update debtToken logic, change risk parameter, activate/deactivate reserve, update Interest rate for reserve, and pause lending pool.

Step 5. Execute the modification.
After the Governance accepts your modification, click on the ‚ÄúExecute‚Äù button to execute the modification.
 

User Guide for lenders/borrowers joining Trava Lending pool and User-owned pools
 

User Guide for lenders/borrowers joining Trava Lending pool and User-owned pools


Step 1. Accessing the pools.
 * Access to Trava Finance Apps.
 * In the tab market on the left menu, click on ‚ÄúPools‚Äù.


 * A list of pools and their information (pool, owner address, supported assets, Total supply, Total borrow, TVL, Deposit rate, etc.).


 * You can also search for pools with the filter by the pool, asset, and owner in the search bar on the left.


 

User Guide for lenders/borrowers joining Trava Lending pool and User-owned pools


Step 2. Choose a pool to join.
 * Click on the pool that you want to join.
 * This pool‚Äôs interface will then appear as below:


 

User Guide for lenders/borrowers joining Trava Lending pool and User-owned pools


Step 3. Using lending pools services.
There are four main actions in the lending pools (both Trava lending pool and user-owned pools):
 * Deposit an asset in the lending pools.
 * Withdraw an asset.
 * Borrow an asset in a pool.
 * Repay your loan.


Executing all these actions in user-owned pools will be the same as within the Trava lending pool. For that reason, please check the user guide for the Trava lending pool for more details.

*,What is the role of the Security Advisory Board (SAB) in Trava Governance?,"According to the Trava Finance documentation, the Security Advisory Board (SAB) plays a critical role in ensuring the safety and integrity of the Trava Finance ecosystem during the governance process.
üõ°Ô∏è Role of the Security Advisory Board (SAB) in Trava Governance
üîç 1. Review Governance Proposals for Security Risks

column3: The SAB is responsible for evaluating submitted governance proposals to detect:
Smart contract vulnerabilities
Economic exploits
Malicious parameters or configurations
This helps prevent governance attacks or changes that could harm the protocol or users.
If a proposal is deemed malicious or dangerously flawed, the SAB has the authority to:
Reject or delay the proposal before it proceeds to public voting
Request revisions or clarifications

column1: This acts as a security checkpoint to avoid protocol-breaking changes slipping through governance.

column3: While the SAB has a specialized oversight role, it does not control governance.
Its decisions and reviews are expected to be transparent and accountable to the community.
The SAB ensures that the governance system remains a force for protocol growth, not exploitation.
Helps safeguard the long-term health of Trava‚Äôs DeFi + GameFi architecture.

column2: Can block or delay dangerous proposals
Acts as a neutral security gatekeeper

column1: Would you like examples of what kinds of proposals might trigger SAB intervention, or how it compares to other DeFi protocol security councils?","The Security Advisory Board (SAB) in Trava Governance plays a critical oversight and protective role, acting as a guardian layer to ensure that governance proposals ‚Äî especially those affecting protocol integrity ‚Äî are secure, trustworthy, and not malicious.
üõ°Ô∏è Role of the Security Advisory Board (SAB)

column3: The SAB reviews high-impact governance proposals before they are executed.
Focuses on proposals that involve:
Smart contract upgrades
Treasury fund movements
Protocol-level changes
Their role is to flag potential security risks, exploits, or flaws in logic.
The SAB can intervene or delay proposal execution if a serious security threat is detected.
This gives the protocol a ‚Äúfailsafe‚Äù mechanism to prevent harmful governance abuse, such as:
Exploitable contract changes
Unauthorized fund transfers
Sybil governance attacks
SAB members may provide expert input on:
Best security practices
Safe deployment procedures
Layered risk mitigation for newly proposed features

column1: While not involved in day-to-day governance voting, they ensure proposals meet technical and security standards.

column3: Helps protect users from governance-related exploits
Provides community confidence that the DAO operates responsibly and securely
Acts similarly to a ‚Äúguardian multisig‚Äù in other DeFi DAOs (e.g., Compound, Aave)
Typically experienced blockchain developers, auditors, or security researchers
May be appointed by the Trava DAO or core team
Their identities and roles may be public or semi-anonymous, depending on governance structure

column2: Security review, veto, and protocol protection

column1: üß† Summary: What the SAB Does in Trava

column2: Review technical risks in high-impact proposals
Block malicious or unsafe proposals before execution
Guide governance in complex or risky situations
Serve as a guardian of Trava‚Äôs long-term security and trust

Published in
3 min readMay 17, 2022
Share
Trava Governance ‚Äî Security Advisor Board
 
**What is the Trava Governance Security Advisory Board?**
The Security Advisory Board (SAB) is established as a group of people in charge of protecting Trava Governance against potential insecurity. These events could be an attempt to manipulate the market by centralized factors, the effort to attack the protocol, or other unexpected situations.
 
**Why do we need a Security Advisory Board?**
In the world of blockchain, the biggest thing is users‚Äô trust in a protocol based on their development potential and strong security.
Although blockchain technology is secure, decentralized, and distributed, the risks still remain in many forms, especially in cryptocurrency. In fact, DeFi hacks are on the rise. Digital thieves had a big year in 2021, taking $3.2 billion in cryptocurrencies. This number is predicted to be even higher in 2022. In the first three months of this year, hackers have stolen $1.3 billion from exchanges, platforms, and private entities.
For that reason, we need to prepare for unexpected issues. As a long-term vision, Trava will soon implement the Trava Governance and go ahead with building an entire decentralized marketplace where the users are responsible for developing the protocol themselves.
At first, users with voting power will decide on critical terms of the Trava Lending Pool, such as adding or removing assets, changing the risk parameters, etc. In the long-term, these responsibilities are widened and affect the users-creation pools as well.
Despite the advantages of a decentralized autonomous organization, especially in collecting the crowd‚Äôs wisdom before making a decision, this model brings the risks of being attacked or manipulated by a centralized entity, etc.
To be more specific, if most governance tokens are in the hand of centralized parties, it would be possible for a governance attack to occur where a centralized entity uses its users‚Äô voting power to take over the governance proposals and voting.
In that case, it is necessary to have a group of people who can solve the problem quickly and effectively enough to prevent the worst scenario and consult reasonable strategies for avoiding the risks.
 
**What are the primary roles of SAB?**
As mentioned, this group of people is responsible for the security of the Trava Governance, which is implied in some main points:
 * First, providing quick solutions for unexpected issues relating to the dramatic fluctuation of the market and hacking actions.
 * Second, recommending the strategy for improving the governance security.


 
**Who are they?**
Given the crucial role of the SAB, in the beginning, this team combines experts who also take responsibility for the development of the Trava Ecosystem as a whole.
We would like to introduce the SAB team as below:
 * Mr. Minh Nguyen ‚Äî CEO & Co-founder of Trava Finance
 * Mr. Duc Tran ‚Äî Head of Security & Co-founder of Trava Finance
 * Mr. Thang Nguyen ‚Äî CTO & Co-founder of Trava Finance
 * Mr. Quan Dinh ‚Äî CPO & Co-founder of Trava Finance
 * Mr. Chung Dao ‚Äî Strategy Advisor of Trava Finance- CEO & Co-founder Oraichain


First, the security advisor board includes five people from the team, as mentioned above. However, in the future, the Trava governance will decide who is in this group, including both people from the Trava Team and community members.
With a strong and reliable group of experienced and professional people, we look forward to building Trava Governance to become a place where users can place their money and trust.
‚Äî ‚Äî ‚Äî ‚Äî ‚Äî ‚Äî ‚Äî ‚Äî"", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://blog.trava.finance/introduction-to-the-security-advisory-board-for-the-trava-governance-8bcf6799e90f?source=collection_home_page----75e285c42203-----64-----------------------------------"", ""rrf_score"": 0.16666666666666666 }, { ""content"": ""Trava Governance module aims to bring the protocol to a new level of decentralization - Trava DAO. This module presents an on-chain governance mechanism, where the Trava community can propose and vote on protocol changes & improvements as a way of participating in the protocol‚Äôs decision-making process.
In the big picture, there are four essential components in Trava Governance: the Trava community, the DAO Committee, the Security Advisory Board (SAB), and Governance Portal & smart contracts.
 * Trava community: The most valuable resource of ideas, discussions & feedback for protocol changes. Everyone can raise their voice & share their opinion on Trava Forum or any community social channels.
 * DAO Committee: The entrusted individuals in the Trava community to submit proposals after a thorough review with discussion & feedback.
 * Security Advisory Board: The guardian for the protocol‚Äôs security when some malicious actions are aimed at the protocol or in unexpected events.
 * Governance Portal & Smart contracts: The autonomous ‚ÄúHand of the King‚Äù consists of governance contracts for on-chain voting and multiple timelocks governing and automating the changes & updates of Trava Ecosystem‚Äôs smart contracts. That keeps the governance process public and transparent to everyone.

**Succeeded status** A signal of a succeeded proposal, which can only occur when the quorum is reached and the For votes surpass the Against votes."", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://docs.trava.finance/glossary/trava-governance-glossary"", ""rrf_score"": 0.1125 }, { ""content"": ""**Mission & Vision**
DAO stands for ‚ÄúDecentralized Autonomous Organization‚Äù. Establishing the development of Trava DAO ensures Trava‚Äôs team mission:
 * A self-governed protocol, powered by the strength of the Trava community & secured smart contracts.
 * The growth of Trava Ecosystem, a decentralized finance platform with stable and outstanding products.


With that mission in mind, Trava DAO will be implemented & takes over centralized processes gradually with the growth of the ecosystem.
 

**Governance v1**
For version 1 of Trava Governance, we present evolution in governance processes with on-chain features enabled.
 

**Governance v1**
For version 1 of Trava Governance, we present evolution in governance processes with on-chain features enabled.

**Governance Process**
The governance process consists of 2 continuous processes: off-chain & on-chain.
 * Off-chain process:


In the off-chain process, anyone in the Trava community can raise their opinions and discuss ideas of how the protocol can improve by creating **TRC - Trava Request for Comments** on the Trava Forum.
After an idea is well-formed, a community member can follow our template for **TIP - Trava Improvement Proposal** and post on the forum for details feedback. We recommend off-chain voting (powered by snapshot.org) to gain exposure and rough consensus from the community to increase the chance of succeeding in the on-chain process.
When a TIP gets to its final version, the **DAO Committee** is in charge of the review process and officially proposes on-chain.
 * On-chain process:


When a TIP is proposed on-chain, it becomes transparent on the public blockchain; anyone possessing voting power can directly **vote for or against** this proposal.
After the voting period, a TIP will be **queued and executed** by the public.
The **Security Advisory Board acts as a guardian** to prevent malicious actions and security exploits in this process.
 

**Governance v1**
For version 1 of Trava Governance, we present evolution in governance processes with on-chain features enabled.

**Governance Authority**
In governance version 1, the DAO will have authority over the Trava lending protocol. The community will have to agree on any significant changes or updates through the on-chain process.
 

**Governance v1**
For version 1 of Trava Governance, we present evolution in governance processes with on-chain features enabled.

**Governance Power**
To gain governance power, holders need to lock their Trava or rTrava token in exchange for the veTRAVA token, which holds voting power. This vote locking mechanism encourages users who show a solid commitment to the protocol with more governance power and incentive.

,How does the governance process in Trava DAO work?,"According to the Trava Finance documentation, the governance process in Trava DAO is a decentralized, community-driven system that allows TRAVA token holders (specifically those holding veTRAVA) to propose and vote on decisions that shape the protocol‚Äôs future.
üó≥Ô∏è Governance Process in Trava DAO: Step-by-Step

column3: Any qualified user (usually with a minimum veTRAVA balance) can create a proposal.
Proposals may cover:
New pool launches
Parameter changes (interest rates, LTV, fees)
Emission and reward allocation
Protocol upgrades or strategic decisions
Once submitted, proposals go through the Security Advisory Board (SAB).
The SAB reviews proposals for:
Code vulnerabilities
Economic attack vectors
Malicious content
The SAB can veto or request changes if risks are identified.
If approved by SAB, the proposal enters the voting phase.
Voting is based on veTRAVA, which users earn by locking TRAVA tokens.
Voting power depends on:
Amount of TRAVA locked
Duration of lock (longer = more veTRAVA)
Users vote for or against the proposal during the set voting period (typically a few days).
If the proposal meets the quorum and majority requirements, it is marked as approved.
Depending on its nature:
On-chain proposals are executed automatically via smart contracts.
Off-chain or admin proposals may be executed by the Trava core team.

üõ°Ô∏è SAB Security Review
üó≥Ô∏è veTRAVA-based Voting
‚úÖ Execution if Approved

column1: Would you like help with locking TRAVA to get veTRAVA, or creating a sample proposal for testing on Trava DAO?","The governance process in Trava DAO allows the community of TRAVA token holders to propose, vote on, and implement changes to the protocol. It follows a structured, decentralized decision-making model, enabling transparent and democratic evolution of the Trava Finance ecosystem.
üó≥Ô∏è Governance Process Overview in Trava DAO

column3: Any TRAVA token holder who meets the minimum token threshold can submit a governance proposal.
Proposals may include:
New lending pool parameters
Protocol upgrades or contract changes
TRAVA token emission adjustments
Use of treasury or DAO funds
Risk parameter modifications
Hold or stake a minimum amount of TRAVA tokens
Submit proposal with:
Clear title
Description
Technical justification
Action steps
Security Advisory Board (SAB) reviews high-impact proposals for:
Security vulnerabilities
Risk to protocol funds or logic
Implementation feasibility
The SAB can delay or veto a proposal if it poses a critical threat.
Once the proposal passes initial checks, it enters the voting phase.
All eligible TRAVA holders can vote ‚ÄúFor‚Äù or ‚ÄúAgainst‚Äù.
Voting power is proportional to the number of staked TRAVA tokens.
Voting duration: 3 to 7 days
Quorum: Minimum number of total votes required for validity
Snapshot: A snapshot of token balances is taken to prevent last-minute transfers

column2: Proposal is approved and queued for execution
Proposal is rejected and not implemented
Proposal fails automatically due to insufficient votes

column3: If approved, the proposal is:
Queued (sometimes with a time delay)
Executed automatically via smart contract (on-chain governance)
Or executed manually by the core team (for off-chain processes)
Alice stakes 100,000 TRAVA and proposes increasing the LTV for USDT from 75% ‚Üí 80%.
SAB reviews the proposal and finds no security risks.
Community votes:
60% Yes (majority)
30% No
10% abstain
Proposal reaches quorum and passes.
Protocol parameters are updated via smart contract.

column2: Submit a change request with TRAVA tokens
Passed if quorum and majority are reached
Change implemented via smart contract or admin

 _Trava NFT Bridge is a new feature about to be released by Trava Finance. This blog post will explain why we need it, how it works and its mechanism._
NFT Bridge is one of soon to be released features by Trava Finance
NFTs are unique digital assets that are typically created and traded on a specific blockchain network, particularly in this case ‚Äî Trava Knights. However, as NFT ecosystem expands, there is a need for interoperability between different blockchain networks to allow for seamless movement across platforms.
If you‚Äôve been paying attention to our latest AMA, you might already know that Trava Finance is about to release many new features and one of which is the NFT Bridge. It will help solve this problem by enabling the transfer of Limited Knight NFTs from one blockchain to another, increasing the utility of the Knights, and opening new opportunities for creators, collectors, and users.
 
Why do we need the Trava NFT Bridge?
Knight NFT is one of the outstanding unique products of Trava Finance, besides Trava Tickets, especially towards the goal of Decentralized Marketplace. Therefore, it will be a big regret if its operation and value are only encapsulated in our ecosystem as it is now.
Usually, exchange across different blockchains without a bridge is possible, but it would be very expensive and time-consuming. That‚Äôs why Trava Finance decided to open NFT Bridge, which allows users to move their Knights between chains. By doing this, there are more chances for our products to participate in the wide-open market on the Ethereum network. This will also increase the utilization and value of Trava Knight NFTs.
Trava NFT bridge still has some limitations, but we will definitely give it more uses in the future. For now, it can only support transfers to Ethereum and with Limited Knights:
 * Aleister ‚Äî Eye of the Twelve.
 * Medivh ‚Äî Ambassador of Techfian Principality.
 * Sir Kuana ‚Äî Commander of TraDAO.
 * Dame Johanna ‚Äî Shield of the Twelve.
 * Limited TR-A Valor-1.


 
How does it work?
As mentioned, the Trava NFT bridge will give you the ability to transfer your Limited Knight NFTs between BNB and Ethereum chains. The transition happens on the bridge seamlessly, you only need to pay a fee and follow some particular rules for it to work.
When transferring, simply, your Limited Knight NFT(s) on the BSC mainnet will be locked, and the same one will be minted on Ethereum. When you want to transfer it back, the Limited Knight on Ethereum will be burned, and the locked version will be released. For more clarity on how it works, you can follow the detailed mechanism explanations below:
 
How does it work?
As mentioned, the Trava NFT bridge will give you the ability to transfer your Limited Knight NFTs between BNB and Ethereum chains. The transition happens on the bridge seamlessly, you only need to pay a fee and follow some particular rules for it to work.
When transferring, simply, your Limited Knight NFT(s) on the BSC mainnet will be locked, and the same one will be minted on Ethereum. When you want to transfer it back, the Limited Knight on Ethereum will be burned, and the locked version will be released. For more clarity on how it works, you can follow the detailed mechanism explanations below:

Transfer your Limited Knight NFT(s) from Source Chain to Destination Chain
After starting this process, you will have to connect to the wallet that has the Knight NFT that you want to transfer, note that currently this bridge only supports Unique Collection. The transfer then goes through a verification process, which includes checking if the sender (you) is the owner of the NFT collection and has sent the required bridge fee.
When those things are finished, your transfer will be processed and the bridge will lock your Limited Knight NFT, then retrieve all the necessary information about you and your assets. It then is encoded into a message, which will be sent by the MainBridge to a queue serving as a way to track transactions and handle any potential issues, such as missed events or system failures.
Upon receiving the message, the Bridge checks its validity and emits an event containing the bridge data, which is then captured and verified by a Relayer. If the bridge data is deemed valid, the Relayer will sign the bridge data and send it back to you along with the signature, allowing the transfer process. Your Limited Knight NFT will be locked from this moment onward, and you won‚Äôt be able to access it from the Source Chain (BNB chain).
Then, to get your NFT from the Destination Chain, you will have to prove it using the information received. It‚Äôs only usable once and remains valid for 2 months from the time of signing, and anyone can utilize it. However, the Limited Knight will be minted just for the person whose address has been specified. If everything is valid and the data has not been used before, the Bridge will mint the Limited Knight NFT for you (the intended receiver).
 
How does it work?
As mentioned, the Trava NFT bridge will give you the ability to transfer your Limited Knight NFTs between BNB and Ethereum chains. The transition happens on the bridge seamlessly, you only need to pay a fee and follow some particular rules for it to work.
When transferring, simply, your Limited Knight NFT(s) on the BSC mainnet will be locked, and the same one will be minted on Ethereum. When you want to transfer it back, the Limited Knight on Ethereum will be burned, and the locked version will be released. For more clarity on how it works, you can follow the detailed mechanism explanations below:

Transfer your Limited Knight NFT(s) from Destination Chain to Source Chain
Basically, you will have to go through the similar process as above, only with some minor differences. The first is that after verifying specific criteria, instead of locking, the Limited Knight NFT on the Destination Chain will be burned. The process includes:
 * Verifying whether you are the rightful owner of the NFT collection.
 * Checking if it was originally bridged from the Source Chain.
 * Confirming the bridge fee is paid.


Once the Limited Knight NFT on Ethereum has been successfully burned, another message will be encoded just as mentioned in the previous section. You will go through a similar process, and then your Limited Knight NFt will be released from the locked state.
**_About Trava.Finance_**
Trava Finance is the world‚Äôs first decentralized marketplace for cross-chain lending.
While existing approaches provide only one or a few lending pools with their own parameters such as borrow/supply interest rate, liquidation threshold, Loan-to-Value ratio, or a limited list of exchangeable cryptocurrencies, Trava Finance offers a flexible mechanism in which users can create and manage their own lending pools to start a lending business.
Trava Finance is deployed on the BSC and allows for lending with BSC tokens first; we then enable cross-chain lending with various tokens on Ethereum and other blockchain networks.

Introduction To The rTRAVA Bridge
 
** _What is the rTRAVA Bridge, and why do we need it?_**
There are many blockchain networks and cryptocurrencies that use different blockchain technologies. As in the Trava Lending pool, there are over 15 types of cryptocurrency on three chains, consisting of BSC, Fantom, and Ethereum.
Usually, exchange across different blockchains for cryptocurrency is possible without a cross-chain bridge. However, it is very expensive and time-consuming to do so. That‚Äôs why we need a bridge that enables users to transit their tokens easier and faster at a low cost.
For now, Trava.finance has already opened a bridge that allows users to transfer their TRAVA tokens from Fantom to BSC and vice versa. However, given the increase of the rTRAVA utilities, we are pleased to introduce the rTRAVA bridge that helps our users to exchange rTRAVA tokens from Fantom and Ethereum to BSC.
 
**What benefit does the rTRAVA bridge bring to the whole ecosystem?**
As mentioned, users can transit rTRAVA tokens from Fantom and Ethereum to BSC easier and cheaper with the rTRAVA bridge.
By doing that, there are more chances for them to participate in various programs on the BSC network, especially in locking their tokens in the Trava governance vault to attain voting power and rewards.
To be more specific, in Trava Governance, the decision-making power of users corresponds with the volume of TRAVA, rTRAVA, and LP TRAVA/BNB they lock in the Trava Governance vault.
At first, the voting power attained from locking TRAVA and rTRAVA is the same. However, there will be some differences between these two that locking rTRAVA will get more significant power in the future. Thus, locking rTRAVA seems to be a smart choice to improve the influence in the ecosystem quickly.
Nevertheless, the Trava Governance vault is implemented on the BSC platform that stops users from locking rTRAVA tokens.
By implementing the rTRAVA bridge, users now can effortlessly transfer rTRAVA from Ethereum and Fantom to BSC, lock them then attain both rewards and decision-making power.
The rTRAVA Bridge
 
**How does it work?**
As mentioned, the rTRAVA bridge makes the token transition process quicker and effortless. When transit your rTRAVA tokens through the bridge, you only need to pay a small amount of bridge fee and follow some particular rules.
Two options relating to the parameters of the rTRAVA bridge are shown in the table below. Thus, a voting snapshot will soon be opened for our community to choose which one should be officially applied.
 1. _Delay time_**:** The period you need to wait for implementing the transaction.
 2. _Bridge Fee_ : The fee (in TRAVA) you need to pay for each transaction using the rTRAVA bridge.

**What is voting power?**
The number of voting power you receive from veTRAVA depends on your locked balance & unlock time. The minimum locking time is one week, and the maximum locking time is four years.
Your voting power gradually decreases as your escrow tokens approach their lock expiry. }]",,,"{ ""number_of_documents"": 5, ""results"": [ { ""content"": ""**Mission & Vision**
DAO stands for ‚ÄúDecentralized Autonomous Organization‚Äù. Establishing the development of Trava DAO ensures Trava‚Äôs team mission:
 * A self-governed protocol, powered by the strength of the Trava community & secured smart contracts.
 * The growth of Trava Ecosystem, a decentralized finance platform with stable and outstanding products.


With that mission in mind, Trava DAO will be implemented & takes over centralized processes gradually with the growth of the ecosystem.
 

**Governance v1**
For version 1 of Trava Governance, we present evolution in governance processes with on-chain features enabled.
 

**Governance v1**
For version 1 of Trava Governance, we present evolution in governance processes with on-chain features enabled.

**Governance Process**
The governance process consists of 2 continuous processes: off-chain & on-chain.
 * Off-chain process:


In the off-chain process, anyone in the Trava community can raise their opinions and discuss ideas of how the protocol can improve by creating **TRC - Trava Request for Comments** on the Trava Forum.
After an idea is well-formed, a community member can follow our template for **TIP - Trava Improvement Proposal** and post on the forum for details feedback. We recommend off-chain voting (powered by snapshot.org) to gain exposure and rough consensus from the community to increase the chance of succeeding in the on-chain process.
When a TIP gets to its final version, the **DAO Committee** is in charge of the review process and officially proposes on-chain.
 * On-chain process:


When a TIP is proposed on-chain, it becomes transparent on the public blockchain; anyone possessing voting power can directly **vote for or against** this proposal.
After the voting period, a TIP will be **queued and executed** by the public.
The **Security Advisory Board acts as a guardian** to prevent malicious actions and security exploits in this process.
 

**Governance v1**
For version 1 of Trava Governance, we present evolution in governance processes with on-chain features enabled.

**Governance Authority**
In governance version 1, the DAO will have authority over the Trava lending protocol. The community will have to agree on any significant changes or updates through the on-chain process.
 

**Governance v1**
For version 1 of Trava Governance, we present evolution in governance processes with on-chain features enabled.

**Governance Power**
To gain governance power, holders need to lock their Trava or rTrava token in exchange for the veTRAVA token, which holds voting power. This vote locking mechanism encourages users who show a solid commitment to the protocol with more governance power and incentive.

This module presents an on-chain governance mechanism, where the Trava community can propose and vote on protocol changes & improvements as a way of participating in the protocol‚Äôs decision-making process.
In the big picture, there are four essential components in Trava Governance: the Trava community, the DAO Committee, the Security Advisory Board (SAB), and Governance Portal & smart contracts.
 * Trava community: The most valuable resource of ideas, discussions & feedback for protocol changes. Everyone can raise their voice & share their opinion on Trava Forum or any community social channels.
 * DAO Committee: The entrusted individuals in the Trava community to submit proposals after a thorough review with discussion & feedback.
 * Security Advisory Board: The guardian for the protocol‚Äôs security when some malicious actions are aimed at the protocol or in unexpected events.
 * Governance Portal & Smart contracts: The autonomous ‚ÄúHand of the King‚Äù consists of governance contracts for on-chain voting and multiple timelocks governing and automating the changes & updates of Trava Ecosystem‚Äôs smart contracts. That keeps the governance process public and transparent to everyone.

NFT Bridge is one of soon to be released features by Trava Finance
NFTs are unique digital assets that are typically created and traded on a specific blockchain network, particularly in this case ‚Äî Trava Knights. However, as NFT ecosystem expands, there is a need for interoperability between different blockchain networks to allow for seamless movement across platforms.
If you‚Äôve been paying attention to our latest AMA, you might already know that Trava Finance is about to release many new features and one of which is the NFT Bridge. It will help solve this problem by enabling the transfer of Limited Knight NFTs from one blockchain to another, increasing the utility of the Knights, and opening new opportunities for creators, collectors, and users.
 
Why do we need the Trava NFT Bridge?
Knight NFT is one of the outstanding unique products of Trava Finance, besides Trava Tickets, especially towards the goal of Decentralized Marketplace. Therefore, it will be a big regret if its operation and value are only encapsulated in our ecosystem as it is now.
Usually, exchange across different blockchains without a bridge is possible, but it would be very expensive and time-consuming. That‚Äôs why Trava Finance decided to open NFT Bridge, which allows users to move their Knights between chains. By doing this, there are more chances for our products to participate in the wide-open market on the Ethereum network. This will also increase the utilization and value of Trava Knight NFTs.
Trava NFT bridge still has some limitations, but we will definitely give it more uses in the future. For now, it can only support transfers to Ethereum and with Limited Knights:
 * Aleister ‚Äî Eye of the Twelve.
 * Medivh ‚Äî Ambassador of Techfian Principality.
 * Sir Kuana ‚Äî Commander of TraDAO.
 * Dame Johanna ‚Äî Shield of the Twelve.
 * Limited TR-A Valor-1.


 
How does it work?
As mentioned, the Trava NFT bridge will give you the ability to transfer your Limited Knight NFTs between BNB and Ethereum chains. The transition happens on the bridge seamlessly, you only need to pay a fee and follow some particular rules for it to work.
When transferring, simply, your Limited Knight NFT(s) on the BSC mainnet will be locked, and the same one will be minted on Ethereum. When you want to transfer it back, the Limited Knight on Ethereum will be burned, and the locked version will be released. For more clarity on how it works, you can follow the detailed mechanism explanations below:
 
How does it work?
As mentioned, the Trava NFT bridge will give you the ability to transfer your Limited Knight NFTs between BNB and Ethereum chains. The transition happens on the bridge seamlessly, you only need to pay a fee and follow some particular rules for it to work.
When transferring, simply, your Limited Knight NFT(s) on the BSC mainnet will be locked, and the same one will be minted on Ethereum. When you want to transfer it back, the Limited Knight on Ethereum will be burned, and the locked version will be released. For more clarity on how it works, you can follow the detailed mechanism explanations below:

Transfer your Limited Knight NFT(s) from Source Chain to Destination Chain
After starting this process, you will have to connect to the wallet that has the Knight NFT that you want to transfer, note that currently this bridge only supports Unique Collection. The transfer then goes through a verification process, which includes checking if the sender (you) is the owner of the NFT collection and has sent the required bridge fee.
When those things are finished, your transfer will be processed and the bridge will lock your Limited Knight NFT, then retrieve all the necessary information about you and your assets. It then is encoded into a message, which will be sent by the MainBridge to a queue serving as a way to track transactions and handle any potential issues, such as missed events or system failures.
Upon receiving the message, the Bridge checks its validity and emits an event containing the bridge data, which is then captured and verified by a Relayer. If the bridge data is deemed valid, the Relayer will sign the bridge data and send it back to you along with the signature, allowing the transfer process. Your Limited Knight NFT will be locked from this moment onward, and you won‚Äôt be able to access it from the Source Chain (BNB chain).
Then, to get your NFT from the Destination Chain, you will have to prove it using the information received. It‚Äôs only usable once and remains valid for 2 months from the time of signing, and anyone can utilize it. However, the Limited Knight will be minted just for the person whose address has been specified. If everything is valid and the data has not been used before, the Bridge will mint the Limited Knight NFT for you (the intended receiver).
 
How does it work?
As mentioned, the Trava NFT bridge will give you the ability to transfer your Limited Knight NFTs between BNB and Ethereum chains. The transition happens on the bridge seamlessly, you only need to pay a fee and follow some particular rules for it to work.
When transferring, simply, your Limited Knight NFT(s) on the BSC mainnet will be locked, and the same one will be minted on Ethereum. When you want to transfer it back, the Limited Knight on Ethereum will be burned, and the locked version will be released. For more clarity on how it works, you can follow the detailed mechanism explanations below:

Transfer your Limited Knight NFT(s) from Destination Chain to Source Chain
Basically, you will have to go through the similar process as above, only with some minor differences. The first is that after verifying specific criteria, instead of locking, the Limited Knight NFT on the Destination Chain will be burned. The process includes:
 * Verifying whether you are the rightful owner of the NFT collection.
 * Checking if it was originally bridged from the Source Chain.
 * Confirming the bridge fee is paid.


Once the Limited Knight NFT on Ethereum has been successfully burned, another message will be encoded just as mentioned in the previous section. You will go through a similar process, and then your Limited Knight NFt will be released from the locked state.
**_About Trava.Finance_**
Trava Finance is the world‚Äôs first decentralized marketplace for cross-chain lending.
While existing approaches provide only one or a few lending pools with their own parameters such as borrow/supply interest rate, liquidation threshold, Loan-to-Value ratio, or a limited list of exchangeable cryptocurrencies, Trava Finance offers a flexible mechanism in which users can create and manage their own lending pools to start a lending business.
Trava Finance is deployed on the BSC and allows for lending with BSC tokens first; we then enable cross-chain lending with various tokens on Ethereum and other blockchain networks.

Introduction To The rTRAVA Bridge
 
** _What is the rTRAVA Bridge, and why do we need it?_**
There are many blockchain networks and cryptocurrencies that use different blockchain technologies. As in the Trava Lending pool, there are over 15 types of cryptocurrency on three chains, consisting of BSC, Fantom, and Ethereum.
Usually, exchange across different blockchains for cryptocurrency is possible without a cross-chain bridge. However, it is very expensive and time-consuming to do so. That‚Äôs why we need a bridge that enables users to transit their tokens easier and faster at a low cost.
For now, Trava.finance has already opened a bridge that allows users to transfer their TRAVA tokens from Fantom to BSC and vice versa. However, given the increase of the rTRAVA utilities, we are pleased to introduce the rTRAVA bridge that helps our users to exchange rTRAVA tokens from Fantom and Ethereum to BSC.
 
**What benefit does the rTRAVA bridge bring to the whole ecosystem?**
As mentioned, users can transit rTRAVA tokens from Fantom and Ethereum to BSC easier and cheaper with the rTRAVA bridge.
By doing that, there are more chances for them to participate in various programs on the BSC network, especially in locking their tokens in the Trava governance vault to attain voting power and rewards.
To be more specific, in Trava Governance, the decision-making power of users corresponds with the volume of TRAVA, rTRAVA, and LP TRAVA/BNB they lock in the Trava Governance vault.
At first, the voting power attained from locking TRAVA and rTRAVA is the same. However, there will be some differences between these two that locking rTRAVA will get more significant power in the future. Thus, locking rTRAVA seems to be a smart choice to improve the influence in the ecosystem quickly.
Nevertheless, the Trava Governance vault is implemented on the BSC platform that stops users from locking rTRAVA tokens.
By implementing the rTRAVA bridge, users now can effortlessly transfer rTRAVA from Ethereum and Fantom to BSC, lock them then attain both rewards and decision-making power.
The rTRAVA Bridge
 
**How does it work?**
As mentioned, the rTRAVA bridge makes the token transition process quicker and effortless. When transit your rTRAVA tokens through the bridge, you only need to pay a small amount of bridge fee and follow some particular rules.
Two options relating to the parameters of the rTRAVA bridge are shown in the table below. Thus, a voting snapshot will soon be opened for our community to choose which one should be officially applied.
 1. _Delay time_**:** The period you need to wait for implementing the transaction.
 2. _Bridge Fee_ : The fee (in TRAVA) you need to pay for each transaction using the rTRAVA bridge.

You can now vote on active proposals, and before that, don‚Äôt forget to read its discussion on the forum carefully.
 

**What is voting power?**
The number of voting power you receive from veTRAVA depends on your locked balance & unlock time. The minimum locking time is one week, and the maximum locking time is four years.
Your voting power gradually decreases as your escrow tokens approach their lock expiry. content"": ""veTRAVA stands for voting escrow Trava. It is an ERC721 token that acts as evidence of your locking token in the governance module. Every time users create a new lock, they receive a veTRAVA token, storing their locked balance, unlock time, and rewards amount.

The longer you lock your tokens, the more voting power you have (and the bigger incentive you can earn). For example, you can vote lock 1,000 TRAVA/rTRAVA for a year to have 250 voting power. Each token locked for four years is equal to 1 voting power.

Published in
3 min readFeb 9, 2023
Share
Introduction to veTRAVA Marketplace
 _Along with the launch of Trava Governance, veTRAVA Marketplace brings Trava Finance to the next level of ‚ÄúDecentralized‚Äù by enabling peer-to-peer exchanging voting power, fostering the decision-making power of the whole ecosystem._ # What Is veTRAVA And Its Benefits?
 ## What is veTRAVA?
To fulfill the ‚Äúdecentralized‚Äù part of the Trava Decentralized Marketplace, we launched Trava Governance, based on the Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO) model, to give users decision-making power. In this case, veTRAVA, in the form of NFT, represents this power and is determined by the time and amount of locked tokens (as they show your commitment toward the future of Trava Finance).
With the implementation of the Trava Governance Vault, users can lock their TRAVA, rTRAVA, and LP TRAVA/BNB into this vault to receive a certain amount of veTRAVA representing their powers: the more veTRAVA you own, the higher your voting power in the Trava ecosystem. ## The Benefits Of Owning veTRAVA
The key value of veTRAVA is its representative of users‚Äô power and their commitment to the project. As a result, in the long term, users who own veTRAVA can receive significant benefits:
 * Deciding on crucial parameters such as LTV, risk parameters, etc., in the lending pools (Trava Lending Pool and Users-owned Pools).
 * Receiving share profit coming from the fee charged by borrowers
 * Receiving boosting rewards **in rTRAVA** by providing liquidity and holding veTRAVA at the same time.
 * Earning TRAVA reward: the APR will be revealed soon.


As mentioned, veTRAVA is utilized as a form of NFT. For now, it can only be available for those who lock their token into the Governance Vault. However, it will be exchanged peer-to-peer with the launch of veTRAVA Marketplace. # veTRAVA Marketplace: Overview
As its name suggests, the veTRAVA marketplace is for users to buy and sell their veTRAVA. It means they can freely exchange their voting power. The main reason we came up with this idea is to optimize users‚Äô experience, bringing them as much freedom as possible. It‚Äôs the ‚ÄúDecentralization‚Äù we are heading for.
Besides bringing more freedom to users, veTRAVA Marketplace increases liquidity for veTRAVA and thus benefits both sellers and buyers. In more detail, buyers can buy veTRAVA (voting power) easily on Marketplace and then earn voting power immediately. In this case, the remaining locking time will be more flexible, no longer limited to a particular period set in the Governance Vault. When it comes to sellers, they can easily utilize crypto assets in a more liberal way and get benefits from it. ## The Influences of veTRAVA Marketplace
veTRAVA Marketplace is an important feature that contributes to the development of Trava Governance. As mentioned above, users who hold many veTRAVA will have a crucial role in the decision-making process of the Trava Finance ecosystem. The veTRAVA holders can alternate the voting results, and through the Marketplace, users can buy or sell the voting power with others.
With the fact that users can trade their voting power to each other, anyone in the ecosystem will have a chance to vote for the changes they want to make in Trava Finance. The more users have veTRAVA, the more voting power is distributed, and users will be given the full power to make the decisions that can affect the Decentralized Lending Marketplace, which will elevate the decentralized side of Trava Finance‚Äôs ultimate goal."", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://blog.trava.finance/introduction-to-vetrava-marketplace-c9092a0c51c8"", ""rrf_score"": 0.08333333333333333 }, { ""content"": ""## Introduction Alpha Version of Trava Token Health
 ### What is Token Health?
Aug 26, 2021
Aug 26, 2021"", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://blog.trava.finance/?source=post_page---byline--63d315146b69---------------------------------------"", ""rrf_score"": 0.07142857142857142 }, { ""content"": ""##
**Introduction to Vote Locking mechanism**
Trava & rTrava holders can vote-lock their tokens into the Trava Governance to receive veTRAVA, which holds voting power. The longer they lock, the more voting power they possess. Vote locking allows you to vote in governance and receive rewards from special incentive programs. ##
**What is veTRAVA?**
veTRAVA stands for voting escrow Trava. It is an ERC721 token that acts as evidence of your locking token in the governance module. Every time users create a new lock, they receive a veTRAVA token, storing their locked balance, unlock time, and rewards amount.
The longer you lock your tokens, the more voting power you have (and the bigger incentive you can earn). For example, you can vote lock 1,000 TRAVA/rTRAVA for a year to have 250 voting power. Each token locked for four years is equal to 1 voting power.
The number of voting power you will receive depends on your locked balance & unlock time. 
The minimum locking time is one week, and the maximum locking time is four years.
Your voting power gradually decreases as your escrow tokens approach their lock expiry. The graph on Locker UI from Governance Portal illustrates the decrease process. ##
**What can we do with veTRAVA?**
While holding veTRAVA, you can vote for proposals to change the protocol with your voting power and earn rewards from incentive programs. Currently, veTRAVA holders will earn weekly rewards emission in Trava based on their voting power percentage. There will be proposals to enable sharing fees from protocol or boost rewards in the lending pool in the near future to enrich the veTRAVA incentive program. ##
**Why do we need veTRAVA?**
Firstly, veTRAVA represents the vote locking mechanism, which helps the protocol focus on encouraging ones who show strong commitment.
Secondly, veTRAVA is designed as an ERC721 token, which opens a future secondary marketplace to avoid the decrease of liquidity on the market because of locking the Trava token. ##
**How can I get veTRAVA?**
You can go to our Locker UI in Governance Portal to create a new veTRAVA lock.
Here is the link to our user guide.

Introduction To The rTRAVA Bridge
 
** _What is the rTRAVA Bridge, and why do we need it?_**
There are many blockchain networks and cryptocurrencies that use different blockchain technologies. As in the Trava Lending pool, there are over 15 types of cryptocurrency on three chains, consisting of BSC, Fantom, and Ethereum.
Usually, exchange across different blockchains for cryptocurrency is possible without a cross-chain bridge. However, it is very expensive and time-consuming to do so. That‚Äôs why we need a bridge that enables users to transit their tokens easier and faster at a low cost.
For now, Trava.finance has already opened a bridge that allows users to transfer their TRAVA tokens from Fantom to BSC and vice versa. However, given the increase of the rTRAVA utilities, we are pleased to introduce the rTRAVA bridge that helps our users to exchange rTRAVA tokens from Fantom and Ethereum to BSC.
 
**What benefit does the rTRAVA bridge bring to the whole ecosystem?**
As mentioned, users can transit rTRAVA tokens from Fantom and Ethereum to BSC easier and cheaper with the rTRAVA bridge.
By doing that, there are more chances for them to participate in various programs on the BSC network, especially in locking their tokens in the Trava governance vault to attain voting power and rewards.
To be more specific, in Trava Governance, the decision-making power of users corresponds with the volume of TRAVA, rTRAVA, and LP TRAVA/BNB they lock in the Trava Governance vault.
At first, the voting power attained from locking TRAVA and rTRAVA is the same. However, there will be some differences between these two that locking rTRAVA will get more significant power in the future. Thus, locking rTRAVA seems to be a smart choice to improve the influence in the ecosystem quickly.
Nevertheless, the Trava Governance vault is implemented on the BSC platform that stops users from locking rTRAVA tokens.
By implementing the rTRAVA bridge, users now can effortlessly transfer rTRAVA from Ethereum and Fantom to BSC, lock them then attain both rewards and decision-making power.
The rTRAVA Bridge
 
**How does it work?**
As mentioned, the rTRAVA bridge makes the token transition process quicker and effortless. When transit your rTRAVA tokens through the bridge, you only need to pay a small amount of bridge fee and follow some particular rules.
Two options relating to the parameters of the rTRAVA bridge are shown in the table below. Thus, a voting snapshot will soon be opened for our community to choose which one should be officially applied.
 1. _Delay time_**:** The period you need to wait for implementing the transaction.
 2. _Bridge Fee_ : The fee (in TRAVA) you need to pay for each transaction using the rTRAVA bridge.

**Merge veTRAVA** A function that allows users to merge two veTRAVANFTs together while preserving voting power and reward.  _On July 2nd, 2024, Trava Finance organized an AMA on_ _to discuss the development of_** _TravaGPT_** _and the incentive campaign of this product ‚Äú_** _Easy Integration, Abundant Rewards_** _‚Äù._
With the honored presence of Mr. Duke Nash, Tech Lead of TravaGPT, this AMA meeting has led attendees to dive into the product TravaGPT and its incentive program. The event was hosted by Ms. Tilly, Community Mod, and covered 3 main sections:
1Ô∏è‚É£ Information about TravaGPT V3.0.
2Ô∏è‚É£ The ongoing incentive program for TravaGPT.
3Ô∏è‚É£ Answers community questions.
Let‚Äôs go through the discussions in this AMA event in this article.
 
Information about TravaGPT V3.0
**First Question: We can see that Trava Finance is increasingly pushing AI chatbot ‚Äî TravaGPT. So can you introduce this product to new users and explain its significance in Trava ecosystem to everyone, please?**
For those who are new here, TravaGPT is an AI chatbot that helps enhance user experience and lets you navigate DeFi more easily. This product has been launched in Trava Finance since the beginning of 2024, and as of now, it has developed almost completely.
As the world is focusing on AI technology to unlock more potential benefits, Trava Finance also looks ahead to apply advanced technology in our product to provide an unlimited user experience. TravaGPT is born with the mission to become a personal assistant in blockchain investment in Trava ecosystem.
That means, you just need to ask TravaGPT to do everything in our ecosystem. The flow will be streamlined from users -> TravaGPT -> Trava Finance.
**Second Question: TravaGPT has undergone many major upgrades to reach the current version V3.0. So what is special about TravaGPT V3.0?**
Well, TravaGPT has entered Version V3.0, which integrates with Smart Wallet and automates popular actions on Trava Finance.
At present, you can ask TravaGPT to do actions in Trava Finance with Smart Wallets as follows:
‚û°Ô∏è Lending Pools: Deposit, borrow, repay, withdraw.
‚û°Ô∏è Trava Staking: Stake, withdraw, claim reward.
‚û°Ô∏è Trava governance: Create lock, increase amount, increase unlock time, withdraw, merge, compound.
When you try this version, you can see significant improvement in experience:
‚úÖ Provides real-time information for tokens, defi applications
‚úÖ Easily execute transactions within Trava ecosystem by natural language, saving time since users don‚Äôt need to go through each application to execute the corresponding transactions
Especially, we have updated a mini assistant in TravaGPT to help quick transfer between your wallet and smart wallet.
üëâ So don‚Äôt forget to give it a try: https://app.trava.finance/gpt
**Third Question: I think that many users are waiting for more improvement and benefits of TravaGPT. So do you have any plans for future development of TravaGPT?**
In the future, we‚Äôll come up with advanced features for TravaGPT:
üëâ Collect and analyze real-time news in the blockchain industry to provide deeper insights
üëâ Customize recommendations using the user‚Äôs assets for a personalized experience
Everything is waiting ahead, so stay tuned with us for a greater experience!
 
The ongoing incentive program for TravaGPT
**Fourth Question: Currently, Trava is running an incentive program for TravaGPT V3.0. Could you please share with us the objective for this campaign?**
The official name of TravaGPT V3.0‚Äôs incentive program is ‚ÄúEasy Integration, Abundant Rewards‚Äù
This campaign plays an important role in perfecting TravaGPT. It aims to help users get used to the new updates of our chatbot and provide them with real benefits.
After the campaign, we hope that Trava users will adopt a handy way of using Trava products: ‚ö°** _ask TravaGPT to do actions in Trava Finance_** ‚ö°
**Fifth Question: So how can we participate in this campaign and are there any notices to keep in mind?**
To join TravaGPT V3.0‚Äôs incentive campaign, you need to have 2 things:
**_1. TravaGPT using permission_**
Anyone who holds $5 Trava/vTrava/rTrava/staked Trava/staked rTrava can use TravaGPT: https://app.trava.finance/gpt
** _2. A Smart Wallet:_**
Create your smart wallet here if you haven‚Äôt had it yet: https://app.trava.finance/station
Next, you just need to do a simple thing:
**_asking TravaGPT_** _to deposit/ stake with_** _Smart Wallet_** _in Trava Finance lending pool/ Trava Staking and Trava Finance._
‚ö†Ô∏è Especially, remember to ensure this NOTE:
When you stake/ deposit in Trava pools/vaults, you‚Äôll have your own APR reward and PLUS 20% of the APR. HOWEVER:
‚úÖ Leaving the reward in the vault until the campaign ends, you will earn an extra 20% APR.
‚ùå Withdrawing the reward before the campaign ends, you will NOT receive that extra 20% APR.
**Sixth Question: Many users are still confused a little bit about the Rewards of the campaign, especially the 20% APR PLUS. Could you give us a clear explanation for those rewards?**
The 20% APR PUS means that you will have an additional 20% of the APR you have when depositing/staking in Trava pool/vault.
To make things simple, I will give you the formula for this reward:
**_APR + (20% * APR)_**
For example, when you stake tokens in Trava Staking and have 4.5% APR. In this campaign, you will not only have that 4.5% APR but also an additional 20% of that APR, which is 0.9%
Remember that you also have Extra Rewards and Lottery Rewards, alongside the 20% APR PLUS.
üëâ So let‚Äôs join us and get yourself in this LEADERBOARD:
 
Answers community questions
The AMA also provided insightful answers to the community‚Äôs questions on Twitter and during the event on Telegram."", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://blog.trava.finance/ama-recap-unlock-travagpt-v3-0s-incentive-campaign-9607162f1da5?source=collection_home_page----75e285c42203-----5-----------------------------------"", ""rrf_score"": 0.0625 }, { ""content"": ""Trava‚Äôs incentive programs aim to encourage users who show significant commitment to the protocol's future.

 Trava‚Äôs incentive programs aim to encourage users who show significant commitment to the protocol's future.
veTRAVA holders will start to earn rewards in TRAVA tokens after they lock their tokens in the Trava Governance vault. When users claim their rewards, their voting power will increase. All rewards will be available in the users‚Äô hands after their veTRAVA‚Äôs unlock time.


**Weekly Rewards**
Every Tuesday at 3 P.M UTC, users‚Äô claimable rewards will increase based on their voting power proportion in the last week. The larger amount and the longer time they lock, the more voting power they will possess, and the more attractive their rewards will be.
 Trava‚Äôs incentive programs aim to encourage users who show significant commitment to the protocol's future.

**Warm-up Rewards**
For users who lock their tokens after the Tuesday checkpoint, their weekly rewards will start from next week‚Äôs checkpoint, and they will receive other types of rewards from a warm-up vault instead until the next Tuesday. So don‚Äôt worry about which day it is. You will receive incentives right after locking in the Governance vault.
The APR used for calculating the warm-up rewards is 15%

**Adaptive rewarding mechanism**
And to help stabilize the rewards APR as well as bring more benefits to users, the incentive program for each week might have differences, both for the weekly rewards and the warm-up rewards. Therefore, there will be an announcement every Monday. Make sure to follow our channels & feel free to raise your ideas.

Thus, locking rTRAVA seems to be a smart choice to improve the influence in the ecosystem quickly.
Nevertheless, the Trava Governance vault is implemented on the BSC platform that stops users from locking rTRAVA tokens.
By implementing the rTRAVA bridge, users now can effortlessly transfer rTRAVA from Ethereum and Fantom to BSC, lock them then attain both rewards and decision-making power.
The rTRAVA Bridge
 
**How does it work?**
As mentioned, the rTRAVA bridge makes the token transition process quicker and effortless. When transit your rTRAVA tokens through the bridge, you only need to pay a small amount of bridge fee and follow some particular rules.
Two options relating to the parameters of the rTRAVA bridge are shown in the table below. Thus, a voting snapshot will soon be opened for our community to choose which one should be officially applied.
 1. _Delay time_**:** The period you need to wait for implementing the transaction.
 2. _Bridge Fee_ : The fee (in TRAVA) you need to pay for each transaction using the rTRAVA bridge.

8 min readJul 5, 2024

 _On July 2nd, 2024, Trava Finance organized an AMA on_ _to discuss the development of_** _TravaGPT_** _and the incentive campaign of this product ‚Äú_** _Easy Integration, Abundant Rewards_** _‚Äù._
With the honored presence of Mr. Duke Nash, Tech Lead of TravaGPT, this AMA meeting has led attendees to dive into the product TravaGPT and its incentive program. The event was hosted by Ms. Tilly, Community Mod, and covered 3 main sections:
1Ô∏è‚É£ Information about TravaGPT V3.0.
2Ô∏è‚É£ The ongoing incentive program for TravaGPT.
3Ô∏è‚É£ Answers community questions.
Let‚Äôs go through the discussions in this AMA event in this article.
 
Information about TravaGPT V3.0
**First Question: We can see that Trava Finance is increasingly pushing AI chatbot ‚Äî TravaGPT. So can you introduce this product to new users and explain its significance in Trava ecosystem to everyone, please?**
For those who are new here, TravaGPT is an AI chatbot that helps enhance user experience and lets you navigate DeFi more easily. This product has been launched in Trava Finance since the beginning of 2024, and as of now, it has developed almost completely.
As the world is focusing on AI technology to unlock more potential benefits, Trava Finance also looks ahead to apply advanced technology in our product to provide an unlimited user experience. TravaGPT is born with the mission to become a personal assistant in blockchain investment in Trava ecosystem.
That means, you just need to ask TravaGPT to do everything in our ecosystem. The flow will be streamlined from users -> TravaGPT -> Trava Finance.
**Second Question: TravaGPT has undergone many major upgrades to reach the current version V3.0. So what is special about TravaGPT V3.0?**
Well, TravaGPT has entered Version V3.0, which integrates with Smart Wallet and automates popular actions on Trava Finance.
At present, you can ask TravaGPT to do actions in Trava Finance with Smart Wallets as follows:
‚û°Ô∏è Lending Pools: Deposit, borrow, repay, withdraw.
‚û°Ô∏è Trava Staking: Stake, withdraw, claim reward.
‚û°Ô∏è Trava governance: Create lock, increase amount, increase unlock time, withdraw, merge, compound.
When you try this version, you can see significant improvement in experience:
‚úÖ Provides real-time information for tokens, defi applications
‚úÖ Easily execute transactions within Trava ecosystem by natural language, saving time since users don‚Äôt need to go through each application to execute the corresponding transactions
Especially, we have updated a mini assistant in TravaGPT to help quick transfer between your wallet and smart wallet.
üëâ So don‚Äôt forget to give it a try: https://app.trava.finance/gpt
**Third Question: I think that many users are waiting for more improvement and benefits of TravaGPT. So do you have any plans for future development of TravaGPT?**
In the future, we‚Äôll come up with advanced features for TravaGPT:
üëâ Collect and analyze real-time news in the blockchain industry to provide deeper insights
üëâ Customize recommendations using the user‚Äôs assets for a personalized experience
Everything is waiting ahead, so stay tuned with us for a greater experience!
 
The ongoing incentive program for TravaGPT
**Fourth Question: Currently, Trava is running an incentive program for TravaGPT V3.0. Could you please share with us the objective for this campaign?**
The official name of TravaGPT V3.0‚Äôs incentive program is ‚ÄúEasy Integration, Abundant Rewards‚Äù
This campaign plays an important role in perfecting TravaGPT. It aims to help users get used to the new updates of our chatbot and provide them with real benefits.
After the campaign, we hope that Trava users will adopt a handy way of using Trava products: ‚ö°** _ask TravaGPT to do actions in Trava Finance_** ‚ö°
**Fifth Question: So how can we participate in this campaign and are there any notices to keep in mind?**
To join TravaGPT V3.0‚Äôs incentive campaign, you need to have 2 things:
**_1. TravaGPT using permission_**
Anyone who holds $5 Trava/vTrava/rTrava/staked Trava/staked rTrava can use TravaGPT: https://app.trava.finance/gpt
** _2. A Smart Wallet:_**
Create your smart wallet here if you haven‚Äôt had it yet: https://app.trava.finance/station
Next, you just need to do a simple thing:
**_asking TravaGPT_** _to deposit/ stake with_** _Smart Wallet_** _in Trava Finance lending pool/ Trava Staking and Trava Finance._
‚ö†Ô∏è Especially, remember to ensure this NOTE:
When you stake/ deposit in Trava pools/vaults, you‚Äôll have your own APR reward and PLUS 20% of the APR. HOWEVER:
‚úÖ Leaving the reward in the vault until the campaign ends, you will earn an extra 20% APR.
‚ùå Withdrawing the reward before the campaign ends, you will NOT receive that extra 20% APR.
**Sixth Question: Many users are still confused a little bit about the Rewards of the campaign, especially the 20% APR PLUS. Could you give us a clear explanation for those rewards?**
The 20% APR PUS means that you will have an additional 20% of the APR you have when depositing/staking in Trava pool/vault.
To make things simple, I will give you the formula for this reward:
**_APR + (20% * APR)_**
For example, when you stake tokens in Trava Staking and have 4.5% APR. In this campaign, you will not only have that 4.5% APR but also an additional 20% of that APR, which is 0.9%
Remember that you also have Extra Rewards and Lottery Rewards, alongside the 20% APR PLUS.
üëâ So let‚Äôs join us and get yourself in this LEADERBOARD:
 
Answers community questions
The AMA also provided insightful answers to the community‚Äôs questions on Twitter and during the event on Telegram."", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://blog.trava.finance/ama-recap-unlock-travagpt-v3-0s-incentive-campaign-9607162f1da5?source=collection_home_page----75e285c42203-----5-----------------------------------"", ""rrf_score"": 0.0625 }, { ""content"": ""Trava‚Äôs incentive programs aim to encourage users who show significant commitment to the protocol's future.

 Trava‚Äôs incentive programs aim to encourage users who show significant commitment to the protocol's future.
veTRAVA holders will start to earn rewards in TRAVA tokens after they lock their tokens in the Trava Governance vault. When users claim their rewards, their voting power will increase. All rewards will be available in the users‚Äô hands after their veTRAVA‚Äôs unlock time.


**Weekly Rewards**
Every Tuesday at 3 P.M UTC, users‚Äô claimable rewards will increase based on their voting power proportion in the last week. The larger amount and the longer time they lock, the more voting power they will possess, and the more attractive their rewards will be.
 Trava‚Äôs incentive programs aim to encourage users who show significant commitment to the protocol's future.

**Warm-up Rewards**

So don‚Äôt worry about which day it is. You will receive incentives right after locking in the Governance vault.

Therefore, there will be an announcement every Monday. Make sure to follow our channels & feel free to raise your ideas.
