}]",,,"{ ""number_of_documents"": 5, ""results"": [ { ""content"": ""**How to participate in Governance?**
Trava users need to lock their Trava/rTrava for veTRAVA token to participate in the on-chain governance process. Then, after gaining your voting power, go to the Vote UI in the Governance Portal. You can now vote on active proposals, and before that, don‚Äôt forget to read its discussion on the forum carefully.
 

**What is voting power?**
The number of voting power you receive from veTRAVA depends on your locked balance & unlock time. The minimum locking time is one week, and the maximum locking time is four years.
Your voting power gradually decreases as your escrow tokens approach their lock expiry. The graph on Locker UI from Governance Portal illustrates the decrease process."", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://docs.trava.finance/governance/voting"", ""rrf_score"": 0.11904761904761904 }, { ""content"": ""*

The native digital cryptographically-secured fungible token of TRAVA.FINANCE (Trava token) is a transferable representation of attributed governance and utility functions specified in the protocol/code of TRAVA.FINANCE, and which is designed to be used solely as an interoperable utility token on the platform. Trava token is issued based on Binance Smart Chain‚Äôs BEP20 standard.
Trava token is a functional utility token which will be used as the medium of exchange between participants on TRAVA.FINANCE in a decentralised manner. The goal of introducing Trava token is to provide a convenient and secure mode of payment and settlement between participants who interact within the ecosystem on TRAVA.FINANCE, and it is not, and not intended to be, a medium of exchange accepted by the public (or a section of the public) as payment for goods or services or for the discharge of a debt; nor is it designed or intended to be used by any person as payment for any goods or services whatsoever that are not exclusively provided by the issuer. Trava token does not in any way represent any shareholding, participation, right, title, or interest in the Company, the Distributor, their respective affiliates, or any other company, enterprise or undertaking, nor will Trava token entitle token holders to any promise of fees, dividends, revenue, profits or investment returns, and are not intended to constitute securities in Singapore or any relevant jurisdiction. Trava token may only be utilised on TRAVA.FINANCE, and ownership of Trava token carries no rights, express or implied, other than the right to use Trava token as a means to enable usage of and interaction within TRAVA.FINANCE.
Trava also provides the economic incentives which will be distributed to encourage users to contribute to and participate in the ecosystem on TRAVA.FINANCE, thereby creating a mutually beneficial system where every participant is fairly compensated for its efforts. Trava token is an integral and indispensable part of TRAVA.FINANCE, because without Trava token, there would be no incentive for users to expend resources to participate in activities or provide services for the benefit of the entire ecosystem on TRAVA.FINANCE. Given that additional Trava token will be awarded to a user based only on its actual usage, activity and contribution on TRAVA.FINANCE and/or proportionate to the frequency and volume of transactions, users of TRAVA.FINANCE and/or holders of Trava token which did not actively participate will not receive any Trava token incentives.
Trava token is used in 4 main areas: (1) Reward (2) Collateral & Lending (3) Payment (4) Staking:
 1. **Reward:** To incentivise users to provide liquidity to pools, pool owners can set up rewards paid in TRAVA token.
 2. **Collateral and lending:** TRAVA tokens may be used as the basic collateral for loans and mortgages.
 3. **Payment for lending fees:** As the native platform currency, TRAVA tokens may be used to pay for lending fees in TRAVA.FINANCE pools.
 4. **Payment for pool management:** As the native platform currency, TRAVA tokens may be used by pool owners to pay for pool management by TRAVA.FINANCE.
 5. **Payment for auction deposits:** In the NFT auction process, TRAVA tokens can be used as the deposit for purchase transactions.
 6. **Payment for auction organization:** The NFT‚Äôs owners (auction organizers) may pay for auction fees with TRAVA tokens.
 7. **Staking for a validator:** The data stored on the knowledge graph chain must be verified by validators. As an indication of commitment and service standard assurance, validators would be required to put up an amount of Trava token as a security deposit (i.e. a ""stake"") before being entitled to participate in the ecosystem. Where validators commit offences (e.g. incorrect information, unacceptable down-time, or other malicious acts), this stake may be slashed.
 8. **Staking to participate in the governance process:** The Trava token would allow holders to create and vote on on-chain governance proposals to determine future features of TRAVA.FINANCE, with voting weight calculated in proportion to the tokens staked (the right to vote is restricted solely to voting on features of TRAVA.FINANCE; it does not entitle Trava token holders to vote on the operation and management of the Company, its affiliates, or their assets or the disposition of such assets to token holders, or select the board of directors of these entities, or determine the development direction of these entities, does not constitute any equity interest in any of these entities or any collective investment scheme; the arrangement is not intended to be any form of joint venture or partnership).

 *"", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://app.trava.finance/station/analytics"", ""rrf_score"": 0.07142857142857142 }, { ""content"": ""**Trava Governance ‚Äî The Lottery Program**
Published in
3 min readMay 18, 2022
Share
 _To celebrate the launch of Trava Governance, we would like to open a series of_** _mini-games_** _for the Trava community, which are expected to be a fresh breeze for the whole ecosystem._
_To kick off this series, the Trava Governance Lottery program will be released on May 19, 2022._
Trava Governance ‚Äî The Lottery Program
 
**What is the Trava Governance Lottery?**
This unique, exclusive event provides users who lock TRAVA, rTRAVA, and LP BNB/TRAVA in the Trava Governance vault the chance to gain rewards.
Depending on the voting power that you own, you can get a list of random numbers. Those who own the lucky number chosen by the program‚Äôs smart contract will earn rewards.
 
**How does it work, and how to participate in the lottery?**
To join the lottery, first, you need to lock TRAVA, rTRAVA, or LP BNB/TRAVA to the Trava governance vault. By doing that, you will gain the voting power that helps you to get the random numbers. The more voting power you have, the more numbers you attain. That also means you will have a better chance of winning the lottery if you have more voting power.
Note that, the amount of lottery numbers you have will be determined by the real-time voting power at 3 P.M UTC on 19th, May 2022. You can check this information on our dashboard.
In more detail, the correspondence between the voting power and lottery numbers amount you own is shown below:
Before running the lottery, you can keep track of your lottery number on the dashboard
 * There will be ten rolls in 10 hours (1 roll for each hour).
 * For each roll, the lucky number will be revealed on our dashboard.
 * Users who own this number will gain one ticket to buy a Trava Knight NFT chest that is usually set at 5000 TRAVA.


 
**_To sum up, what do you need to attain the benefits?_**
 * Lock your tokens (TRAVA, rTRAVA, LP TRAVA/BNB) now to get the lucky numbers https://app.trava.finance/governance/locker
 * Update the lucky number for each lottery roll
 * If you are the lucky one, congratulations, you have the chance to earn the NFT ticket
 * If not: Don‚Äôt worry, let‚Äôs try your luck the next time.

 *"", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://app.trava.finance/station/junction"", ""rrf_score"": 0.08333333333333333 }, { ""content"": ""Figure 5: TRAVA Token Overview
The native digital cryptographically-secured fungible token of TRAVA.FINANCE (Trava token) is a transferable representation of attributed governance and utility functions specified in the protocol/code of TRAVA.FINANCE, and which is designed to be used solely as an interoperable utility token on the platform. Trava token is issued based on Binance Smart Chain‚Äôs BEP20 standard.
Trava token is a functional utility token which will be used as the medium of exchange between participants on TRAVA.FINANCE in a decentralised manner. The goal of introducing Trava token is to provide a convenient and secure mode of payment and settlement between participants who interact within the ecosystem on TRAVA.FINANCE, and it is not, and not intended to be, a medium of exchange accepted by the public (or a section of the public) as payment for goods or services or for the discharge of a debt; nor is it designed or intended to be used by any person as payment for any goods or services whatsoever that are not exclusively provided by the issuer. Trava token does not in any way represent any shareholding, participation, right, title, or interest in the Company, the Distributor, their respective affiliates, or any other company, enterprise or undertaking, nor will Trava token entitle token holders to any promise of fees, dividends, revenue, profits or investment returns, and are not intended to constitute securities in Singapore or any relevant jurisdiction. Trava token may only be utilised on TRAVA.FINANCE, and ownership of Trava token carries no rights, express or implied, other than the right to use Trava token as a means to enable usage of and interaction within TRAVA.FINANCE.
Trava also provides the economic incentives which will be distributed to encourage users to contribute to and participate in the ecosystem on TRAVA.FINANCE, thereby creating a mutually beneficial system where every participant is fairly compensated for its efforts. Trava token is an integral and indispensable part of TRAVA.FINANCE, because without Trava token, there would be no incentive for users to expend resources to participate in activities or provide services for the benefit of the entire ecosystem on TRAVA.FINANCE. Given that additional Trava token will be awarded to a user based only on its actual usage, activity and contribution on TRAVA.FINANCE and/or proportionate to the frequency and volume of transactions, users of TRAVA.FINANCE and/or holders of Trava token which did not actively participate will not receive any Trava token incentives.
Trava token is used in 4 main areas: (1) Reward (2) Collateral & Lending (3) Payment (4) Staking:
 1. **Reward:** To incentivise users to provide liquidity to pools, pool owners can set up rewards paid in TRAVA token.
 2. **Collateral and lending:** TRAVA tokens may be used as the basic collateral for loans and mortgages.
 3. **Payment for lending fees:** As the native platform currency, TRAVA tokens may be used to pay for lending fees in TRAVA.FINANCE pools.
 4. **Payment for pool management:** As the native platform currency, TRAVA tokens may be used by pool owners to pay for pool management by TRAVA.FINANCE.
 5. **Payment for auction deposits:** In the NFT auction process, TRAVA tokens can be used as the deposit for purchase transactions.
 6. **Payment for auction organization:** The NFT‚Äôs owners (auction organizers) may pay for auction fees with TRAVA tokens.
 7. **Staking for a validator:** The data stored on the knowledge graph chain must be verified by validators. As an indication of commitment and service standard assurance, validators would be required to put up an amount of Trava token as a security deposit (i.e. a ""stake"") before being entitled to participate in the ecosystem. Where validators commit offences (e.g. incorrect information, unacceptable down-time, or other malicious acts), this stake may be slashed.
 8. **Staking to participate in the governance process:** The Trava token would allow holders to create and vote on on-chain governance proposals to determine future features of TRAVA.FINANCE, with voting weight calculated in proportion to the tokens staked (the right to vote is restricted solely to voting on features of TRAVA.FINANCE; it does not entitle Trava token holders to vote on the operation and management of the Company, its affiliates, or their assets or the disposition of such assets to token holders, or select the board of directors of these entities, or determine the development direction of these entities, does not constitute any equity interest in any of these entities or any collective investment scheme; the arrangement is not intended to be any form of joint venture or partnership).

content"": ""veTRAVA holders will start to earn rewards in TRAVA tokens after they lock their tokens in the Trava Governance vault. When users claim their rewards, their voting power will increase. All rewards will be available in the users‚Äô hands after their veTRAVA‚Äôs unlock time.

""content"": ""**Introduction to Vote Locking mechanism**
Trava & rTrava holders can vote-lock their tokens into the Trava Governance to receive veTRAVA, which holds voting power. The longer they lock, the more voting power they possess. Vote locking allows you to vote in governance and receive rewards from special incentive programs.
 

**What is veTRAVA?**
veTRAVA stands for voting escrow Trava. It is an ERC721 token that acts as evidence of your locking token in the governance module. Every time users create a new lock, they receive a veTRAVA token, storing their locked balance, unlock time, and rewards amount.
The longer you lock your tokens, the more voting power you have (and the bigger incentive you can earn). For example, you can vote lock 1,000 TRAVA/rTRAVA for a year to have 250 voting power. Each token locked for four years is equal to 1 voting power.
The number of voting power you will receive depends on your locked balance & unlock time. 
The minimum locking time is one week, and the maximum locking time is four years.
Your voting power gradually decreases as your escrow tokens approach their lock expiry. The graph on Locker UI from Governance Portal illustrates the decrease process.
 

**What can we do with veTRAVA?**
While holding veTRAVA, you can vote for proposals to change the protocol with your voting power and earn rewards from incentive programs. Currently, veTRAVA holders will earn weekly rewards emission in Trava based on their voting power percentage. There will be proposals to enable sharing fees from protocol or boost rewards in the lending pool in the near future to enrich the veTRAVA incentive program.
 

**Why do we need veTRAVA?**
Firstly, veTRAVA represents the vote locking mechanism, which helps the protocol focus on encouraging ones who show strong commitment.
Secondly, veTRAVA is designed as an ERC721 token, which opens a future secondary marketplace to avoid the decrease of liquidity on the market because of locking the Trava token.
 

**How can I get veTRAVA?**
You can go to our Locker UI in Governance Portal to create a new veTRAVA lock.
Here is the link to our user guide.
PreviousDAONextVoting
Last updated 2 years ago"",

,What is the purpose of the adaptive rewarding mechanism?,"According to the Trava Finance documentation, the purpose of the Adaptive Rewarding Mechanism is to ensure that TRAVA token incentives are distributed fairly and sustainably ‚Äî based on actual user contribution, time commitment, and governance participation.
üéØ Purpose of the Adaptive Rewarding Mechanism

column3: Encourages users to lock TRAVA for longer periods to earn more rewards.
This builds a more loyal and aligned user base, reducing short-term speculation.

column1: üîí Longer lock = more veTRAVA = higher rewards

column3: Prevents long-term users from being diluted by short-term stakers.
veTRAVA decays over time, so only those maintaining or extending locks retain high reward eligibility.
Rewards are proportional to user commitment:
Amount of TRAVA locked
Duration of the lock
Active participation in governance (via veTRAVA)

column1: Users with more veTRAVA (vote-escrowed TRAVA) get a larger share of emissions or incentives.

column3: veTRAVA holders who actively vote or participate in Trava DAO decisions can receive voting incentives.
This strengthens decentralized governance and discourages passive holding.
Avoids excessive or blind emissions that could harm token value.
Allows reward emission to dynamically adjust to ecosystem behavior and governance decisions.

column2: Encourages users to lock TRAVA and hold veTRAVA
Rewards based on actual contribution and time
Keeps TRAVA emissions adaptive and controlled

column1: Would you like a visual breakdown of how rewards scale with veTRAVA, or a simulation of different lock scenarios and their rewards?","The adaptive rewarding mechanism in Trava Finance is designed to dynamically distribute rewards based on user behavior, contribution levels, and commitment to the protocol. Its main purpose is to incentivize long-term, meaningful participation in a fair and efficient way, while protecting the ecosystem from exploitation.
üéØ Purpose of the Adaptive Rewarding Mechanism

column3: Users who lock TRAVA longer (via veTRAVA) receive greater rewards.
This discourages short-term speculation and promotes ecosystem stability.

column1: Example: Locking TRAVA for 1 year earns fewer rewards than locking for 4 years.

column3: Rewards are distributed based on activity and engagement, such as:
Voting in governance
Providing liquidity
Staking NFTs or TRAVA
More active users receive a larger share of emissions.
The system reduces rewards for users who:
Frequently lock/unlock to game the system
Try to farm rewards without long-term commitment
This helps maintain a healthy distribution and deters bad actors.
Adaptive rewards adjust based on:
Current protocol health
Pool usage and demand
Governance voting outcomes
This ensures that TRAVA emissions are not wasted, and are directed to where they‚Äôre most beneficial (via gauge voting).
Users may earn more rewards by:
Leveling up NFTs
Transmuting items
Holding specific governance roles
This gamification layer enhances user experience and deepens ecosystem involvement.

column2: Adjusts flows to pools with real usage/demand
Rewards NFT use, staking, loyalty-based events

column1: Would you like a breakdown of how much adaptive rewards you could earn based on your lock duration and activity level? I can simulate that for you.",docs,"[{""url"": ""https://docs.trava.finance/governance/incentive"",

""content"": ""**How to participate in Governance?**
Trava users need to lock their Trava/rTrava for veTRAVA token to participate in the on-chain governance process. Then, after gaining your voting power, go to the Vote UI in the Governance Portal. You can now vote on active proposals, and before that, don‚Äôt forget to read its discussion on the forum carefully.
 

**What is voting power?**

""content"": ""**Mission & Vision**
DAO stands for ‚ÄúDecentralized Autonomous Organization‚Äù. Establishing the development of Trava DAO ensures Trava‚Äôs team mission:
  * A self-governed protocol, powered by the strength of the Trava community & secured smart contracts.
  * The growth of Trava Ecosystem, a decentralized finance platform with stable and outstanding products.


With that mission in mind, Trava DAO will be implemented & takes over centralized processes gradually with the growth of the ecosystem.
 

**Governance v1**
For version 1 of Trava Governance, we present evolution in governance processes with on-chain features enabled.
 

**Governance v1**
For version 1 of Trava Governance, we present evolution in governance processes with on-chain features enabled.

**Governance Process**
The governance process consists of 2 continuous processes: off-chain & on-chain.
  * Off-chain process:


In the off-chain process, anyone in the Trava community can raise their opinions and discuss ideas of how the protocol can improve by creating **TRC - Trava Request for Comments** on the Trava Forum.
After an idea is well-formed, a community member can follow our template for **TIP - Trava Improvement Proposal** and post on the forum for details feedback. We recommend off-chain voting (powered by snapshot.org) to gain exposure and rough consensus from the community to increase the chance of succeeding in the on-chain process.
When a TIP gets to its final version, the **DAO Committee** is in charge of the review process and officially proposes on-chain.
  * On-chain process:


When a TIP is proposed on-chain, it becomes transparent on the public blockchain; anyone possessing voting power can directly **vote for or against** this proposal.
After the voting period, a TIP will be **queued and executed** by the public.
The **Security Advisory Board acts as a guardian** to prevent malicious actions and security exploits in this process.
 

**Governance v1**
For version 1 of Trava Governance, we present evolution in governance processes with on-chain features enabled.

**Governance Authority**
In governance version 1, the DAO will have authority over the Trava lending protocol. The community will have to agree on any significant changes or updates through the on-chain process.
 

**Governance v1**
For version 1 of Trava Governance, we present evolution in governance processes with on-chain features enabled.

**Governance Power**
To gain governance power, holders need to lock their Trava or rTrava token in exchange for the veTRAVA token, which holds voting power. This vote locking mechanism encourages users who show a solid commitment to the protocol with more governance power and incentive.
PreviousIntroductionNextLocker
Last updated 2 years ago"",

""content"": ""**Introduction To The rTRAVA Bridge**
Published in
3 min readMay 21, 2022
Share
Introduction To The rTRAVA Bridge
 
** _What is the rTRAVA Bridge, and why do we need it?_**
There are many blockchain networks and cryptocurrencies that use different blockchain technologies. As in the Trava Lending pool, there are over 15 types of cryptocurrency on three chains, consisting of BSC, Fantom, and Ethereum.
Usually, exchange across different blockchains for cryptocurrency is possible without a cross-chain bridge. However, it is very expensive and time-consuming to do so. That‚Äôs why we need a bridge that enables users to transit their tokens easier and faster at a low cost.
For now, Trava.finance has already opened a bridge that allows users to transfer their TRAVA tokens from Fantom to BSC and vice versa. However, given the increase of the rTRAVA utilities, we are pleased to introduce the rTRAVA bridge that helps our users to exchange rTRAVA tokens from Fantom and Ethereum to BSC.
 
**What benefit does the rTRAVA bridge bring to the whole ecosystem?**
As mentioned, users can transit rTRAVA tokens from Fantom and Ethereum to BSC easier and cheaper with the rTRAVA bridge.
By doing that, there are more chances for them to participate in various programs on the BSC network, especially in locking their tokens in the Trava governance vault to attain voting power and rewards.
To be more specific, in Trava Governance, the decision-making power of users corresponds with the volume of TRAVA, rTRAVA, and LP TRAVA/BNB they lock in the Trava Governance vault.
At first, the voting power attained from locking TRAVA and rTRAVA is the same. However, there will be some differences between these two that locking rTRAVA will get more significant power in the future. Thus, locking rTRAVA seems to be a smart choice to improve the influence in the ecosystem quickly.
Nevertheless, the Trava Governance vault is implemented on the BSC platform that stops users from locking rTRAVA tokens.
By implementing the rTRAVA bridge, users now can effortlessly transfer rTRAVA from Ethereum and Fantom to BSC, lock them then attain both rewards and decision-making power.
The rTRAVA Bridge
 
**How does it work?**
As mentioned, the rTRAVA bridge makes the token transition process quicker and effortless. When transit your rTRAVA tokens through the bridge, you only need to pay a small amount of bridge fee and follow some particular rules.
Two options relating to the parameters of the rTRAVA bridge are shown in the table below. Thus, a voting snapshot will soon be opened for our community to choose which one should be officially applied.
  1. _Delay time_**:** The period you need to wait for implementing the transaction.
  2. _Bridge Fee_ : The fee (in TRAVA) you need to pay for each transaction using the rTRAVA bridge.


**_Examples for calculating the bridge fee:_**"",

"", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://docs.trava.finance/governance/governance-forum"", ""rrf_score"": 0.10555555555555556 }, { ""content"": ""**Trava Meetup ‚Äî Special Episode ‚Äî The Next Step In The Trava Ecosystem**
Published in
10 min readMay 16, 2022
Share
We are pleased to recap the special meet-up 3 of Trava.finance. With the presence of Dr. Minh, CEO of Trava Finance, Mr. Thang, CTO of Trava Finance, Ms. Quinn, Marketing Lead of Trava Finance and Ms. Michelle ‚Äî BD of TechFi, this meetup is a major element of the introduction of Trava‚Äôs new phase and a new connection with TechFi, an educational website about crypto and blockchain for investors and developers. The meetup is going to reveal a potential connection in the future between the 2 projects.
The meet-up was divided into 3 parts: (1) Greeting and Introduction, (2) In-depth Discussion, and (3) Ending.
In this Recap, we will try to summarize the most interesting points for you.
 
**Part 1: Greeting and Introduction**
**Ms. Quinn**
Good afternoon ladies and gentlemen. My name is Quinn, Marketing Lead at TRAVA.finance. It‚Äôs my pleasure to welcome you here today.
Guys, I am very very excited right now. As all of u know even though there are already 3 meetup episodes, this is the 1st time we have a livestream ever in our community
Joining us today, I‚Äôm glad to introduce Dr. Minh and Mr. Thang, our CEO and CTO who are co-founders of Trava Finance. They will walk us through some main points as short-term goals of Trava and the next actions in terms of technology, marketing, and business development plan in this bearish market situation. I‚Äôm also super excited because today we got here a secret guest who will be speaking at the last part of the meetup.
There are totally three parts today: Give a brief view at first, then go to detailed information on the Development Plan of Trava Finance. And the last one ‚Äî I bet u guys will be curious about the guest and listen to sharings about marketing development.
Hi Minh. Hi Thang. How are you doing?
**Dr. Minh**
Hi Quinn, I‚Äôm doing great. Really nice to be here with our community and have a close conversation with you guys, especially in the situation that we‚Äôre going through all the uncertainties and insecurities appearing recently in the world of cryptocurrency.
**Mr. Thang**
Hi, Quinn. Hi everybody. I‚Äôm good, I hope you‚Äôre doing well. To be honest, I‚Äôve been a bit busy lately, have been researching and digging deep into the market lately. So it‚Äôs really great to sit together and talk with you guys and then walk you through all of the plans we are heading towards. And excited to talk to our guests at the same time.
**Ms. Quinn**
Great! Seems that we are all ready for the discussion with our Knights today.

**Part 2: In-depth Discussion**

Topic1: Development plan overview in Tech and Marketing
**Ms. Quinn**
So, as you know, the market situation seems to be rather red and not good for many projects and investors as well. As the CEO, Minh, can u share to our Knights your strategies to maintain the growth of the project and keep the trust among the community?
**Dr. Minh**
It‚Äôs really hard to say what is right to do at that time in this bear market. So I have been listening to the feedback from our community, observing the market, and consulting a lot of individuals who are experienced in cryptocurrency.
In fact, we still try to stick with the initial ideas that follow our long-term vision. At the same time, we also have some modifications to adapt to the bear market at the moment, including some new ideas about technology, marketing, and business.
 
**Part 2: In-depth Discussion**

Topic 2: Technology development plan
**Ms. Quinn**
Great! Talk about the technology development, could you please give users some detailed information
**Dr. Minh**

Absolutely right, Dr. Minh. It‚Äôs better to focus on something that actually works and benefits our users, both old and new ones.

Trava Ecosystem

**Part 2: In-depth Discussion**

About Marketing, we have the orientation of growing organic Marketing. We try to organize internal events to improve the communication between the team and our community. This module presents an on-chain governance mechanism, where the Trava community can propose and vote on protocol changes & improvements as a way of participating in the protocol‚Äôs decision-making process.
In the big picture, there are four essential components in Trava Governance: the Trava community, the DAO Committee, the Security Advisory Board (SAB), and Governance Portal & smart contracts.
 * Trava community: The most valuable resource of ideas, discussions & feedback for protocol changes. Everyone can raise their voice & share their opinion on Trava Forum or any community social channels.
 * DAO Committee: The entrusted individuals in the Trava community to submit proposals after a thorough review with discussion & feedback.
 * Security Advisory Board: The guardian for the protocol‚Äôs security when some malicious actions are aimed at the protocol or in unexpected events.
 * Governance Portal & Smart contracts: The autonomous ‚ÄúHand of the King‚Äù consists of governance contracts for on-chain voting and multiple timelocks governing and automating the changes & updates of Trava Ecosystem‚Äôs smart contracts. That keeps the governance process public and transparent to everyone.

}]",,,"{ ""number_of_documents"": 5, ""results"": [ { ""content"": ""**Introduction to Vote Locking mechanism**
Trava & rTrava holders can vote-lock their tokens into the Trava Governance to receive veTRAVA, which holds voting power. The longer they lock, the more voting power they possess. Vote locking allows you to vote in governance and receive rewards from special incentive programs.
 

**What is veTRAVA?**
veTRAVA stands for voting escrow Trava. It is an ERC721 token that acts as evidence of your locking token in the governance module. Every time users create a new lock, they receive a veTRAVA token, storing their locked balance, unlock time, and rewards amount.
The longer you lock your tokens, the more voting power you have (and the bigger incentive you can earn). For example, you can vote lock 1,000 TRAVA/rTRAVA for a year to have 250 voting power. Each token locked for four years is equal to 1 voting power.
The number of voting power you will receive depends on your locked balance & unlock time. 
The minimum locking time is one week, and the maximum locking time is four years.
Your voting power gradually decreases as your escrow tokens approach their lock expiry. The graph on Locker UI from Governance Portal illustrates the decrease process.
 

**What can we do with veTRAVA?**
While holding veTRAVA, you can vote for proposals to change the protocol with your voting power and earn rewards from incentive programs. Currently, veTRAVA holders will earn weekly rewards emission in Trava based on their voting power percentage. There will be proposals to enable sharing fees from protocol or boost rewards in the lending pool in the near future to enrich the veTRAVA incentive program.
 

**Why do we need veTRAVA?**
Firstly, veTRAVA represents the vote locking mechanism, which helps the protocol focus on encouraging ones who show strong commitment.
Secondly, veTRAVA is designed as an ERC721 token, which opens a future secondary marketplace to avoid the decrease of liquidity on the market because of locking the Trava token.
 

**How can I get veTRAVA?**
You can go to our Locker UI in Governance Portal to create a new veTRAVA lock.
Here is the link to our user guide.
PreviousDAONextVoting

,How to merge veTRAVA tokens?,"According to the Trava Finance documentation, veTRAVA tokens cannot be transferred or traded, but if you have multiple veTRAVA locks (i.e., created separate locks at different times), you can merge them into a single veTRAVA position to simplify management and maximize voting power.

If they are right, click **Confirm.**"", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://docs.trava.finance/user-guide/trava-dao-user-guide"", ""rrf_score"": 0.15476190476190477 }, { ""content"": ""**Introduction to Vote Locking mechanism**
Trava & rTrava holders can vote-lock their tokens into the Trava Governance to receive veTRAVA, which holds voting power. The longer they lock, the more voting power they possess. Vote locking allows you to vote in governance and receive rewards from special incentive programs.
 

**What is veTRAVA?**
veTRAVA stands for voting escrow Trava. It is an ERC721 token that acts as evidence of your locking token in the governance module. Every time users create a new lock, they receive a veTRAVA token, storing their locked balance, unlock time, and rewards amount.
The longer you lock your tokens, the more voting power you have (and the bigger incentive you can earn). For example, you can vote lock 1,000 TRAVA/rTRAVA for a year to have 250 voting power. Each token locked for four years is equal to 1 voting power.
The number of voting power you will receive depends on your locked balance & unlock time. 
The minimum locking time is one week, and the maximum locking time is four years.
Your voting power gradually decreases as your escrow tokens approach their lock expiry. The graph on Locker UI from Governance Portal illustrates the decrease process.
 

**What can we do with veTRAVA?**
While holding veTRAVA, you can vote for proposals to change the protocol with your voting power and earn rewards from incentive programs. Currently, veTRAVA holders will earn weekly rewards emission in Trava based on their voting power percentage. There will be proposals to enable sharing fees from protocol or boost rewards in the lending pool in the near future to enrich the veTRAVA incentive program.
 

**Why do we need veTRAVA?**
Firstly, veTRAVA represents the vote locking mechanism, which helps the protocol focus on encouraging ones who show strong commitment.
Secondly, veTRAVA is designed as an ERC721 token, which opens a future secondary marketplace to avoid the decrease of liquidity on the market because of locking the Trava token.
 

**How can I get veTRAVA?**
You can go to our Locker UI in Governance Portal to create a new veTRAVA lock.
Here is the link to our user guide.
PreviousDAONextVoting

veTRAVA Marketplace is a fresh move toward furthering Trava Governance, and perfecting a fully decentralized market. With its launch, you will be able to freely buy and sell veTRAVA, which represents voting power in the ecosystem. Therefore, veTRAVA Marketplace helps to distribute decision-making rights in the community, implementing decentralization. It also brings along many other benefits, which you can learn more in this article about veTRAVA Marketplace.
The following article will guide you through how to operate on the veTRAVA Marketplace, with details on the two main topics of buying and selling veTRAVA.
 

Join veTRAVA Marketplace
**Step 1:** Visit the main site of veTRAVA Marketplace: https://nft-app.trava.finance/marketplace/ve-trava.
**Step 2:** Connect your wallet.
 

How to buy veTRAVA
In the main area of veTRAVA Marketplace, you will see sales orders being put up by other members of the community. Each of them is shown with detailed information such as voting power, price, ‚Ä¶ so that you can choose the one that best suits your requirements.
 

How to buy veTRAVA
In the main area of veTRAVA Marketplace, you will see sales orders being put up by other members of the community. Each of them is shown with detailed information such as voting power, price, ‚Ä¶ so that you can choose the one that best suits your requirements.

_Customizations_
You can also set requirements to find exactly what you want to buy:
 * Search for anything, or find a specific veTRAVA Owner and sale ID by clicking ‚ÄúSearch All‚Äù and then type in what you are looking for:


 * Sort sales orders in veTRAVA Marketplace by clicking the ‚ÄúSort by‚Äù button.


 * Filter sales orders by Rank and Price Range you can offer, by clicking the ‚ÄúFilters‚Äù button and then customize according to your requirements.


 

How to buy veTRAVA
In the main area of veTRAVA Marketplace, you will see sales orders being put up by other members of the community. Each of them is shown with detailed information such as voting power, price, ‚Ä¶ so that you can choose the one that best suits your requirements.

_Buying veTRAVA_
**Step 1:** Just click on any sale slot:
**Step 2:** You will be directed to this page, click the ‚ÄúBuy‚Äù button:
**Step 3:** Confirm the money in the transaction and wait for it to be done:
 

How to sell veTRAVA
**Step 1:** Click the ‚ÄúCreate‚Äù button on the main site of veTRAVA Marketplace.
**Step 2:** Choose the amount of veTRAVA you want and click the ‚ÄúSell‚Äù button.
**Step 3:** Choose between two tokens, TRAVA and BUSD, and then enter the number you want for your veTRAVA.
**Step 4:** Click the ‚ÄúSell‚Äù button.
**Step 5:** Confirm your Transaction.
 

Important notes - How reasonable prices of veTRAVA are set?
Exchanging veTRAVA on the veTRAVA marketplace also means exchanging: 
 * Voting power.
 * Initial tokens locked: Buyers will get all token amounts locked in the first place.
 * Total rewards: Buyers will receive total rewards including both weekly rewards and warm-up rewards sellers received during their locking period.


That means when selling or buying veTRAVA, you should consider all these factors to set (if you‚Äôre a seller) or to choose (if you‚Äôre a buyer) a reasonable price. 
After clicking on each veTRAVA spot, all this information will be shown as follows:

,How to withdraw veTRAVA tokens?,"According to the Trava Finance documentation, you cannot directly withdraw veTRAVA tokens. Instead, you must wait until your lock period expires, after which you can withdraw your original TRAVA tokens. The veTRAVA itself is non-transferable and non-withdrawable ‚Äî it simply represents your voting power for the duration of the lock.
üîì How to Withdraw Locked TRAVA (After veTRAVA Expires)

column3: Wait for Your Lock to Expire
veTRAVA is created when you lock TRAVA tokens for a fixed time (up to 4 years)
You can only withdraw once the lock period is fully over
Go to Trava Station
Connect Your Wallet
Use MetaMask or another Web3 wallet
Ensure you‚Äôre on the BNB Chain
Navigate to ‚ÄúveTRAVA‚Äù or ‚ÄúDilution Staking‚Äù
View your lock status
If expired, the ‚ÄúWithdraw‚Äù button will become active
Click ‚ÄúWithdraw‚Äù
Confirm the transaction in your wallet
You will receive your original TRAVA tokens (minus any claimed rewards)

column2: You must wait until the lock period ends ‚Äî no exceptions
It‚Äôs a governance metric, not a tradable token
You can extend the lock before it expires to maintain veTRAVA
Get back your locked TRAVA tokens
Your voting power resets to 0 unless you re-lock

column1: Would you like help tracking your unlock time or setting a reminder/alert for when your TRAVA becomes withdrawable?","You cannot directly withdraw veTRAVA tokens ‚Äî because veTRAVA is a non-transferable, time-locked governance token. column3: Open: https://app.trava.finance/veTrava

column1: ‚úÖ 3. Wait for Lock Period to Expire

Click the ‚ÄúWithdraw‚Äù button next to your expired lock
Confirm the transaction in your wallet
Pay a small BNB gas fee

column1: üîÅ Your veTRAVA will become 0, and your original TRAVA tokens will be returned to your wallet.

**Introduction to Vote Locking mechanism**
Trava & rTrava holders can vote-lock their tokens into the Trava Governance to receive veTRAVA, which holds voting power. The longer they lock, the more voting power they possess. Vote locking allows you to vote in governance and receive rewards from special incentive programs. ##
**What is veTRAVA?**
veTRAVA stands for voting escrow Trava. It is an ERC721 token that acts as evidence of your locking token in the governance module. Every time users create a new lock, they receive a veTRAVA token, storing their locked balance, unlock time, and rewards amount.
The longer you lock your tokens, the more voting power you have (and the bigger incentive you can earn). For example, you can vote lock 1,000 TRAVA/rTRAVA for a year to have 250 voting power. Each token locked for four years is equal to 1 voting power.
The number of voting power you will receive depends on your locked balance & unlock time. 
The minimum locking time is one week, and the maximum locking time is four years.
Your voting power gradually decreases as your escrow tokens approach their lock expiry. The graph on Locker UI from Governance Portal illustrates the decrease process. ##
**What can we do with veTRAVA?**
While holding veTRAVA, you can vote for proposals to change the protocol with your voting power and earn rewards from incentive programs. Currently, veTRAVA holders will earn weekly rewards emission in Trava based on their voting power percentage. There will be proposals to enable sharing fees from protocol or boost rewards in the lending pool in the near future to enrich the veTRAVA incentive program. ##
**Why do we need veTRAVA?**
Firstly, veTRAVA represents the vote locking mechanism, which helps the protocol focus on encouraging ones who show strong commitment.
Secondly, veTRAVA is designed as an ERC721 token, which opens a future secondary marketplace to avoid the decrease of liquidity on the market because of locking the Trava token. ##
**How can I get veTRAVA?**
You can go to our Locker UI in Governance Portal to create a new veTRAVA lock.
Here is the link to our user guide.
PreviousDAONextVoting

,How to increase the locked balance for more voting power?,"According to the Trava Finance documentation, you can increase your locked balance to gain more veTRAVA ‚Äî which directly boosts your voting power in Trava DAO and enhances your share of rewards.
üîº How to Increase Your Locked Balance for More Voting Power

column3: Go to Trava Station
Connect Your Wallet
Use MetaMask or another Web3 wallet
Ensure you‚Äôre on the BNB Chain
Navigate to the veTRAVA or Dilution Staking Page
Menu path:
Governance ‚Üí veTRAVA, or
Staking ‚Üí Dilution Staking
Click ‚ÄúIncrease Amount‚Äù
You‚Äôll see an option to add more TRAVA to your current lock position.
Enter the TRAVA Amount to Add
Choose how much additional TRAVA you want to lock.
Note: The lock end time remains unchanged unless you also extend it (see below).
Confirm the Transaction
Approve and sign the transaction in your wallet.
‚úÖ Your veTRAVA Balance Increases
More TRAVA locked = more veTRAVA
This increases your voting power and reward share.

column1: If you also want even more veTRAVA, you can extend the lock time along with the amount:

column3: Choose ‚ÄúIncrease Lock Duration‚Äù in the same interface.

Extending the duration gives higher veTRAVA per token.

column1: Add 1,000 TRAVA and extend to 4 years

column2: Locked TRAVA cannot be unstaked early

column1: Both methods result in more veTRAVA, which increases your governance power and reward boosting potential.

Under your veTRAVA position, click ‚ÄúIncrease Amount‚Äù
Enter the additional TRAVA amount to lock
Click ‚ÄúApprove‚Äù (if first time), then ‚ÄúConfirm‚Äù
Sign the transaction and pay a small BNB gas fee

column1: üîÅ The lock end date stays the same unless you also extend the duration.

column3: From the same veTRAVA dashboard, click ‚ÄúExtend Lock‚Äù

Confirm and sign the transaction

column1: The longer the duration, the more veTRAVA per TRAVA you get.

column3: If you created a new lock separately, you can:

Combine the new and old positions
The merged lock adopts the latest lock duration

column2: Triples veTRAVA output for same balance
Lock large TRAVA amount for max duration

,How to increase the unlock time for more voting power?,"To increase your voting power on Trava Finance, you can extend the unlock time of your locked TRAVA tokens. This increases your veTRAVA balance, which is used for governance voting and rewards distribution.

column3: Visit Trava Station

Click the option to extend it

You can choose any date further in the future (up to a maximum of 4 years from now)

Sign and approve the transaction

,What are the different proposal statuses in Trava Governance?,"According to the Trava Finance documentation, governance proposals in the Trava DAO follow a structured lifecycle with distinct statuses. These statuses reflect each stage of the proposal ‚Äî from draft to decision ‚Äî and help the community track and participate in governance efficiently.
Here are the main statuses a proposal can have:

column3: The proposal is being written or reviewed off-chain, typically discussed on the Trava Forum.
It‚Äôs not yet submitted for on-chain voting.
Community feedback is gathered during this stage.
The proposal has been submitted on-chain but is under Security Advisory Board (SAB) review.
SAB checks for technical, economic, or malicious risks.
The proposal cannot proceed to voting unless it passes review.
The proposal is live on the governance interface.
veTRAVA holders can vote For, Against, or Abstain.
Voting lasts for a predefined duration (e.g., several days).
The outcome depends on majority vote and quorum threshold.
The voting period ended with a majority ‚ÄúFor‚Äù vote and quorum met.
The proposal is queued for execution.
It may require a timelock delay before implementation.
The proposal:
Did not pass the vote (majority ‚ÄúAgainst‚Äù)
Or failed to meet the required quorum
Or was vetoed by the Security Advisory Board
The proposal has been implemented on-chain.
Its changes (e.g., parameter updates, new pools) are now active in the protocol.

column2: Idea is being formed or discussed off-chain
Validated by SAB before voting starts
Voting is live on Trava Station
Did not pass vote or quorum

column1: Would you like help drafting a governance proposal or a walkthrough of how to move from Draft ‚Üí Active ‚Üí Executed?","In Trava Governance, each proposal goes through a clearly defined lifecycle with different statuses that reflect where it stands in the decision-making process. Understanding these statuses helps users track progress and participate at the right time.

column3: The proposal has been created but is not yet active for voting.
It may still be under review or queued for a scheduled start.

column1: üìå You cannot vote on a pending proposal yet.

column3: Voting is live.
veTRAVA holders can vote ‚ÄúFor‚Äù or ‚ÄúAgainst‚Äù the proposal.
There is a set voting period (e.g., 3‚Äì7 days).

column1: üó≥Ô∏è This is when you should cast your vote!

column3: The proposal received enough votes and met quorum and majority requirements.
It can now be executed or queued for final action (depending on the proposal type).
The proposal failed to meet quorum or was voted down by the majority.

column1: ‚ùå No changes will be made as a result of this proposal.

column3: The proposal has passed but is waiting for a timelock or scheduled execution window.

column1: üï∞Ô∏è Used for certain governance actions that require a delay before activation.

column3: The proposal was successfully implemented.
Changes to the protocol, configurations, or rewards are now live.
The proposal was manually canceled before voting or execution.
Possible reasons:
Proposer withdrew it
Malicious or invalid proposal
Lacked continued support

column2: Proposal created but not yet open for voting
Voting is open; veTRAVA holders can vote now
Passed voting thresholds and is ready for action

column1: Would you like a real-time example of a proposal‚Äôs status from the Trava governance dashboard? I can walk you through how to find and interpret it.",docs,"[{""url"": ""https://docs.trava.finance/user-guide/trava-dao-user-guide"",
content"": ""After being created on-chain, a proposal can have 8 types of statuses:
Pending: signals the waiting period before voting, the community can prepare their voting power during this period.
Active: signals the voting period, anyone can vote For or Against once for each proposal.
Cancel: signals a proposal has been canceled by the SAB or the proposer themselves for some reason.
Succeeded: signals a succeeded proposal, which can only occur when the quorum is reached and the For votes surpass the Against votes.
Queued: signals the delay process for a proposal to be executed after a successful voting period.
Executed: signals all proposal‚Äôs actions have been performed correctly.
Expired: signals a proposal could not be executed for some reason after the delay process.

}]",,,"{ ""number_of_documents"": 5, ""results"": [ { ""content"": ""###
**Proposal Status**
After being created on-chain, a proposal can have 8 types of statuses:
 * Pending: signals the waiting period before voting, the community can prepare their voting power during this period.
 * Active: signals the voting period, anyone can vote For or Against once for each proposal.
 * Cancel: signals a proposal has been canceled by the SAB or the proposer themselves for some reason.
 * Defeated: signals a defeated proposal.
 * Succeeded: signals a succeeded proposal, which can only occur when the quorum is reached and the For votes surpass the Against votes.
 * Queued: signals the delay process for a proposal to be executed after a successful voting period.
 * Executed: signals all proposal‚Äôs actions have been performed correctly.
 * Expired: signals a proposal could not be executed for some reason after the delay process."", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://docs.trava.finance/user-guide/trava-dao-user-guide"", ""rrf_score"": 0.1388888888888889 }, { ""content"": ""The Governance Forum has an important role in the governance process.
The lifetime of a proposal is TRC - Trava Request for Comments => TIP - Trava Improvement Protocol => On-chain Proposal. The discussion & feedback for TRCs and TIPs will occur mostly on the Trava Forum, a topic-focused platform for the Trava community.
Here is the link to our governance forum.

Last updated 2 years ago"", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://docs.trava.finance/governance/governance-forum"", ""rrf_score"": 0.13333333333333333 }, { ""content"": ""Trava Governance module aims to bring the protocol to a new level of decentralization - Trava DAO. This module presents an on-chain governance mechanism, where the Trava community can propose and vote on protocol changes & improvements as a way of participating in the protocol‚Äôs decision-making process.
In the big picture, there are four essential components in Trava Governance: the Trava community, the DAO Committee, the Security Advisory Board (SAB), and Governance Portal & smart contracts.
 * Trava community: The most valuable resource of ideas, discussions & feedback for protocol changes. Everyone can raise their voice & share their opinion on Trava Forum or any community social channels.
 * DAO Committee: The entrusted individuals in the Trava community to submit proposals after a thorough review with discussion & feedback.
 * Security Advisory Board: The guardian for the protocol‚Äôs security when some malicious actions are aimed at the protocol or in unexpected events.
 * Governance Portal & Smart contracts: The autonomous ‚ÄúHand of the King‚Äù consists of governance contracts for on-chain voting and multiple timelocks governing and automating the changes & updates of Trava Ecosystem‚Äôs smart contracts. That keeps the governance process public and transparent to everyone.

This module presents an on-chain governance mechanism, where the Trava community can propose and vote on protocol changes & improvements as a way of participating in the protocol‚Äôs decision-making process.
In the big picture, there are four essential components in Trava Governance: the Trava community, the DAO Committee, the Security Advisory Board (SAB), and Governance Portal & smart contracts.
 * Trava community: The most valuable resource of ideas, discussions & feedback for protocol changes. Everyone can raise their voice & share their opinion on Trava Forum or any community social channels.

Last updated 1 year ago"", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://docs.trava.finance/governance"", ""rrf_score"": 0.09821428571428571 }, { ""content"": ""##
**Mission & Vision**
DAO stands for ‚ÄúDecentralized Autonomous Organization‚Äù. Establishing the development of Trava DAO ensures Trava‚Äôs team mission:
 * A self-governed protocol, powered by the strength of the Trava community & secured smart contracts.
 * The growth of Trava Ecosystem, a decentralized finance platform with stable and outstanding products.


With that mission in mind, Trava DAO will be implemented & takes over centralized processes gradually with the growth of the ecosystem. ##
**Governance v1**
For version 1 of Trava Governance, we present evolution in governance processes with on-chain features enabled. ###
**Governance Process**
The governance process consists of 2 continuous processes: off-chain & on-chain.
 * Off-chain process:


In the off-chain process, anyone in the Trava community can raise their opinions and discuss ideas of how the protocol can improve by creating **TRC - Trava Request for Comments** on the Trava Forum.
After an idea is well-formed, a community member can follow our template for **TIP - Trava Improvement Proposal** and post on the forum for details feedback. We recommend off-chain voting (powered by snapshot.org) to gain exposure and rough consensus from the community to increase the chance of succeeding in the on-chain process.
When a TIP gets to its final version, the **DAO Committee** is in charge of the review process and officially proposes on-chain.
 * On-chain process:


When a TIP is proposed on-chain, it becomes transparent on the public blockchain; anyone possessing voting power can directly **vote for or against** this proposal.
After the voting period, a TIP will be **queued and executed** by the public.
The **Security Advisory Board acts as a guardian** to prevent malicious actions and security exploits in this process. ###
**Governance Authority**
In governance version 1, the DAO will have authority over the Trava lending protocol. The community will have to agree on any significant changes or updates through the on-chain process. ###
**Governance Power**
To gain governance power, holders need to lock their Trava or rTrava token in exchange for the veTRAVA token, which holds voting power. This vote locking mechanism encourages users who show a solid commitment to the protocol with more governance power and incentive.

,How to vote on a proposal?,"According to the Trava Finance documentation, voting on a proposal in Trava DAO requires holding veTRAVA (vote-escrowed TRAVA). Your voting power is proportional to the amount of veTRAVA you hold ‚Äî which is earned by locking TRAVA tokens.
üó≥Ô∏è How to Vote on a Proposal in Trava DAO

If you don‚Äôt have veTRAVA yet, go to Staking ‚Üí Dilution Staking to lock TRAVA

Choose Your Vote Option

,How to navigate the Fortune Mining interface?,"According to the Trava Finance documentation, Fortune Mining is a feature that allows users to stake assets (like TRAVA or LP tokens) and earn rewards through a gamified staking system. The interface is designed to make mining interactive and user-friendly.

Use MetaMask or another Web3 wallet

""content"": ""_To provide users with more services in the Trava Ecosystem, we have planned to implement the Trava minigame series. After the Trava Lottery and Battlehand, the next game ‚Äî Fortune Mining, will be soon published in September 2022._
_This document will walk you through how to join this program._

 _To provide users with more services in the Trava Ecosystem, we have planned to implement the Trava minigame series. After the Trava Lottery and Battlehand, the next game ‚Äî Fortune Mining, will be soon published in September 2022._
_This document will walk you through how to join this program._
_First, access the Fortune Mining program here:_


**The Fortune Mining Interface**
In the main site, you will see the main site as follows. There will be two main sections, including **Event** , **Account** , and **Calculator** , in the upper right corner. 
On the Top of the first tab - Event, you can find some basic information:
  * The rewards the winner got from the previous event.


  * (In the deposit period) The time counting implies the period remaining in the depositing period. (Users need to deposit their tokens in this period to join the program)


  * (In rewards generating period), the time counting implies the period remaining in the rewards generating period, after this period we will reveal the winner. (In this period, players can not withdraw their tokens)


 _To provide users with more services in the Trava Ecosystem, we have planned to implement the Trava minigame series. After the Trava Lottery and Battlehand, the next game ‚Äî Fortune Mining, will be soon published in September 2022._
_This document will walk you through how to join this program._
_First, access the Fortune Mining program here:_


**Deposit token**
To deposit assets in the Trava Fortune mining pool, follow these steps:
**Step 1.** Connect your wallet (on BSC Mainnet)
**Step 2.** Access Fortune Mining.
**Step 3.** Connect your wallet.
**Step 4.** Access the tab ‚ÄúEvent‚Äù.
**Step 5.** Click the ‚ÄúDeposit‚Äù Button.
**Step 6.**
After that, a pop-up window will appear:
  * Click the little down arrow icon and choose the token type you want to deposit
  * Enter the amount you want to deposit
  * Click the ‚Äú**Deposit** ‚Äù button.


**Step 7.**
  * Check the gas fee
  * Confirm the transaction.

  * To check the details, Connect your wallet (on BSC Mainnet), then click the tab Account
  * The ticket number will appear as the picture following.

**Calculate the total rewards for the winner**
Besides some critical information above, we also provide an effective tool to estimate the total rewards that you have a chance to win, called Calculator. To use this tool, follow these simple steps:
**Step 1.** Access the tab Calculator
  * You can see the APY and APR at the time you access this tool.


**Step 2.**
Choose the asset you want by:
  * Click the small down arrow icon in the ‚ÄúAsset‚Äù Section


  * After that, a small window will pop up. Choose the token type that you want.


**Step 3.**
Change the variables such as Time lock, the amount you deposit, and Total deposit by clicking the blank and entering the related numbers.
**Step 4.** Check for some critical information that will help you to make decisions, including the total rewards that a winner can earn and the ROI in case you are the lucky one.

,How to deposit tokens into the Trava Fortune Mining pool?,"To deposit tokens into the Trava Fortune Mining pool, you need to use the Fortune Mining interface on Trava Station. _Points calculation:_ You can earn 25 points for locking at least $10 in the Trava Governance Vault (in the period from 25th July 2022 to 5th August 2022)."", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://blog.trava.finance/trava-finance-1st-anniversary-campaign-d9e85508cedc?source=collection_home_page----75e285c42203-----50-----------------------------------"", ""rrf_score"": 0.1111111111111111 }, { ""content"": ""# **Trava Mini-Game Series**
Published in
3 min readAug 25, 2022
Share
**Introduction To Fortune Mining**
 _To provide users with more services in the Trava Ecosystem, we have planned to implement the Trava minigame series. After the Trava Lottery and Battlehand, the next game ‚Äî Fortune Mining, will be soon published_** _on September 8th 2022._**
Introduction to fortune mining # **What is Fortune Mining?**
As mentioned, this is an important component of the Trava Minigame Series. The game is built on the well-known blockchain idea of the No-loss-rewards game, allowing participants to earn big prizes without worrying about losing their money. # **How does it work?**
**_So how exactly does Fortune Mining work?_**
For more details, users first need to deposit their money into the Fortune Mining Pool. All the rewards from the total deposit will then be distributed to a certain number of lucky users. The more money they deposit, the more chances they will be chosen (based on our algorithm).
That means instead of distributing for all users (based on their deposit amount) as a normal lending pool, the total rewards will be spent to be one big prize for the lucky ones. # **The benefit Fortune Mining brings to players.**"", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://blog.trava.finance/trava-mini-game-series-94dc54b20327"", ""rrf_score"": 0.08333333333333333 }, { ""content"": ""## **_Big prize to look for_**
While there is no loss to be concerned about, the winner may earn significantly more benefits than they would if they had deposited into the regular pool.
**_For example_** , assuming that we run a Fortune Mining pool for users to deposit DAI and gain 20.000 DAI in total deposited after one week. With APY at 1.5% (that is converted to APR at about 0,92%) and APR at 4.08%, respectively, two weeks later, the total reward for the winner will be calculated as:
**_20000*(0.92%+ 4.08%)/365*14 = 38.356 DAI._**
That means if you deposit 100 DAI at first and become the lucky one, you will receive about $38,356 (the interest rate at about 1000%) instead of $0,19 (the interest rate at about 5%).
As in the example above, the gap between the rewards you could get in a normal pool and the Fortune Mining pool is very significant. For that reason, this mini-game will be a good choice for those with small capital to try their luck and get much more money than usual. # **To sum up, what do you need to do to attain the benefits?**
_Step 1._ Deposit your token into the Fortune Mining Pool
 _Step 2._ Waiting for a certain period (depending on each campaign)
_Step 3_. Check the result:
 * If you are the lucky one: Congratulations, you get all the rewards from the pool
 * If you have not been lucky yet, don‚Äôt worry, you can withdraw your deposit or keep them in the pool, then try your luck in the next period.


_Notes: We will soon run a voting snapshot for our community to decide which asset should be put in the Fortune Mining pool. Stay tuned for that._"", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://blog.trava.finance/trava-mini-game-series-94dc54b20327"", ""rrf_score"": 0.0625 } ] }",True,True,True,True,FALSE,False,,,,['https://docs.trava.finance/user-guide/trava-fortune-mining-user-guide'],"['To deposit assets in the Trava Fortune mining pool, follow these steps: Step 1. Connect your wallet (on BSC Mainnet) Step 2. Access Fortune Mining. Step 3. Connect your wallet. Step 4. Access the tab ‚ÄúEvent‚Äù. Step 5. Click the ‚ÄúDeposit‚Äù Button.  Step 6. After that, a pop-up window will appear: Click the little down arrow icon and choose the token type you want to deposit Enter the amount you want to deposit Click the ‚ÄúDeposit‚Äù button.  Step 7. Check the gas fee Confirm the transaction.   ']",0.9078634977340698,0.910051703453064,True,True

Was this helpful?"", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://docs.trava.finance/user-guide/trava-fortune-mining-user-guide"", ""rrf_score"": 0.1388888888888889 }, { ""content"": ""How to join
To take part in the Treasure Map mission, residents of Trava Kingdom must own a Knight in any rarity. The unique feature of this mission is that even Limited Knight can join. Not only can Limited Knights join, but also they can have priority in the opportunity of getting more Tickets as rewards after finishing the Treasure Map mission.
Moreover, as an entrance fee, Knights must have 1 Ticket of any kind to join the Treasure Map mission. But don't worry! The rewards that you receive are worth every cost. *Note: Users also have to pay a very small amount as a transaction fee.
In conclusion, there are two important things that users MUST HAVE to enter Treasure Map Mission: + **1 Knight**(Copper, Silver, Gold, Diamond, Crystal, and Limited Knight) + **1 Ticket**(Counter Ticket, Presale Ticket, and Incentive Ticket)
**NOTE:** You can deploy **as many Knights as you want in the mission at the same time. ONE Knight requires ONE Ticket** to enter. A mission will last for **6 HOURS.**
 

**Rewards**
After finishing the Treasure Map mission, Knight will receive Tickets and EXP as a reward. This is a way for users to gain many Tickets simultaneously at a small price. The maximum number of rewarded Tickets can be up to 6 Tickets/deployed Knight.
As mentioned above, any kind of Knight can join the mission, but the rewards are not the same for every Knight. Higher rarity will have a higher percentage of getting more rewards.
 

**Rewards**
After finishing the Treasure Map mission, Knight will receive Tickets and EXP as a reward. This is a way for users to gain many Tickets simultaneously at a small price. The maximum number of rewarded Tickets can be up to 6 Tickets/deployed Knight.
As mentioned above, any kind of Knight can join the mission, but the rewards are not the same for every Knight. Higher rarity will have a higher percentage of getting more rewards.

**Treasure Map Guidelines**
**Step 1:** Go to the Treasure Map website: https://nft-app.trava.finance/treasure-map
**Step 2:** Connect to your wallet.
**Step 3:** Click on the Deploy button.
**Step 4:** Select your Knight to deploy and click Deploy to confirm the selection
**NOTE:** You can deploy as many Knights as you want.**ONE KNIGHT needs ONE TICKET to Treasure Map.**
**Step 5:** Choose your Ticket as an entrance requirement, then click the Confirm button
**Step 6:** Click Confirm to accept the gas fee amount and allow the transaction to operate
**Step 7:** Wait for a few seconds. A successful notification message will appear on the top of the app.
**Step 8:** You can check your Status by clicking on the View Status button next to the Deploy one. Each Knight will go through a 6-hour mission. After it finishes, it will show as Mission Finished.
**Step 9:** After the mission is finished, you can click on the Mission Finished Knight and select View Report to access the finished mission status.
Then click Confirm the transaction.
**Step 10:** Wait for a few seconds. The mission result will show up on your app.

As defined above, the Trava tickets carry out two primary uses: to exchange and access the Trava Ecosystem.
Specifically, users can buy or sell these tickets on Trava Counter or Ticket Marketplace (the details in the next part) to earn profits from trading activities. In addition, as its name ‚Äî ‚ÄúTicket‚Äù ‚Äî this asset will be needed to participate in various programs in the Trava Ecosystem, including Trava NFT (farming, buying chest, etc.), Trava Lending (governance, bridge, NFT collateralization) or TraDAO, which might be rebranded to Trava Capital (based on community decision).

**Introduction to Trava Ticket**
**What is Trava Ticket?**
A ticket in Trava Finance is an exchangeable asset that allows users to own additional perks or access to products in the Trava Ecosystem.
There are three types of tickets: Counter Ticket, Presale Ticket, and Incentive Ticket. Each has different usages, as described more thoroughly in the next part.
**What is it used for?**
As defined above, the Trava tickets carry out two primary uses: to exchange and access the Trava Ecosystem.
Specifically, users can buy or sell these tickets on Trava Counter or Ticket Marketplace (the details in the next part) to earn profits from trading activities. In addition, as its name ‚Äî ‚ÄúTicket‚Äù ‚Äî this asset will be needed to participate in various programs in the Trava Ecosystem, including Trava NFT (farming, buying chest, etc.), Trava Lending (governance, bridge, NFT collateralization) or TraDAO, which might be rebranded to Trava Capital (based on community decision).
**Trava Counter, Ticket Marketplace, and three types of Ticket**


_Trava Counter and Ticket Marketplace_
Trava Counter and Ticket Marketplace are two platforms for users to exchange tickets. While the former is for trading with the protocol, the latter is for selling or buying peer-to-peer.
Another fundamental difference between these two is the price determination method. - **On Trava Counter:** The counter price increases/decreases depending on the ticket demand but will always be maintained at a minimum of $1. Besides buying tickets, users can also sell these assets to the protocol at 80% of the current counter price. _**In fact, users can benefit from buying tickets and selling them at a higher price. For example, assuming that users buy tickets at 1$, two weeks later, if the current counter price increases to $2 because of the increasing demand, they can earn profits by selling these tickets at 1,6$ (80% of $2) to the protocol. -**_**On the marketplace:** The price will be determined by the sellers and buyers themselves.

In addition, as its name ‚Äî ‚ÄúTicket‚Äù ‚Äî this asset will be needed to participate in various programs in the Trava Ecosystem, including Trava NFT (farming, buying chest, etc.), Trava Lending (governance, bridge, NFT collateralization) or TraDAO, which might be rebranded to Trava Capital (based on community decision).
**Trava Counter, Ticket Marketplace, and three types of Ticket**

**Trava Ticket Utilities**
Ticket will be implemented in the main products of Trava Finance, including Trava Knight NFT, Trava Lending, Trava Capital, and also the MiniGame Series. Moreover, the Ticket can be sold to Trava Protocol or other owners as an exchangeable asset to gain more profit.

**Trava Knight NFT**
In Trava Knight NFT, Trava Ticket can be used in Missions, including Treasure Map and Expedition, as well as an asset to exchange for Chest and receive Armoury to assemble Knights.
In the upcoming feature of Trava Knight NFT, the Treasure Map, Ticket will be utilized as an entrance ticket. Players must have a Ticket to enter the missions in Treasure Map. By joining Treasure Map, users can have the opportunity of earning more Tickets and other rewards.
Moreover, Ticket will boost the success rate in the Expedition feature. When a user has a Ticket, their success rate after finishing a mission in Expedition is much higher. To enter Expedition, users have to pay a small entrance fee, but the rewards are very worthy, especially now with the enhancement of owning a Ticket.
Lastly, the essential utility of Ticket is the capability of exchanging Ticket for Chest and receiving Armoury to build a full Trava Knight. With this utility, users will have chances to enter the Trava Kingdom without paying a large amount of money to buy Knights directly from the Marketplace. Furthermore, with the assembled Knights, users can join in Mission features in Trava Knight NFT, including Farming to gain rewards and EXP, joining Expedition and earn rewards, Incentive Tickets, EXP, etc.
In the future, Tickets will be implemented in the PvP Tournament in Trava Knight NFT. More details are coming soon!
 

**Introduction to Trava Ticket**
**What is Trava Ticket?**
A ticket in Trava Finance is an exchangeable asset that allows users to own additional perks or access to products in the Trava Ecosystem.
There are three types of tickets: Counter Ticket, Presale Ticket, and Incentive Ticket. Each has different usages, as described more thoroughly in the next part.
**What is it used for?**
As defined above, the Trava tickets carry out two primary uses: to exchange and access the Trava Ecosystem.
Specifically, users can buy or sell these tickets on Trava Counter or Ticket Marketplace (the details in the next part) to earn profits from trading activities. In addition, as its name ‚Äî ‚ÄúTicket‚Äù ‚Äî this asset will be needed to participate in various programs in the Trava Ecosystem, including Trava NFT (farming, buying chest, etc.), Trava Lending (governance, bridge, NFT collateralization) or TraDAO, which might be rebranded to Trava Capital (based on community decision).
**Trava Counter, Ticket Marketplace, and three types of Ticket**

**Trava Ticket Utilities**
Ticket will be implemented in the main products of Trava Finance, including Trava Knight NFT, Trava Lending, Trava Capital, and also the MiniGame Series. Moreover, the Ticket can be sold to Trava Protocol or other owners as an exchangeable asset to gain more profit.

**Trava Lending**
With the ownership of Trava Ticket, users will be able to change the time/balance lock in Trava Governance even after you have locked your investment in. Another utility of Ticket in Trava Lending is that users can make use of the Ticket to withdraw rewards in Governance earlier.
Moreover, users can use Ticket to exchange for multiple transactions in Bridge, which helps the transaction process faster and more conveniently. For more details, Ticket owners will have the right to increase the number of transactions in 1 day, the maximum amount of tokens in a transaction/day, and create multiple bridge transactions at the same time‚Ä¶
NFT-collateralized has always been the ultimate goal of Trava Finance. Ticket, an asset with a fixed price range, will become one of the primary collaterals in the Trava ecosystem that users can collateralize to borrow from the system. The Ticket also allows users to have access to Auction/Sell/Buy veTRAVA in the NFT Marketplace as an NFT. These two utilities confirm the crucial position of Ticket in the journey of Trava NFT-collateralized.

**Business Model**

_An overall of the Trava Tickets_
As you can see, there are 3 types of tickets: - _Counter Ticket:_ tickets released by the Trava Counter - _Presale Ticket:_ tickets released from the presale program - _Incentive Ticket:_ rewards users receive when joining Trava programs
Depending on their types, tickets could be sold/bought on Trava Counter or Trava Marketplace. In addition, as mentioned, these tickets can also be used to participate in various programs of Trava Capital, Trava Lending, Trava Knight NFT, Minigame Series, etc.
You can check out more information in the article Introduction to Trava Ticket utilities.

**What is Trava Ticket?**
A ticket in Trava Finance is an exchangeable asset that allows users to own additional perks or access to products in the Trava Ecosystem.
There are three types of tickets: Counter Ticket, Presale Ticket, and Incentive Ticket. Each has different usages, as described more thoroughly in the next part.

In addition, as its name ‚Äî ‚ÄúTicket‚Äù ‚Äî this asset will be needed to participate in various programs in the Trava Ecosystem, including Trava NFT (farming, buying chest, etc.), Trava Lending (governance, bridge, NFT collateralization) or TraDAO, which might be rebranded to Trava Capital (based on community decision).
**Trava Counter, Ticket Marketplace, and three types of Ticket**

**Business Model**

_**Benefit of accessing various products and features in the Trava Ecosystem**_
All tickets of all kinds can be used to access these features.
_**Scenario 1. Applied in Trava Capital:**_ The ticket can be used to _**boost APR**_ _i_ n Trava Capital which will then increase your profit.
_**Scenario 2. Applied in Trava Lending:**_ By owning tickets, you can get much more benefits in Trava Lending, relating to Trava Governance, Trava Bridge, Fortune Mining Pool, and Auction as well as collateral. More specific, using tickets, you can: - Change time/balance lock in Trava Governance - Be allowed to implement multiple transactions in Trava Bridge - Borrow assets with Tickets as NFT-collateralized - Withdraw rewards in Governance earlier - Be able to put veTRAVA on the Auction/Sell/Buy program.
_**Scenario 3. Applied in Trava Knight NFT:**_ Take a look at the diagram that shows how you can apply for Tickets in the Trava Knight NFT programs. 
To be more specific, you can first buy tickets, then use them to exchange for chests. After opening your chests and getting armories, you can either exchange them on the NFT marketplace or continue collecting armories to assemble the Trava NFT Knight. Then, you have multiple options related to trading or to joining missions and minigames. The TRAVA and Incentive tickets you earn can be continuously used to get tickets, then repeatedly enjoy their utilities. And the circulation list goes on.
_To sum up, by owning tickets and optimizing them in various functions in the Trava Ecosystem, you can constantly get benefits thanks to the circular benefit model._

**Ticket for Treasure Map** A utility of Trava Tickets allowing users to access the Trava Treasure Map (1 ticket needed for each term) and earn Reward Tickets
**Ticket in exchange for Chests** One of the most critical utilities of Trava Tickets allowing users to exchange 10 Tickets for one chest
**Ticket Marketplace** A place where users can come to buy or sell Tickets, and it supports peer-to-peer transactions, in which sellers can determine the Ticket prices and buyers can freely choose the suitable prices to buy, and applies the Liquidity Pool mechanism, including swapping and providing liquidity, so that users can gain additional profits.
**Ticket Staking Program** A special 1-month program allowing users to stake presale tickets and earn high rewards with APR from 150% to 1500%
**Ticket/TRAVA** Pool A liquidity pool in the Ticket Marketplace allowing users to provide liquidity or swap TRAVA and Tickets 
**Trava Counter** A place where users can buy/sell Counter Tickets to the protocol at 80% of the current counter price and sell Incentive Tickets. The counter price increases/decreases depending on the ticket demand but will always be maintained at a minimum of $1. 
**Trava Ticket** An exchangeable asset that allows users to own additional perks or access to products in the Trava Ecosystem.Trava Ticket for 
**Trava Bridge** An important utility of Trava Tickets allowing users to optimize their cross-chain transaction (TRAVA) by increasing the limitation of the transacted tokens (per transaction and per day)

,How to check the rewards you have received?,"According to the Trava Finance documentation, you can check your earned rewards from Fortune Mining or other staking activities directly through the Trava Station dashboard.
