}]",,,"{ ""number_of_documents"": 5, ""results"": [ { ""content"": ""##
Checking profile
Click on your account number to access the profile page:
On the profile page, you will know the information about your level, the amount of rewards earned and claimed, the number of people referred, and your quiz packages organized by their status:
 * Pending (your finished quiz packages waiting to end)
 * Claimable (your quiz packages that ended but you have not received the reward)
 * Claimed (your quiz packages that you have received rewards)
 * Lost (quiz packages for which you do not receive a reward) ##
Rewards Mechanism
You can read more details about the rewards mechanism of the Pottery here. ###
Vesting Pool
This includes 40% of Pottery‚Äôs total reward, which you can claim daily (24 hours), with the amount depending on the number of friends you have successfully invited to join Pottery. All you have to do is click on ‚ÄúVesting Pool‚Äù on the Profile page, then the ‚ÄúClaim‚Äù button."", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://docs.trava.finance/user-guide/trava-pottery-user-guide"", ""rrf_score"": 0.15476190476190477 }, { ""content"": ""###
Leaderboard
At the bottom are the ‚ÄúLeaderboard‚Äù section, with time left in the counting period, and FAQ. They will have the following look if you have connected your Wallet:
You can click the ‚ÄúClaim‚Äù button to get your reward:"", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://docs.trava.finance/user-guide/trava-pottery-user-guide"", ""rrf_score"": 0.12179487179487179 }, { ""content"": ""###
**Merge** veTRAVA
1. Select 2 veTRAVA tokens to merge together. veTRAVA with **Released** status can‚Äôt be merged.
2. Claim all claimable rewards of 2 veTRAVA tokens.
3. Click **Merge.**
4. Recheck your veTRAVA info and click **Merge** to preview merge result.
5. Click **Confirm.**
6. Your wallet notification will appear, you check again the total amount and gas fee. If they are right, click **Confirm.** ###
**Claim rewards**
**1.** Click **Claim.**
**2.** Your wallet notification will appear, you check again the total amount and gas fee. If they are right, click**Confirm.** ###
**Withdraw veTRAVA**
**1.** Claim all your claimable rewards.
**2.** Your wallet notification will appear, you check again the total amount and gas fee. If they are right, click**Confirm.**"", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://docs.trava.finance/user-guide/trava-dao-user-guide"", ""rrf_score"": 0.10795454545454546 }, { ""content"": ""_To provide users with more services in the Trava Ecosystem, we have planned to implement the Trava minigame series. After the Trava Lottery and Battlehand, the next game ‚Äî Fortune Mining, will be soon published in September 2022._
_This document will walk you through how to join this program._
_First, access the Fortune Mining program here:_ ##
**The Fortune Mining Interface**
In the main site, you will see the main site as follows. There will be two main sections, including **Event** , **Account** , and **Calculator** , in the upper right corner. 
On the Top of the first tab - Event, you can find some basic information:
 * The rewards the winner got from the previous event.


 * (In the deposit period) The time counting implies the period remaining in the depositing period. (Users need to deposit their tokens in this period to join the program)


 * (In rewards generating period), the time counting implies the period remaining in the rewards generating period, after this period we will reveal the winner. (In this period, players can not withdraw their tokens) ##
**Deposit token**
To deposit assets in the Trava Fortune mining pool, follow these steps:
**Step 1.** Connect your wallet (on BSC Mainnet)
**Step 2.** Access Fortune Mining.
**Step 3.** Connect your wallet.
**Step 4.** Access the tab ‚ÄúEvent‚Äù.
**Step 5.** Click the ‚ÄúDeposit‚Äù Button.
**Step 6.**
After that, a pop-up window will appear:
 * Click the little down arrow icon and choose the token type you want to deposit
 * Enter the amount you want to deposit
 * Click the ‚Äú**Deposit** ‚Äù button.


**Step 7.**
 * Check the gas fee
 * Confirm the transaction. ##
**Check for the Ticket you get after depositing**
 _After depositing tokens into the Fortune Mining pool, users will receive a certain amount that corresponds with the deposit amount (ratio 1:1). (The more they deposit, the more ticket they own):_
 * To check the details, Connect your wallet (on BSC Mainnet), then click the tab Account
 * The ticket number will appear as the picture following. ##
**Checking for the rewards you have received**
**Step 1.** Connect your wallet (on BSC mainnet)**.**
**Step 2.** Go to the tab ‚ÄúAccount‚Äù.
**Step 3.** Go to the table named ‚ÄúMy rewards‚Äù.
**Step 4.** Check for the related information: Total rewards in Deposited token and rTRAVA, launching time. ##
**Check for the chance of winning**
**Step 1.** Connect your wallet (on BSC Mainnet)
**Step 2.** Access tab ‚ÄúEvent‚Äù.
**Step 3.** Go to the table named ‚ÄúDepositors‚Äù.
**Step 4.** Check for the related information:
 * Depositors‚Äô wallet address
 * Their deposit amount
 * Their chance (show in percentage) to win. ##
**Check for the past events**
**Step 1.** Access tab ‚ÄúEvent‚Äù.
 * Go to the table named ‚ÄúPast Events‚Äù
 * A List of events with their launching time, total rewards, etc. will appear.


**Step 3.** To check the details, click the name of the events:
 * A Pop-up window will appear, which shows the basic information: start-end time, total deposit, total rewards, winner, etc."", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://docs.trava.finance/user-guide/trava-fortune-mining-user-guide"", ""rrf_score"": 0.09401709401709402 }, { ""content"": ""###
Referral system
Basically, its mechanism is that those who invite friends and the friends themselves will receive a reward distributed from the referral fund, which is 10% of the total reward. In addition, the number of referees will have an impact on the percentage of rewards you can claim from the vesting pool, which has been discussed in the previous section. ####
Referring friends
Click the ‚ÄúCreate code‚Äù button on your Profile page, and you will be asked for a gas fee to continue (this is just an example if you use Metamask).
After that you can send the code to your friends ‚Äì these referees will bring you additional rewards and some other benefits. When they use your code, your friends will appear in the referral list: ####
As the referee
If you are a referee, help the one who referred you and yourself get rewards by entering their address. After pressing ‚ÄúEnter code‚Äù button, the following interface will appear:

Besides some critical information above, we also provide an effective tool to estimate the total rewards that you have a chance to win, called Calculator. To use this tool, follow these simple steps:

How to manage your own pool"", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://docs.trava.finance/user-guide/trava-pool-creation-user-guide"", ""rrf_score"": 0.08333333333333333 }, { ""content"": ""## **_Big prize to look for_**
While there is no loss to be concerned about, the winner may earn significantly more benefits than they would if they had deposited into the regular pool.
**_For example_** , assuming that we run a Fortune Mining pool for users to deposit DAI and gain 20.000 DAI in total deposited after one week. With APY at 1.5% (that is converted to APR at about 0,92%) and APR at 4.08%, respectively, two weeks later, the total reward for the winner will be calculated as:
**_20000*(0.92%+ 4.08%)/365*14 = 38.356 DAI._**
That means if you deposit 100 DAI at first and become the lucky one, you will receive about $38,356 (the interest rate at about 1000%) instead of $0,19 (the interest rate at about 5%).
As in the example above, the gap between the rewards you could get in a normal pool and the Fortune Mining pool is very significant. For that reason, this mini-game will be a good choice for those with small capital to try their luck and get much more money than usual. # **To sum up, what do you need to do to attain the benefits?**
_Step 1._ Deposit your token into the Fortune Mining Pool
 _Step 2._ Waiting for a certain period (depending on each campaign)
_Step 3_. Check the result:
 * If you are the lucky one: Congratulations, you get all the rewards from the pool
 * If you have not been lucky yet, don‚Äôt worry, you can withdraw your deposit or keep them in the pool, then try your luck in the next period.


_Notes: We will soon run a voting snapshot for our community to decide which asset should be put in the Fortune Mining pool. Stay tuned for that._"", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://blog.trava.finance/trava-mini-game-series-94dc54b20327"", ""rrf_score"": 0.07916666666666666 }, { ""content"": ""Following the Reward mechanism, 40% of users' rewards will be put in the vesting pool and be claimed gradually.

**The Fortune Mining Interface**
In the main site, you will see the main site as follows. There will be two main sections, including **Event** , **Account** , and **Calculator** , in the upper right corner. 
On the Top of the first tab - Event, you can find some basic information:
 * The rewards the winner got from the previous event.


 * (In the deposit period) The time counting implies the period remaining in the depositing period. (Users need to deposit their tokens in this period to join the program)


 * (In rewards generating period), the time counting implies the period remaining in the rewards generating period, after this period we will reveal the winner. (In this period, players can not withdraw their tokens) ##
**Deposit token**
To deposit assets in the Trava Fortune mining pool, follow these steps:
**Step 1.** Connect your wallet (on BSC Mainnet)
**Step 2.** Access Fortune Mining.
**Step 3.** Connect your wallet.
**Step 4.** Access the tab ‚ÄúEvent‚Äù.
**Step 5.** Click the ‚ÄúDeposit‚Äù Button.
**Step 6.**
After that, a pop-up window will appear:
 * Click the little down arrow icon and choose the token type you want to deposit
 * Enter the amount you want to deposit
 * Click the ‚Äú**Deposit** ‚Äù button.


**Step 7.**
 * Check the gas fee
 * Confirm the transaction. ##
**Check for the Ticket you get after depositing**
 _After depositing tokens into the Fortune Mining pool, users will receive a certain amount that corresponds with the deposit amount (ratio 1:1). (The more they deposit, the more ticket they own):_
 * To check the details, Connect your wallet (on BSC Mainnet), then click the tab Account
 * The ticket number will appear as the picture following. ##
**Checking for the rewards you have received**
**Step 1.** Connect your wallet (on BSC mainnet)**.**
**Step 2.** Go to the tab ‚ÄúAccount‚Äù.
**Step 3.** Go to the table named ‚ÄúMy rewards‚Äù.
**Step 4.** Check for the related information: Total rewards in Deposited token and rTRAVA, launching time. ##
**Check for the chance of winning**
**Step 1.** Connect your wallet (on BSC Mainnet)
**Step 2.** Access tab ‚ÄúEvent‚Äù.
**Step 3.** Go to the table named ‚ÄúDepositors‚Äù.
**Step 4.** Check for the related information:
 * Depositors‚Äô wallet address
 * Their deposit amount
 * Their chance (show in percentage) to win. ##
**Check for the past events**
**Step 1.** Access tab ‚ÄúEvent‚Äù.
 * Go to the table named ‚ÄúPast Events‚Äù
 * A List of events with their launching time, total rewards, etc. will appear.


**Step 3.** To check the details, click the name of the events:

**Normal Farming**
We officially stop distributing TRAVA rewards and the normal Farming mechanism only distributes EXP at 3 P.M UTC on May 15th 2022.
**Rarity**
**Copper**

Please note that APR can be changed according to NFT Marketplace conditions. We will recalculate and update the price based on the price on the market, the initial price and the data analysis extracted from our NFT Marketplace.
**Note that** with each wallet, the maximum number of Trava Knight NFT that can be deposited in**one vault** is **one** Knight NFT. For example, if you have two Trava Knight NFTs of Gold, for example, you can only stake one of them into Gold Vault to farm and earn $TRAVA rewards.
_**With Copper, Silver and Gold Vault, if NFT owners withdraw their NFTs within 7 days, the farming rewards will decrease by 10%.**_
Knights with a higher rarity can be deposited in vaults of a lower rarity. Continuing the example above, one of your Gold Knights can be deposited in Gold vault and the other can be deposited in either Copper vault or Silver vault and earn APR corresponding to those vaults.
Furthermore, for Knight NFTs put in Farming vaults, we shall use the ""Polish Mechanism‚Äù. After depositing Knight NFTs in those vaults, users must check their Knights on a regular basis through the Farming site, which is considered a polishing action. If users never check their Knights, the Glossiness of their Knights will deteriorate, and the Farming rewards will drop. So, to maintain the rewards from Knight NFTs, NFT owners must perform ""polishing"" action, which means check their NFTs in the vaults regularly. ###
**Formula to calculate Farming rewards**
 _**How to calculate the rewards for Copper, Silver and Gold Vaults?**_
Each vault has a value called _emissionPerSecond_. This is a fixed amount that all depositors will be rewarded when they deposit NFT per second. Therefore, the fewer number of people staking NFT, the more rewards each staker will get.
_**How to calculate the rewards for Diamond and Crystal Vaults?**_
The Glossiness of each NFT starts off at 100%, but it gradually decreases over time, affecting the incentives received when users deposit their NFTs in the vault. Users must complete ""Polishing"" acts in order to receive 100% of the rewards.
The amount of reward from NFT polishing shall be calculated using 2 parameters: _decayRate_ and _decayInterval_. Concretely, after a _decayInterval_ (a certain amount of time), if the NFT is not polished, the rewards for the next _decayInterval_ will be reduced (_decayRate_ , calculated in % will decrease)
For example: _decayInterval_ = 2 days and _decayRate_ = 10% indicates that: every two days without polishing, the rewards of the next day will be reduced (due to the NFT glossiness). Hence, after 20 days, the amount of rewards for NFT will be 0.
If you stake NFT for a period _t_ = 9, the amount of incentives that you probably get is 450 Trava (On average per day you will get 450/9 = 50). However, you have forgotten to polish for 9 days. Then, the amount of rewards you receive is only 370 Trava. The amount of incentive you get is described as below:
**Minus Rewards**
10%
10%
20%
20%
30%
30%
40%
**Remaining Rewards(TRAVA)**
The detailed calculation us as follows: (X is the rewards NFT depositor will receive after t days)
The average rewards each day NFT staker will receive:
m=m = \frac{X}{t}
Number of _decayInterval_ that depositor have to go through:
n=tdecayIntervaln = \frac{t}{decayInterval}decayInterval‚Äã
The result of this calculation will be rounded down.
 * If n < , the rewards depositor will receive is: m t = X
 * If n 1decayInterval\frac{1}{decayInterval}decayInterval‚Äã


The percentage of minus rewards you get at the end of decayInterval period:
p=(n‚àí1)‚àódecayRatep = ( n - 1) *decayRatedecayRate
The total amount of incentives you will receive:
m‚àó[(2‚àíp)‚àón‚àódecayInterval2+(t‚àín‚àódacayInterval)‚àó(1‚àíp‚àídecayRate)]m *[ (2 - p ) * n * \frac{decayInterval}{2} + (t - n * dacayInterval) * (1 - p - decayRate) ]decayInterval‚Äã+dacayInterval)‚àódecayRate)]
 * If 1decayRate\frac{1}{decayRate} decayRate‚Äã< n:


The total amount of rewards you get:
m‚àó(1decayRate+1)‚àódecayInterval2m * (\frac{1}{decayRate} + 1 )* \frac{decayInterval} {2} (decayRate‚Äã+decayInterval‚Äã
In the above example, we have _X = 450, t = 9_
We can calculate: _m = 50, n = 4, p= 0.3_
Put into the formula, we get:
50‚àó[(2‚àí0.3)‚àó4‚àó+(9‚àí4‚àó2)‚àó(1‚àí0.3‚àí0.1)]=37050 * [(2 - 0.3) * 4 * \frac{2}{2} + (9 - 4 * 2) * (1 -0.3 -0.1) ] = 3700.3)‚àó0.1)]= ##
**Heuristic Farming (Farming based on EXP)**
When the new Farming mechanism commences, _**our 5 current Farming vaults will stop distributing TRAVA as reward**_ , which means our 5 existing vaults will only give back EXP (one EXP for each second in 5 current farming vaults). This change supports NFT owners to gain EXP to enter Heuristic Farming with better rewards.
In the new Farming mechanism, we provide 5 more vaults for Heuristic Farming, and you can deposit as many knights as you want into each Vault, provided that those knights have the same rarity as that Vault. Rewards from Heuristic Farming are **rTRAVA tokens and EXP** (one EXP for every 3 seconds in the vault). The higher EXP, the higher the APR, the higher the rTRAVA reward.
**Normal Farming**
**Heuristic Farming**
Number of vaults
5 vaults corresponding to 5 rarities
5 vaults corresponding to 5 rarities
Number of Knights allowed in one vault
1 Knight
1 Knight
Reward in tokens
None
rTRAVA
EXP reward
One EXP is released for each second Knights in the vaults
One EXP is released for 3 second Knights in the vaults
With the new and improved mechanism, the EXP points are a crucial element in the development of the Trava Knight NFT journey. Like the current Farming mechanism, Heuristic Farming also has a Polishing mechanism. The polishing mechanism in Heuristic Farming helps NFT owners maintain 100% rewards and supports increasing EXP and APY.
Note that, Knights with 0 EXP still gain rewards from Heuristic Farming. Moreover, with rTRAVA from Heuristic Farming, users can auto-stake in our rTRAVA with no locking period in our Staking Program. rTRAVA then can be locked in Trava Governance vault to gain locking power as veTRAVA and earn more rewards. ###
**Calculation Formula of Emission Per Second**
From now on, the eps will automatically change depending on the number of Knight NFTs and their EXP. For particular, the equation is demonstrated as below:
With the following parameters:
_eps: Emission Per Second_
 _x: The number of Knights in the vault_
 _X: The starting eps_
 _Y: The maximum eps that can be reached_
 _Z: The eps will converge, when the number of Knight NFTs increases in the vault_
 _m: The number of Knight NFTs in the vault that own eps reaches the maximum rate (Y)_
_u:__is calculated as_
 _a: is calculated as_
a=2‚àó‚àó(m‚àí1)a = 2 * \frac{Y - Z}{u + 1} * (m-1)‚Äã‚àó
 _b: is calculated as_
b=u‚àó(m‚àí1)b = \frac{u}{u + 1} * (m-1)
_c: is calculated as_
c=(c = (\frac{m-1}{u + 1})^{2} (‚Äã
For example, We have the following parameters:
The starting eps is 100 Trava/s
 _X_ = 100
The maximum eps is 400 Trava/s at the rate of 1000 NFTs
 _Y = 400_
 _m = 1000_
The eps will converge at 250 Trava/s when the number of NFTs passes
 _Z_ = 250
The chart is presented as below:
From the chart, we can see that when there are little NFTs in the vault then the eps is low, and continuously increases when the number of NFTs in the vault reaches a certain rate. After that, the eps start to decrease and converge to a certain rate. ###
**Calculation Value of NFT**
The value of NFT depends on its EXP:
For specific, the formula is calculated as below:
value=86400+100value = \frac{exp}{86400} + 100value=86400‚Äã+
_Note_ :
_exp:_ EXP of the NFT
 _value:_ The Value of the NFT
For example:
With NFT that has _**0 EXP**_ : Its Value will be _**100**_
With NFT has _**864000 EXP**_ : Its Value will be _**110**_
With NFT has _**8640000 EXP**_ : Its Value will be _**200**_
Because, in every 3 seconds, the NFT can earn 1 EXP, the NFT needs 259200 seconds or almost 3 days to increase 1 Value.
**NOTE:** In order not to waste BNB, users should Polish the NFT in at least 3 days. ###
APR Calculation Formula for NFT
APR of a Knight NFT depends on 4 elements:
eps: Emission Per Second
value: The EXP Value of Knight
totalValue: The Total Value of the total number of Knights in Vault
price: The price of Knight based on the weekly recalculation
 _**For specific, the formula is:**_
APR=eps‚àóvaluetotalValue‚àóprice‚àó24‚àó60‚àó60‚àó365‚àó100%APR = \frac{eps * value}{totalValue*price} *24*60*60*365*100\%totalValue‚àópriceeps‚àóvalue‚Äã‚àó100%
_**For example,**_ there are 4 Knight NFTs with the similar rarity in 1 vault with the EXP in turn of 0, 86400, 864000, 8640000.

,How to withdraw tokens from Fortune Mining?,"To withdraw tokens from Fortune Mining on Trava Finance, you need to interact with the Fortune Mining section on Trava Station. After any lock-up period ends, you can withdraw your staked tokens and optionally claim any unclaimed rewards.
üîì How to Withdraw Tokens from Fortune Mining

column3: Go to Trava Station
Connect Your Wallet
Use MetaMask or another Web3 wallet
Make sure you‚Äôre on the BNB Chain
Navigate to ‚ÄúFortune Mining‚Äù
Scroll to ‚ÄúYour Position‚Äù or ‚ÄúYour Stake‚Äù
You‚Äôll see:
Tokens staked
Current rewards
Unlock status or countdown (if still locked)
Click ‚ÄúWithdraw‚Äù
If your lock-up period has expired, the ‚ÄúWithdraw‚Äù button will be enabled
Click it and confirm the transaction in your wallet
‚úÖ Tokens Are Returned to Your Wallet
Your original staked tokens will be transferred back
You can also claim any unclaimed rewards separately (if not auto-claimed)

column2: You cannot withdraw before the lock expires
Claim rewards manually before or after withdrawing
Some pools may allow partial withdrawals; others may require full exit
You‚Äôll need a small amount of BNB to cover gas

column1: Always check your staking status before attempting to withdraw ‚Äî especially during time-locked events or high APR reward phases.

Would you like help setting a reminder when your lock-up expires, or guidance on whether it‚Äôs better to restake or exit based on your reward curve?","To withdraw your tokens from Fortune Mining on Trava Finance, you simply need to use the ‚ÄúWithdraw‚Äù or ‚ÄúUnstake‚Äù function in the mining pool where you staked TRAVA. Once withdrawn, your tokens will return to your connected wallet, and reward accumulation will stop.
üîì Step-by-Step: How to Withdraw from Fortune Mining

column3: Visit: https://app.trava.finance
Click on ‚ÄúFortune Mining‚Äù in the top or side menu
This takes you to all active and ended mining pools
Use MetaMask, WalletConnect, etc.
Make sure you are on the BNB Smart Chain (BSC)

column1: ‚úÖ 4. Find the Pool You Participated In

column3: Look under the ‚ÄúActive Pools‚Äù section
Click on the pool you deposited into to view details
Inside the pool details, locate the ‚ÄúWithdraw‚Äù button (sometimes labeled ‚ÄúUnstake‚Äù)
Enter the amount of TRAVA you want to withdraw, or click ‚ÄúMax‚Äù
Click ‚ÄúWithdraw‚Äù and confirm the transaction in your wallet
Pay a small BNB gas fee

column1: üéØ If the pool has locking rules or vesting, make sure the lock duration has ended before you can withdraw.

column3: Once confirmed, your TRAVA tokens will be returned to your wallet
You can check your balance in MetaMask or BscScan

_This document will walk you through how to join this program._
_First, access the Fortune Mining program here:_ ##
**The Fortune Mining Interface**
In the main site, you will see the main site as follows. There will be two main sections, including **Event** , **Account** , and **Calculator** , in the upper right corner. 
On the Top of the first tab - Event, you can find some basic information:
 * The rewards the winner got from the previous event.


 * (In the deposit period) The time counting implies the period remaining in the depositing period. (Users need to deposit their tokens in this period to join the program)


 * (In rewards generating period), the time counting implies the period remaining in the rewards generating period, after this period we will reveal the winner. (In this period, players can not withdraw their tokens) ##
**Deposit token**
To deposit assets in the Trava Fortune mining pool, follow these steps:
**Step 1.** Connect your wallet (on BSC Mainnet)
**Step 2.** Access Fortune Mining.
**Step 3.** Connect your wallet.
**Step 4.** Access the tab ‚ÄúEvent‚Äù.
**Step 5.** Click the ‚ÄúDeposit‚Äù Button.
**Step 6.**
After that, a pop-up window will appear:
 * Click the little down arrow icon and choose the token type you want to deposit
 * Enter the amount you want to deposit
 * Click the ‚Äú**Deposit** ‚Äù button.


**Step 7.**
 * Check the gas fee
 * Confirm the transaction. ##
**Check for the Ticket you get after depositing**
 _After depositing tokens into the Fortune Mining pool, users will receive a certain amount that corresponds with the deposit amount (ratio 1:1). (The more they deposit, the more ticket they own):_
 * To check the details, Connect your wallet (on BSC Mainnet), then click the tab Account
 * The ticket number will appear as the picture following. ##
**Checking for the rewards you have received**
**Step 1.** Connect your wallet (on BSC mainnet)**.**
**Step 2.** Go to the tab ‚ÄúAccount‚Äù.
**Step 3.** Go to the table named ‚ÄúMy rewards‚Äù.
**Step 4.** Check for the related information: Total rewards in Deposited token and rTRAVA, launching time. ##
**Check for the chance of winning**
**Step 1.** Connect your wallet (on BSC Mainnet)
**Step 2.** Access tab ‚ÄúEvent‚Äù.
**Step 3.** Go to the table named ‚ÄúDepositors‚Äù.
**Step 4.** Check for the related information:
 * Depositors‚Äô wallet address
 * Their deposit amount
 * Their chance (show in percentage) to win. ##
**Check for the past events**
**Step 1.** Access tab ‚ÄúEvent‚Äù.
 * Go to the table named ‚ÄúPast Events‚Äù
 * A List of events with their launching time, total rewards, etc. will appear.


**Step 3.** To check the details, click the name of the events:
 * A Pop-up window will appear, which shows the basic information: start-end time, total deposit, total rewards, winner, etc."", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://docs.trava.finance/user-guide/trava-fortune-mining-user-guide"", ""rrf_score"": 0.08571428571428572 } ] }",True,True,True,True,FALSE,False,,,,['https://docs.trava.finance/user-guide/trava-fortune-mining-user-guide'],"['After a certain period of stage 2 - generating rewards, users can get back their deposit or keep them in the pool to try their luck the next time. Choose the token types you want to withdraw by: Click the little down arrow icon Click the name of the tokens. Step 5. Enter the number of tokens you want to withdraw. Published in
3 min readJul 24, 2022
Share
Introduction to BRicher Investment Portfolio
 _BRicher is a unique aggregator that composes multiple investment methods: Providing liquidity, swapping, staking, depositing, and borrowing in the lending pools. BRicher can automatically build up the most optimized strategies for users to maximize their profit._
_For the continuous development of BRicher, we implement the new and innovative function ‚Äî_** _Investment Portfolio_** _, which gathers and analyzes users‚Äô investment data from various DApps. As a result, while similar apps show users‚Äô balances only, BRicher helps users effectively manage their total assets (balance, loans, deposits) and shows comprehensive information about their investment on various DApps; all are displayed in a single place._
 
**What problem does BRicher Investment Portfolio tend to solve, and what do users gain from it?**
DApps and tokens come in a wide variety due to the size of the DeFi world. If investors put their money into different DApps, It would be challenging for them to:
 * Grasp the total value of tokens in their balance and the total amount of their deposits and borrows.
 * Keep track of the ecosystems/protocols they are borrowing/depositing and their financial performance.


In addition, unmanageable and complicated information storage also leads to difficulties in making the right and quick decision, which plays a significant role in the blockchain world.
**_Investment Portfolio is therefore designed to address these issues and provide consumers with the following benefits:_**
 * Keep track of the fluctuation in their balance, loans, deposits, and total assets.
 * Monitor investment processes in different protocols and easily compare the investments‚Äô capital, return, and ROI.
 * Get notifications and warnings when opening the portfolio pages. In the latter version, such warnings will be available via email and Telegram.


 
**What differentiates BRicher‚Äôs investment portfolio from others?**
_To solve the existing problems and give users the best user experience, we provide them with the following distinctive features:_
 
**What differentiates BRicher‚Äôs investment portfolio from others?**
_To solve the existing problems and give users the best user experience, we provide them with the following distinctive features:_

**Calculation of Balance, loans, deposits, and total assets**
It is easy to check the balance, but almost all investors have problems managing their loans, deposits, and total assets. BRicher addresses these problems and calculates these parameters for them. Information is designed and presented in an elegant manner so that the investors can easily get insights.
 
**What differentiates BRicher‚Äôs investment portfolio from others?**
_To solve the existing problems and give users the best user experience, we provide them with the following distinctive features:_

**Collects and displays key metrics related to users‚Äô investing plans across different DApps.**
As usual, users have to go to each DApps and look up the needed information which is inconvenient and time-consuming. However, with BRicher, all these data are collected and displayed in the same place. As a result, users can easily compare the amount of money locked, the claimable bonuses, the current ROI, and the historical ROI of each investment strategy.
Bricher currently classifies two investment options related to lending pools and staking vaults. Depending on the option type, more detailed information will be presented when the user clicks on a specific option. For example, with a lending pool, they can see the total borrows, deposits, deposited and borrowed tokens, health factors, etc."", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://blog.trava.finance/introduction-to-brichers-investment-portfolio-5032d7598ff7?source=collection_home_page----75e285c42203-----49-----------------------------------"", ""rrf_score"": 0.15476190476190477 }, { ""content"": ""_BRicher is a unique aggregator that composes multiple investment methods: providing liquidity, swapping, staking, depositing, and borrowing in the lending pools._

BRicher includes three main pages: Home, Strategy Exploring and Portfolio.


**Home page introduction**
The _Home_ page lists the best one-step investment strategies for all tokens supported by BRicher. Information on each strategy, such as its current ROI, ROI history, transaction fee and reward tokens are shown in the table. In addition, you can select a row to get detailed information on the respective strategy.
At the right upper corner of the page, you can enter your favorite token to filter strategies.
To sort the strategies, you can press on the table headers.

Website: https://app.trava.finance/bricher/
BRicher includes three main pages: Home, Strategy Exploring and Portfolio.


**Strategy Exploring**
In this section, you can search for high-return investment strategies based on your input tokens. Every time you access this page, BRicher automatically calculates and presents the best strategies to you.
**Step 1.** To use the Strategy Exploring page, you must connect and authenticate your wallet first:**-** Click the ‚ÄúConnect wallet‚Äù button, choose a wallet, enter your password and confirm. - Then click the ‚ÄúAuthenticate‚Äù button.
**Step 2.** Select the token you prefer to invest in by clicking one option under the line ‚ÄúSelect token to invest‚Äù.
**Step 3.** Select ‚ÄúMore setting‚Äù to filter the recommended strategies
 * First, you can sort strategies by safety index, ROI, or the number of steps of the strategies.


 * You can also set the limit for the number of steps used in your strategies. Strategies with a low number of steps are typically safer, but strategies with a high number of steps are usually more profitable.


 * By default, recommended strategies are automatically composed of all yield farming methods. If you do not like a specific method, please deselect it.


 * Some vaults/pools offer very high ROI, and they thus dominate the recommended strategies. To explore the other strategies that DO NOT include these vaults/pools, you can add the reward tokens of the vaults/pools to the control.


**Step 4.** Click the ‚ÄúMake strategies‚Äù button
 * Our algorithm will automatically compute and return appropriate strategies to you. You should pay more attention to the strategy title (which includes names of used DApps), the safety index, the number of steps, and the Return On Investment rate.

BRicher includes three main pages: Home, Strategy Exploring and Portfolio.


**Make Investment**
After exploring the recommended strategies, if you are interested in a strategy, please click its _‚ÄúCheck detail and Invest‚Äù_ button.
BRicher will show general information on the strategy, such as its start and expiration date, reward tokens, estimated gas, ROI history, etc.
BRicher also displays all helpful information on each step. The relevant information is shown depending on the type of method used in the step (staking, depositing, borrowing, providing liquidity pair, swapping). All of them are real-time data collected by BRicher that can save time in making decisions.
There are three methods to make a strategy: manual investing, semi-auto investing and auto investing. The basic difference between these three is the level that BRicher supports you to make your investment.
 * Manual Investing: You need to access each DApps to implement each step by yourself.
 * Semi-auto Investing: You only need to stay on the BRicher site, and for each step, you simply click on an ‚ÄúExecute‚Äù button. 
 * Auto Investing: All you need to do is click on one button to authorize BRicher to complete the whole process.

There are three methods to make a strategy: manual investing, semi-auto investing and auto investing. The basic difference between these three is the level that BRicher supports you to make your investment.
 * Manual Investing: You need to access each DApps to implement each step by yourself.
 * Semi-auto Investing: You only need to stay on the BRicher site, and for each step, you simply click on an ‚ÄúExecute‚Äù button. 
 * Auto Investing: All you need to do is click on one button to authorize BRicher to complete the whole process.

**Step 2.** Click the ‚ÄúManual invest‚Äù button
Once you do that, BRicher will save your strategies so that you can monitor the strategy‚Äôs effectiveness (the capital, the interest, the reward token, the ROIs, etc.)
You can check the detailed guideline which shows you how to invest step by step as below:

Introduction to BRicher‚Äôs new functions
 _BRicher is a unique aggregator that composes multiple investment methods: providing liquidity, swapping, staking, depositing, and borrowing in the lending pools._
_In summary, these composite strategies are automatically built so that users can get the most optimized one to maximize their profit. Moreover, unlike other aggregators, BRicher lets investors own their tokens so that they can take complete control of capital and investment plans._
 
The first version of BRicher
In the first version, BRicher provided users with effective investment strategies with high returns and helped them keep track of their diaries (ROI and other critical parameters).
_An investment strategy suggested by BRicher_
However, the problem is that after discovering their best investment suggestion, users need to implement all the investing processes by themself, which is significantly time-consuming. Additionally, some ‚Äúnewbies‚Äù unfamiliar with various DApps may find it challenging to accomplish complicated operations independently.
To address these problems and provide users with more optimized options, we would like to offer new functions: Auto Investing and Semi-auto Investing.
As their name ‚Äî ‚ÄúAuto‚Äù- these two new functions will automatically simplify the investment process and save investors much time.
 
Introduction to Semi-auto Investing function
 
Introduction to Semi-auto Investing function

** _What is the Semi-auto Investing function?_**
_Semi-auto Investing is a new feature that allows users to finish different stages of the investment strategies directly on the BRicher interface rather than on other DApps._
In more detail, recommended strategies usually consist of several steps, each with smaller operations. Performing all of these tasks in multiple DApps can be challenging and time-consuming.
In this case, the Semi-auto Investing function supports users effectively by allowing them to gradually execute the strategies on only one site ‚Äî BRicher. That means even though users still need to invest step by step, there will be one button for each stage on BRicher‚Äôs interface for them to click on and complete the process easier.
 
Introduction to Semi-auto Investing function

**_What benefit does it bring to users?_**
 * It is much more convenient than the Manual Investing feature, which requires users to access each DApps and execute the required steps.
 * Investors can control and keep track of each step of the investment implementation. That helps them to deeply understand the progress and, more importantly, make the modification in each step (cancel, for example) if necessary.


 
Introduction to Auto Investing function.
 
Introduction to Auto Investing function.

**_What is the Auto Investing function?_**
Upgraded from Semi-auto Investing, the Auto investing function requires users nothing but to click one only button. By doing that, the user authorizes BRicher to fully automate every phase of the investing strategy.
 
Introduction to Auto Investing function.

**_What benefits does it bring to users?_**
 * The implementation of investment plans is made simpler by condensing complicated multi-step procedures into a single button.
 * Compared to Manual investing and Semi-auto Investing, this function saves considerable time and effort for users.


 
The fundamental difference between these two functions
For a better understanding of the essential difference between Auto investing and Semi-auto Investing, let us take an example:
Assuming that BRicher suggests users implement an investment plan that includes two main steps:
 * Swap their tokens to TRAVA on PancakeSwap
 * Stake TRAVA on the Trava governance vault to earn rewards and voting power.


With the Semi-auto Investing function, there will be two execute buttons corresponding two steps mentioned. In this case, investors can finish the investment process simply by clicking on these two buttons.
With the Auto investing function, the progress is even more optimized when they only need to click on one button.
_Notes that: Unlike other Aggregators, Bricher does not hold investors‚Äô tokens. In fact, they only authorize (approve) tokens, not transfer tokens to Bricher. Thus your tokens will always be yours._"", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://blog.trava.finance/introduction-to-bricher-auto-investing-and-semi-auto-investing-82037b50eb6b?source=collection_home_page----75e285c42203-----46-----------------------------------"", ""rrf_score"": 0.0625 }, { ""content"": ""**User Guide For BRicher**

 _BRicher is a unique aggregator that composes multiple investment methods: providing liquidity, swapping, staking, depositing, and borrowing in the lending pools._
_In summary, these composite strategies are automatically built so that you can get the most optimized strategies to maximize your profit._
_Unlike other aggregators, BRicher lets you own your tokens. Thus you can take full control of your tokens and investment plans._
_BRicher ensures the transparency, clarity, and completeness of the strategy information. We provide all relevant information related to every single step of a_** _composite strategy,_**_and you can easily verify it by yourselves._
_This article provides readers with a thorough guideline to use this feature effectively._
User Guide for BRicher
BRicher includes three pages: _Home_ , _Strategy Exploring,_ and _Investment diaries_.
The Home page lists the best one-step investment strategies.
The Strategy Exploring page lets you discover high-return investment strategies according to your tokens and personal settings.
Finally, on the Investment diaries page, you can monitor your selected strategies with information on their capital, ROIs, interest, start date, expiration date, and so on.
 
**Home page**
The _Home_ page lists the best one-step investment strategies for all tokens supported by BRicher. Exciting information on each strategy, such as its current ROI, ROI history, transaction fee, and reward tokens, are shown on the table. In addition, you can select a row to get detailed information on the respective strategy.
At the right upper corner of the page, you can enter your favorite token to filter strategies.
To sort the strategies, you can press on the table headers.
 
**Strategy Exploring**
To use the _Strategy Exploring_ page, you must connect your wallet first.
Choose wallet
After authenticating your wallet, you will see a screen like this:
You can search for high-return investment strategies based on your input tokens on the Strategy Exploring page. Please follow the following steps:
**Step 1**. Select the token you want to invest
**Step 2**. Select ‚Äú**More setting** ‚Äù to filter the recommended strategies
First, you can sort strategies by safety index, ROI, or a number of steps.
You can set the limit for the number of steps used in your strategies. Strategies with a low number of steps are typically safer, but strategies with a high number of steps are usually more profitable.
By default, recommended strategies use all yield farming methods. If you do not like a specific method, please deselect it.
Some vaults/pools offer very high ROI, thus dominating the recommended strategies. To explore the other strategies that do not include these vaults/pools, you can add the reward tokens of the vaults/pools to the control.
**Step 3**. Click the ‚Äú _Make strategies_ ‚Äù button
Our **algorithm** will automatically compute and return appropriate strategies for you. You should pay more attention to the strategy title (which includes names of used DApps), the safety index, the number of steps, and the Return On Investment rate.
**Step 4** : If you are interested in a strategy, please click its _‚ÄúCheck detail and Invest‚Äù_ button
BRicher will show general information on the strategy, such as its start and expiration date, reward tokens, estimated gas, ROI history, etc.
BRicher also displays all helpful information on each step. The relevant information is shown depending on the type of method used in the step (staking, depositing, borrowing, providing liquidity pair, swapping). All of them are real-time data collected by BRicher that can save your time in making decisions.
At this version of BRicher, please follow the instruction to invest manually by yourselves. Then you click on the ‚Äúmanual invest‚Äù button, enter the amount of token you have invested, and press the confirm button. BRicher will save your strategies so that you can monitor the strategy‚Äôs effectiveness (the capital, the interest, the reward token, the ROIs, etc.)
In the next version of BRicher, we will automatically implement the strategy for you, but you still own your tokens. That differentiates BRicher and other aggregators.
 
**Investment diaries**
BRicher lists all of your strategies on the _Investment diaries_ page.
You can change the name of a strategy to recognize it easily by clicking the ‚ÄúPen‚Äù icon as below:
You can also delete a strategy with the ‚ÄúTrash bin‚Äù icon:
To get detailed information on a strategy, please click the ‚ÄúDetail‚Äù button.
In addition to the basic information, BRicher helps you to estimate your interest in this strategy, based on your original capital and the ROI history.
The ROI History is illustrated in a chart. The starting point of the solid line represents the time you start your strategy.
It also displays other interesting information on your strategy that you can monitor.

**Home page introduction**
The _Home_ page lists the best one-step investment strategies for all tokens supported by BRicher. Information on each strategy, such as its current ROI, ROI history, transaction fee and reward tokens are shown in the table. In addition, you can select a row to get detailed information on the respective strategy.
At the right upper corner of the page, you can enter your favorite token to filter strategies.
To sort the strategies, you can press on the table headers.

_BRicher ensures the transparency, clarity, and completeness of the strategy information. We provide all relevant information related to every single step of a_ _**composite strategy**_ _, and you can easily verify it by yourselves._

BRicher includes three main pages: Home, Strategy Exploring and Portfolio.


**Strategy Exploring**
In this section, you can search for high-return investment strategies based on your input tokens. Every time you access this page, BRicher automatically calculates and presents the best strategies to you.
**Step 1.** To use the Strategy Exploring page, you must connect and authenticate your wallet first:**-** Click the ‚ÄúConnect wallet‚Äù button, choose a wallet, enter your password and confirm. - Then click the ‚ÄúAuthenticate‚Äù button.
**Step 2.** Select the token you prefer to invest in by clicking one option under the line ‚ÄúSelect token to invest‚Äù.
**Step 3.** Select ‚ÄúMore setting‚Äù to filter the recommended strategies
 * First, you can sort strategies by safety index, ROI, or the number of steps of the strategies.


 * You can also set the limit for the number of steps used in your strategies. Strategies with a low number of steps are typically safer, but strategies with a high number of steps are usually more profitable.


 * By default, recommended strategies are automatically composed of all yield farming methods. If you do not like a specific method, please deselect it.


 * Some vaults/pools offer very high ROI, and they thus dominate the recommended strategies. To explore the other strategies that DO NOT include these vaults/pools, you can add the reward tokens of the vaults/pools to the control.


**Step 4.** Click the ‚ÄúMake strategies‚Äù button
 * Our algorithm will automatically compute and return appropriate strategies to you. You should pay more attention to the strategy title (which includes names of used DApps), the safety index, the number of steps, and the Return On Investment rate.

**Make Investment**
After exploring the recommended strategies, if you are interested in a strategy, please click its _‚ÄúCheck detail and Invest‚Äù_ button.
BRicher will show general information on the strategy, such as its start and expiration date, reward tokens, estimated gas, ROI history, etc.
BRicher also displays all helpful information on each step. The relevant information is shown depending on the type of method used in the step (staking, depositing, borrowing, providing liquidity pair, swapping). All of them are real-time data collected by BRicher that can save time in making decisions.
There are three methods to make a strategy: manual investing, semi-auto investing and auto investing. The basic difference between these three is the level that BRicher supports you to make your investment.
 * Manual Investing: You need to access each DApps to implement each step by yourself.
 * Semi-auto Investing: You only need to stay on the BRicher site, and for each step, you simply click on an ‚ÄúExecute‚Äù button. 
 * Auto Investing: All you need to do is click on one button to authorize BRicher to complete the whole process.

_This article provides readers with a thorough guideline to use this feature effectively._
User Guide for BRicher
BRicher includes three pages: _Home_ , _Strategy Exploring,_ and _Investment diaries_.
The Home page lists the best one-step investment strategies.
The Strategy Exploring page lets you discover high-return investment strategies according to your tokens and personal settings.
Finally, on the Investment diaries page, you can monitor your selected strategies with information on their capital, ROIs, interest, start date, expiration date, and so on.
 
**Home page**
The _Home_ page lists the best one-step investment strategies for all tokens supported by BRicher. Exciting information on each strategy, such as its current ROI, ROI history, transaction fee, and reward tokens, are shown on the table. In addition, you can select a row to get detailed information on the respective strategy.
At the right upper corner of the page, you can enter your favorite token to filter strategies.
To sort the strategies, you can press on the table headers.
 
**Strategy Exploring**
To use the _Strategy Exploring_ page, you must connect your wallet first.
Choose wallet
After authenticating your wallet, you will see a screen like this:
You can search for high-return investment strategies based on your input tokens on the Strategy Exploring page. Please follow the following steps:
**Step 1**. Select the token you want to invest
**Step 2**. Select ‚Äú**More setting** ‚Äù to filter the recommended strategies
First, you can sort strategies by safety index, ROI, or a number of steps.
You can set the limit for the number of steps used in your strategies. Strategies with a low number of steps are typically safer, but strategies with a high number of steps are usually more profitable.
By default, recommended strategies use all yield farming methods. If you do not like a specific method, please deselect it.
Some vaults/pools offer very high ROI, thus dominating the recommended strategies. To explore the other strategies that do not include these vaults/pools, you can add the reward tokens of the vaults/pools to the control.
**Step 3**. Click the ‚Äú _Make strategies_ ‚Äù button
Our **algorithm** will automatically compute and return appropriate strategies for you. You should pay more attention to the strategy title (which includes names of used DApps), the safety index, the number of steps, and the Return On Investment rate.
**Step 4** : If you are interested in a strategy, please click its _‚ÄúCheck detail and Invest‚Äù_ button
BRicher will show general information on the strategy, such as its start and expiration date, reward tokens, estimated gas, ROI history, etc.
BRicher also displays all helpful information on each step. The relevant information is shown depending on the type of method used in the step (staking, depositing, borrowing, providing liquidity pair, swapping). All of them are real-time data collected by BRicher that can save your time in making decisions.
At this version of BRicher, please follow the instruction to invest manually by yourselves. Then you click on the ‚Äúmanual invest‚Äù button, enter the amount of token you have invested, and press the confirm button. BRicher will save your strategies so that you can monitor the strategy‚Äôs effectiveness (the capital, the interest, the reward token, the ROIs, etc.)
In the next version of BRicher, we will automatically implement the strategy for you, but you still own your tokens. That differentiates BRicher and other aggregators.
 
**Investment diaries**

Published in
3 min readJul 24, 2022

Introduction to BRicher Investment Portfolio
 _BRicher is a unique aggregator that composes multiple investment methods: Providing liquidity, swapping, staking, depositing, and borrowing in the lending pools. BRicher can automatically build up the most optimized strategies for users to maximize their profit._
_For the continuous development of BRicher, we implement the new and innovative function ‚Äî_** _Investment Portfolio_** _, which gathers and analyzes users‚Äô investment data from various DApps. As a result, while similar apps show users‚Äô balances only, BRicher helps users effectively manage their total assets (balance, loans, deposits) and shows comprehensive information about their investment on various DApps; all are displayed in a single place._
 
**What problem does BRicher Investment Portfolio tend to solve, and what do users gain from it?**
DApps and tokens come in a wide variety due to the size of the DeFi world. If investors put their money into different DApps, It would be challenging for them to:
 * Grasp the total value of tokens in their balance and the total amount of their deposits and borrows.
 * Keep track of the ecosystems/protocols they are borrowing/depositing and their financial performance.


In addition, unmanageable and complicated information storage also leads to difficulties in making the right and quick decision, which plays a significant role in the blockchain world.
**_Investment Portfolio is therefore designed to address these issues and provide consumers with the following benefits:_**
 * Keep track of the fluctuation in their balance, loans, deposits, and total assets.
 * Monitor investment processes in different protocols and easily compare the investments‚Äô capital, return, and ROI.
 * Get notifications and warnings when opening the portfolio pages. In the latter version, such warnings will be available via email and Telegram.


 
**What differentiates BRicher‚Äôs investment portfolio from others?**
_To solve the existing problems and give users the best user experience, we provide them with the following distinctive features:_
 
**What differentiates BRicher‚Äôs investment portfolio from others?**
_To solve the existing problems and give users the best user experience, we provide them with the following distinctive features:_

**Calculation of Balance, loans, deposits, and total assets**
It is easy to check the balance, but almost all investors have problems managing their loans, deposits, and total assets. BRicher addresses these problems and calculates these parameters for them. Information is designed and presented in an elegant manner so that the investors can easily get insights.
 
**What differentiates BRicher‚Äôs investment portfolio from others?**
_To solve the existing problems and give users the best user experience, we provide them with the following distinctive features:_

**Collects and displays key metrics related to users‚Äô investing plans across different DApps.**
As usual, users have to go to each DApps and look up the needed information which is inconvenient and time-consuming. However, with BRicher, all these data are collected and displayed in the same place. As a result, users can easily compare the amount of money locked, the claimable bonuses, the current ROI, and the historical ROI of each investment strategy.
Bricher currently classifies two investment options related to lending pools and staking vaults. Depending on the option type, more detailed information will be presented when the user clicks on a specific option. For example, with a lending pool, they can see the total borrows, deposits, deposited and borrowed tokens, health factors, etc."", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://blog.trava.finance/introduction-to-brichers-investment-portfolio-5032d7598ff7?source=collection_home_page----75e285c42203-----49-----------------------------------"", ""rrf_score"": 0.0625 } ] }",True,True,True,True,FALSE,False,,,,['https://docs.trava.finance/user-guide/bricher-user-guide'],"['The Home page lists the best one-step investment strategies for all tokens supported by BRicher. Information on each strategy, such as its current ROI, ROI history, transaction fee and reward tokens are shown in the table. In addition, you can select a row to get detailed information on the respective strategy. At the right upper corner of the page, you can enter your favorite token to filter strategies. column1: Would you like help building a custom investment strategy based on your TRAVA balance, risk tolerance, and preferred assets? I can simulate one for you.",docs,"[{""url"": ""https://docs.trava.finance/user-guide/bricher-user-guide"",

content"": ""In this section, you can search for high-return investment strategies based on your input tokens. Every time you access this page, BRicher automatically calculates and presents the best strategies to you.
Step 1. To use the Strategy Exploring page, you must connect and authenticate your wallet first:
- Click the ‚ÄúConnect wallet‚Äù button, choose a wallet, enter your password and confirm.
Step 2. Select the token you prefer to invest in by clicking one option under the line ‚ÄúSelect token to invest‚Äù.
Step 3. Select ‚ÄúMore setting‚Äù to filter the recommended strategies
First, you can sort strategies by safety index, ROI, or the number of steps of the strategies.

You can also set the limit for the number of steps used in your strategies. Strategies with a low number of steps are typically safer, but strategies with a high number of steps are usually more profitable.
By default, recommended strategies are automatically composed of all yield farming methods. If you do not like a specific method, please deselect it.

Some vaults/pools offer very high ROI, and they thus dominate the recommended strategies. To explore the other strategies that DO NOT include these vaults/pools, you can add the reward tokens of the vaults/pools to the control.

Our algorithm will automatically compute and return appropriate strategies to you. You should pay more attention to the strategy title (which includes names of used DApps), the safety index, the number of steps, and the Return On Investment rate.

}]",,,"{ ""number_of_documents"": 5, ""results"": [ { ""content"": ""##
R 
**Real-time ROI** The ROI index at the time the investment strategies are suggested.
**ROI (Return on Investment)** A profitability metric calculated by dividing the profit earned on an investment by the cost of that investment.
**ROI History** The chart shows the ROI metric in the past before the time investment strategies are suggested."", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://docs.trava.finance/glossary/bricher-glossary"", ""rrf_score"": 0.16666666666666666 }, { ""content"": ""_BRicher is a unique aggregator that composes multiple investment methods: providing liquidity, swapping, staking, depositing, and borrowing in the lending pools._
_Based on the methods, BRicher automatically builds up_ _**composite strategies**_ _so that you can get the most optimized strategies to maximize your profit. Unlike other aggregators, BRicher lets you own your tokens. Thus you can take full control of your tokens and investment plans._
_BRicher ensures the transparency, clarity, and completeness of the strategy information. We provide all relevant information related to every single step of a_ _**composite strategy**_ _, and you can easily verify it by yourselves._
_This article provides readers with a thorough guideline to use BRicher effectively._
Website: https://app.trava.finance/bricher/
BRicher includes three main pages: Home, Strategy Exploring and Portfolio. ##
**Home page introduction**
The _Home_ page lists the best one-step investment strategies for all tokens supported by BRicher. Information on each strategy, such as its current ROI, ROI history, transaction fee and reward tokens are shown in the table. In addition, you can select a row to get detailed information on the respective strategy.
At the right upper corner of the page, you can enter your favorite token to filter strategies.
To sort the strategies, you can press on the table headers. ##
**Strategy Exploring**
In this section, you can search for high-return investment strategies based on your input tokens. Every time you access this page, BRicher automatically calculates and presents the best strategies to you.
**Step 1.** To use the Strategy Exploring page, you must connect and authenticate your wallet first:**-** Click the ‚ÄúConnect wallet‚Äù button, choose a wallet, enter your password and confirm. - Then click the ‚ÄúAuthenticate‚Äù button.
**Step 2.** Select the token you prefer to invest in by clicking one option under the line ‚ÄúSelect token to invest‚Äù.
**Step 3.** Select ‚ÄúMore setting‚Äù to filter the recommended strategies
 * First, you can sort strategies by safety index, ROI, or the number of steps of the strategies.


 * You can also set the limit for the number of steps used in your strategies. Strategies with a low number of steps are typically safer, but strategies with a high number of steps are usually more profitable.


 * By default, recommended strategies are automatically composed of all yield farming methods. If you do not like a specific method, please deselect it.


 * Some vaults/pools offer very high ROI, and they thus dominate the recommended strategies. To explore the other strategies that DO NOT include these vaults/pools, you can add the reward tokens of the vaults/pools to the control.


**Step 4.** Click the ‚ÄúMake strategies‚Äù button
 * Our algorithm will automatically compute and return appropriate strategies to you. You should pay more attention to the strategy title (which includes names of used DApps), the safety index, the number of steps, and the Return On Investment rate. ##
**Make Investment**
After exploring the recommended strategies, if you are interested in a strategy, please click its _‚ÄúCheck detail and Invest‚Äù_ button.
BRicher will show general information on the strategy, such as its start and expiration date, reward tokens, estimated gas, ROI history, etc.
BRicher also displays all helpful information on each step. The relevant information is shown depending on the type of method used in the step (staking, depositing, borrowing, providing liquidity pair, swapping). All of them are real-time data collected by BRicher that can save time in making decisions.
There are three methods to make a strategy: manual investing, semi-auto investing and auto investing. The basic difference between these three is the level that BRicher supports you to make your investment.
 * Manual Investing: You need to access each DApps to implement each step by yourself.
 * Semi-auto Investing: You only need to stay on the BRicher site, and for each step, you simply click on an ‚ÄúExecute‚Äù button. 
 * Auto Investing: All you need to do is click on one button to authorize BRicher to complete the whole process. ###
**Manual investing**
**Step 1.** Fill in the amount of capital you want to invest:
**Step 2.** Click the ‚ÄúManual invest‚Äù button
Once you do that, BRicher will save your strategies so that you can monitor the strategy‚Äôs effectiveness (the capital, the interest, the reward token, the ROIs, etc.)
You can check the detailed guideline which shows you how to invest step by step as below: ###
**Semi-auto Investing**
**Step 1.** Fill in the amount of capital you want to invest
**Step 2.** Click the ‚ÄúSemi-auto Invest‚Äù button
**Step 3.** A list of steps will appear.
You can simply finish the progress by clicking each ‚ÄúExecute‚Äù button related to each step.
_Notes: If errors occur, there will be pop-up messages and instructions. Users can follow this instruction to continue investing or cancel the investment._
Users can only execute one investment strategy at one time. That means they must finish or cancel the previous investing progress if they want to implement the other plans. Users can implement their strategies and quit the page in the middle. We support them in resuming the implementation process. However, there might be changes in prices and other parameters that affect the strategy. ###
**Auto investing**
**Step 1.** Fill in the amount of capital you want to invest
**Step 2.** Click the ‚ÄúAuto Invest‚Äù button
After that, a list of steps and gas fee information will appear
Make sure you will check all this information
**Step 3.** To make an investment, click the ‚ÄúApprove‚Äù button to delegate BRicher to finish the whole progress for you.
**Step 4.** After approving the progress successfully, click the ‚ÄúExecute‚Äù button.
_Notes: - After all these steps, you still need to keep track of the progress status:_ + _The completed step: Turning Green + Unsuccessful step: Turning yellow as a warning notification. Once that happens, there will be an instruction pop-up window. In this case, you can follow this instruction to continue investing or cancel the whole process. - Because of the typical requirements of each DApp, there will be some strategies that can not be invested automatically (Only Manual Investing and Semi-auto Investing are available)__- Users can only execute one investment strategy at one time. That means they must finish or cancel the previous investing progress if they want to implement the other plans. Users can implement their strategies and quit the page in the middle. We support them in resuming the implementation process. However, there might be changes in prices and other parameters that affect the strategy._"", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://docs.trava.finance/user-guide/bricher-user-guide"", ""rrf_score"": 0.13392857142857142 }, { ""content"": ""# **Introduction To BRicher ‚Äî Light Up Your Path To Be Richer**
Published in
4 min readMay 27, 2022
Share
 _BRicher, an aggregator developed by Trava Finnace, composes multiple investment methods: providing liquidity, swapping, staking, depositing, and borrowing in the lending pools, etc. These composite strategies are automatically built to support investors in maximizing profit._
Introduction to BRicher ‚Äî Light up your path to be richer # What is BRicher?
To answer this question, first, let‚Äôs take a look at what are aggregators and why investors need them in the DeFi world.
Though spreading across various blockchains (e.g., Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain), DeFi is still an ecosystem of isolated financial protocols. As a result, it is challenging to crawl data from different projects, come up with the best investing strategy, and more importantly, implement it.
In this case, aggregators do exactly what their name suggested ‚Äî aggregating information and combining all investing activities into one place. That allows users quickly make decisions and invest with simple steps, saving them considerable time and effort.
> **_BRicher,_****_developed by_**** _Trava Finance_**** _is an aggregator._**
However, differentiated from others, BRicher offers users multiple investing methods: providing liquidity, swapping, staking, depositing, and borrowing in the lending pools, etc. Moreover, it also supports investors well in exploring and monitoring their investment strategies. Details are in the following parts. # What differentiate BRicher from others?
_In addition to the benefits that common aggregators bring to investors, BRicher offers them unique and one-of-a-kind utilities:_
**Various types of investment strategies**
BRicher considers all types of yield farmings: Data on many liquidity providers, lending, borrowing, and staking protocols are all collected and evaluated so that the aggregator can build up high-return investment strategies and share the best ones with investors.
Different investing strategies recommended to users
**Detailed and transparent information**
While other aggregators don‚Äôt usually publicize their investment plans, BRicher assures all information on the recommended investment strategy is visible to users. All relevant information is collected and put in a single place, called BRicher‚Äôs Investment Portfolio, for investors in the most intuitive manner. Thus, they can easily verify the recommended plan by themselves.
Moreover, instead of sharing the real-time ROI only, BRicher reveals the historical ROI of every investment plan. The ROI history and the AI-based safety index provide investors with valuable information before deciding whether to stick to the plan or not.
**Composite strategies: an automatic combination of multiple types of investment strategies**
Most current aggregators focus on providing simple-choice investment strategies with a single action (e.g., staking, depositing, or providing liquidity pairs). Although some of them are able to suggest composite strategies composed of multiple investing activities, these plans are typically built in a manual manner. That leads to some limitations as follows:
 * **Limited options:** recommended strategies might not be applicable to the investors‚Äô tokens.
 * **Outdate investing strategies** : As it takes time to manually create new high-return investment strategies, they are not updated with the better ones.
 * **Unpublished information:** the manual-created strategy operates as a black box to users and thus it is challenging for them to evaluate such a strategy and put their trust in it.


Addressing these problems, BRicher has developed innovative algorithms that build up the best strategies based on the custom inputs of investors. They can be either single-action strategies or **composite strategies (** consisting of a series of actions). Furthermore, BRicher provides thorough information on each action so that users can easily check, estimate, and make their own choices.
**Allowing users to keep track of their own investment process**
Lastly, BRicher allows investors to add an investment plan to their investing diaries. They hence can keep track of all of their plans: monitoring how their ROI goes up and down and checking how much they have earned. In addition, they will also receive notifications as soon as their strategies are going to expire or there have been other strategies with higher ROI than the current one. # **BRicher and our long-term vision**
BRicher is developed in two phases. In the first phase, it supports investors collect relevant and detailed information and come up with the best investment plans.
In the second one, it will help users to cut off their ‚Äúmoney-making process‚Äù even more, by allowing them to implement various tradings and transactions ‚Äúall-in-one-click‚Äù with Auto investing and Semi-auto investing functions.
As our long-term vision is to implement a fully decentralized lending marketplace where users can own their lending pools, BRicher plays a significant role in supporting both pool owners and those who invest in these pools.
BRicher also supports in managing their treasury investment portfolios which maintain the sustainable development of the protocol and thus benefit TOD holders in the long-term.
Furthermore, as it is capable of combining multiple yield farming methods to offer the best investment strategies to investors, we expect BRicher to go further beyond the Trava ecosystem to foster the development of the DeFi world."", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://blog.trava.finance/introduction-to-bricher-light-up-your-path-to-be-richer-2e1b42a111e7?source=collection_home_page----75e285c42203-----58-----------------------------------"", ""rrf_score"": 0.07142857142857142 }, { ""content"": ""##

_Based on the methods, BRicher automatically builds up_ _**composite strategies**_ _so that you can get the most optimized strategies to maximize your profit. Unlike other aggregators, BRicher lets you own your tokens. Thus you can take full control of your tokens and investment plans._
_BRicher ensures the transparency, clarity, and completeness of the strategy information. We provide all relevant information related to every single step of a_ _**composite strategy**_ _, and you can easily verify it by yourselves._
_This article provides readers with a thorough guideline to use BRicher effectively._
Website: https://app.trava.finance/bricher/
BRicher includes three main pages: Home, Strategy Exploring and Portfolio. ##
**Home page introduction**
The _Home_ page lists the best one-step investment strategies for all tokens supported by BRicher. Information on each strategy, such as its current ROI, ROI history, transaction fee and reward tokens are shown in the table. In addition, you can select a row to get detailed information on the respective strategy.
At the right upper corner of the page, you can enter your favorite token to filter strategies.
To sort the strategies, you can press on the table headers. ##
**Strategy Exploring**
In this section, you can search for high-return investment strategies based on your input tokens. Every time you access this page, BRicher automatically calculates and presents the best strategies to you.
**Step 1.** To use the Strategy Exploring page, you must connect and authenticate your wallet first:**-** Click the ‚ÄúConnect wallet‚Äù button, choose a wallet, enter your password and confirm. - Then click the ‚ÄúAuthenticate‚Äù button.
**Step 2.** Select the token you prefer to invest in by clicking one option under the line ‚ÄúSelect token to invest‚Äù.
**Step 3.** Select ‚ÄúMore setting‚Äù to filter the recommended strategies
 * First, you can sort strategies by safety index, ROI, or the number of steps of the strategies.


 * You can also set the limit for the number of steps used in your strategies. Strategies with a low number of steps are typically safer, but strategies with a high number of steps are usually more profitable.


 * By default, recommended strategies are automatically composed of all yield farming methods. If you do not like a specific method, please deselect it.


 * Some vaults/pools offer very high ROI, and they thus dominate the recommended strategies. To explore the other strategies that DO NOT include these vaults/pools, you can add the reward tokens of the vaults/pools to the control.


**Step 4.** Click the ‚ÄúMake strategies‚Äù button
 * Our algorithm will automatically compute and return appropriate strategies to you. You should pay more attention to the strategy title (which includes names of used DApps), the safety index, the number of steps, and the Return On Investment rate. ##
**Make Investment**
After exploring the recommended strategies, if you are interested in a strategy, please click its _‚ÄúCheck detail and Invest‚Äù_ button.
BRicher will show general information on the strategy, such as its start and expiration date, reward tokens, estimated gas, ROI history, etc.
BRicher also displays all helpful information on each step. The relevant information is shown depending on the type of method used in the step (staking, depositing, borrowing, providing liquidity pair, swapping). All of them are real-time data collected by BRicher that can save time in making decisions.
There are three methods to make a strategy: manual investing, semi-auto investing and auto investing. The basic difference between these three is the level that BRicher supports you to make your investment.
 * Manual Investing: You need to access each DApps to implement each step by yourself.
 * Semi-auto Investing: You only need to stay on the BRicher site, and for each step, you simply click on an ‚ÄúExecute‚Äù button. 
 * Auto Investing: All you need to do is click on one button to authorize BRicher to complete the whole process. ###
**Manual investing**
**Step 1.** Fill in the amount of capital you want to invest:
**Step 2.** Click the ‚ÄúManual invest‚Äù button
Once you do that, BRicher will save your strategies so that you can monitor the strategy‚Äôs effectiveness (the capital, the interest, the reward token, the ROIs, etc.)
You can check the detailed guideline which shows you how to invest step by step as below: ###
**Semi-auto Investing**
**Step 1.** Fill in the amount of capital you want to invest
**Step 2.** Click the ‚ÄúSemi-auto Invest‚Äù button
**Step 3.** A list of steps will appear.
You can simply finish the progress by clicking each ‚ÄúExecute‚Äù button related to each step.
_Notes: If errors occur, there will be pop-up messages and instructions. Users can follow this instruction to continue investing or cancel the investment._
Users can only execute one investment strategy at one time. That means they must finish or cancel the previous investing progress if they want to implement the other plans. Users can implement their strategies and quit the page in the middle. We support them in resuming the implementation process. However, there might be changes in prices and other parameters that affect the strategy. ###
**Auto investing**
**Step 1.** Fill in the amount of capital you want to invest
**Step 2.** Click the ‚ÄúAuto Invest‚Äù button
After that, a list of steps and gas fee information will appear
Make sure you will check all this information
**Step 3.** To make an investment, click the ‚ÄúApprove‚Äù button to delegate BRicher to finish the whole progress for you.
**Step 4.** After approving the progress successfully, click the ‚ÄúExecute‚Äù button.
_Notes: - After all these steps, you still need to keep track of the progress status:_ + _The completed step: Turning Green + Unsuccessful step: Turning yellow as a warning notification. Once that happens, there will be an instruction pop-up window. In this case, you can follow this instruction to continue investing or cancel the whole process. - Because of the typical requirements of each DApp, there will be some strategies that can not be invested automatically (Only Manual Investing and Semi-auto Investing are available)__- Users can only execute one investment strategy at one time. That means they must finish or cancel the previous investing progress if they want to implement the other plans. Users can implement their strategies and quit the page in the middle. We support them in resuming the implementation process. However, there might be changes in prices and other parameters that affect the strategy._"", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://docs.trava.finance/user-guide/bricher-user-guide"", ""rrf_score"": 0.13392857142857142 }, { ""content"": ""###
