After exploring the recommended strategies, if you are interested in a strategy, please click its _‚ÄúCheck detail and Invest‚Äù_ button.
BRicher will show general information on the strategy, such as its start and expiration date, reward tokens, estimated gas, ROI history, etc.
BRicher also displays all helpful information on each step. The relevant information is shown depending on the type of method used in the step (staking, depositing, borrowing, providing liquidity pair, swapping). All of them are real-time data collected by BRicher that can save time in making decisions.
There are three methods to make a strategy: manual investing, semi-auto investing and auto investing. The basic difference between these three is the level that BRicher supports you to make your investment.
 * Manual Investing: You need to access each DApps to implement each step by yourself.
 * Semi-auto Investing: You only need to stay on the BRicher site, and for each step, you simply click on an ‚ÄúExecute‚Äù button. 
 * Auto Investing: All you need to do is click on one button to authorize BRicher to complete the whole process. ###
**Manual investing**
**Step 1.** Fill in the amount of capital you want to invest:
**Step 2.** Click the ‚ÄúManual invest‚Äù button
Once you do that, BRicher will save your strategies so that you can monitor the strategy‚Äôs effectiveness (the capital, the interest, the reward token, the ROIs, etc.)
You can check the detailed guideline which shows you how to invest step by step as below: ###
**Semi-auto Investing**
**Step 1.** Fill in the amount of capital you want to invest
**Step 2.** Click the ‚ÄúSemi-auto Invest‚Äù button
**Step 3.** A list of steps will appear.
You can simply finish the progress by clicking each ‚ÄúExecute‚Äù button related to each step.
_Notes: If errors occur, there will be pop-up messages and instructions. Users can follow this instruction to continue investing or cancel the investment._
Users can only execute one investment strategy at one time. That means they must finish or cancel the previous investing progress if they want to implement the other plans. Users can implement their strategies and quit the page in the middle. We support them in resuming the implementation process. However, there might be changes in prices and other parameters that affect the strategy. ###
**Auto investing**
**Step 1.** Fill in the amount of capital you want to invest
**Step 2.** Click the ‚ÄúAuto Invest‚Äù button
After that, a list of steps and gas fee information will appear
Make sure you will check all this information
**Step 3.** To make an investment, click the ‚ÄúApprove‚Äù button to delegate BRicher to finish the whole progress for you.
**Step 4.** After approving the progress successfully, click the ‚ÄúExecute‚Äù button.
_Notes: - After all these steps, you still need to keep track of the progress status:_ + _The completed step: Turning Green + Unsuccessful step: Turning yellow as a warning notification. Once that happens, there will be an instruction pop-up window. In this case, you can follow this instruction to continue investing or cancel the whole process. - Because of the typical requirements of each DApp, there will be some strategies that can not be invested automatically (Only Manual Investing and Semi-auto Investing are available)__- Users can only execute one investment strategy at one time. That means they must finish or cancel the previous investing progress if they want to implement the other plans. Users can implement their strategies and quit the page in the middle. We support them in resuming the implementation process. ,How to invest using the semi-auto method?,"To invest using the semi-auto method on Trava Finance, you combine manual control with some automated recommendations from the BRicher system‚Äîbut without giving full automation rights. This method lets you review and customize the strategy before committing your assets.
ü§ñüß† What Is Semi-Auto Investment in Trava?

column3: Semi-auto means you:
Use BRicher‚Äôs suggested strategies
But manually confirm and adjust parameters
Maintain control over deposit amounts, token choice, and risk level
Ideal for users who want guidance without full automation

column1: ‚úÖ How to Invest Using the Semi-Auto Method

column3: Go to Trava Station
Navigate to the ‚ÄúBRicher‚Äù Section
Click on ‚ÄúBRicher‚Äù in the top navigation
Connect Your Wallet
Use MetaMask or another Web3 wallet
Make sure you‚Äôre on BNB Chain
View Suggested Strategies
BRicher will recommend multiple investment options:
High-return (aggressive)
Stable (low risk)
Balanced (moderate)
Click ‚ÄúPreview‚Äù or ‚ÄúCustomize‚Äù
Instead of directly investing, choose to preview or adjust the suggested strategy
You can:
Change the token amount
Adjust allocation ratios
Modify risk level or target APY
Simulate Results
BRicher will display:
Estimated returns
Risk profile
Asset breakdown
Click ‚ÄúConfirm Investment‚Äù
Once satisfied with the setup
Approve the token if it‚Äôs your first time
Confirm the transaction in your wallet
‚úÖ Strategy Goes Live
You‚Äôll be able to track it in ‚ÄúYour Strategies‚Äù section under BRicher

column2: Backed by market data and optimization logic
Faster setup than manual, more control than auto

**Home page introduction**
The _Home_ page lists the best one-step investment strategies for all tokens supported by BRicher. Information on each strategy, such as its current ROI, ROI history, transaction fee and reward tokens are shown in the table. In addition, you can select a row to get detailed information on the respective strategy.
At the right upper corner of the page, you can enter your favorite token to filter strategies.

**Strategy Exploring**
In this section, you can search for high-return investment strategies based on your input tokens. Every time you access this page, BRicher automatically calculates and presents the best strategies to you.
**Step 1.** To use the Strategy Exploring page, you must connect and authenticate your wallet first:**-** Click the ‚ÄúConnect wallet‚Äù button, choose a wallet, enter your password and confirm. - Then click the ‚ÄúAuthenticate‚Äù button.
**Step 2.** Select the token you prefer to invest in by clicking one option under the line ‚ÄúSelect token to invest‚Äù.
**Step 3.** Select ‚ÄúMore setting‚Äù to filter the recommended strategies
 * First, you can sort strategies by safety index, ROI, or the number of steps of the strategies.


 * You can also set the limit for the number of steps used in your strategies. Strategies with a low number of steps are typically safer, but strategies with a high number of steps are usually more profitable.


 * By default, recommended strategies are automatically composed of all yield farming methods. If you do not like a specific method, please deselect it.


 * Some vaults/pools offer very high ROI, and they thus dominate the recommended strategies. To explore the other strategies that DO NOT include these vaults/pools, you can add the reward tokens of the vaults/pools to the control.


**Step 4.** Click the ‚ÄúMake strategies‚Äù button
 * Our algorithm will automatically compute and return appropriate strategies to you. You should pay more attention to the strategy title (which includes names of used DApps), the safety index, the number of steps, and the Return On Investment rate.

Introduction to BRicher‚Äôs new functions
 _BRicher is a unique aggregator that composes multiple investment methods: providing liquidity, swapping, staking, depositing, and borrowing in the lending pools._
_In summary, these composite strategies are automatically built so that users can get the most optimized one to maximize their profit. Moreover, unlike other aggregators, BRicher lets investors own their tokens so that they can take complete control of capital and investment plans._
 
The first version of BRicher
In the first version, BRicher provided users with effective investment strategies with high returns and helped them keep track of their diaries (ROI and other critical parameters).
_An investment strategy suggested by BRicher_
However, the problem is that after discovering their best investment suggestion, users need to implement all the investing processes by themself, which is significantly time-consuming. Additionally, some ‚Äúnewbies‚Äù unfamiliar with various DApps may find it challenging to accomplish complicated operations independently.
To address these problems and provide users with more optimized options, we would like to offer new functions: Auto Investing and Semi-auto Investing.
As their name ‚Äî ‚ÄúAuto‚Äù- these two new functions will automatically simplify the investment process and save investors much time.
 
Introduction to Semi-auto Investing function
 
Introduction to Semi-auto Investing function

** _What is the Semi-auto Investing function?_**
_Semi-auto Investing is a new feature that allows users to finish different stages of the investment strategies directly on the BRicher interface rather than on other DApps._
In more detail, recommended strategies usually consist of several steps, each with smaller operations. Performing all of these tasks in multiple DApps can be challenging and time-consuming.
In this case, the Semi-auto Investing function supports users effectively by allowing them to gradually execute the strategies on only one site ‚Äî BRicher. That means even though users still need to invest step by step, there will be one button for each stage on BRicher‚Äôs interface for them to click on and complete the process easier.
 
Introduction to Semi-auto Investing function

**_What benefit does it bring to users?_**
 * It is much more convenient than the Manual Investing feature, which requires users to access each DApps and execute the required steps.
 * Investors can control and keep track of each step of the investment implementation. That helps them to deeply understand the progress and, more importantly, make the modification in each step (cancel, for example) if necessary.


 
Introduction to Auto Investing function.
 
Introduction to Auto Investing function.

**_What is the Auto Investing function?_**
Upgraded from Semi-auto Investing, the Auto investing function requires users nothing but to click one only button. By doing that, the user authorizes BRicher to fully automate every phase of the investing strategy.
 
Introduction to Auto Investing function.

**_What benefits does it bring to users?_**
 * The implementation of investment plans is made simpler by condensing complicated multi-step procedures into a single button.
 * Compared to Manual investing and Semi-auto Investing, this function saves considerable time and effort for users.


 
The fundamental difference between these two functions
For a better understanding of the essential difference between Auto investing and Semi-auto Investing, let us take an example:
Assuming that BRicher suggests users implement an investment plan that includes two main steps:
 * Swap their tokens to TRAVA on PancakeSwap
 * Stake TRAVA on the Trava governance vault to earn rewards and voting power.


With the Semi-auto Investing function, there will be two execute buttons corresponding two steps mentioned. In this case, investors can finish the investment process simply by clicking on these two buttons.
With the Auto investing function, the progress is even more optimized when they only need to click on one button.
_Notes that: Unlike other Aggregators, Bricher does not hold investors‚Äô tokens. In fact, they only authorize (approve) tokens, not transfer tokens to Bricher.  _BRicher is a unique aggregator that composes multiple investment methods: providing liquidity, swapping, staking, depositing, and borrowing in the lending pools._
_In summary, these composite strategies are automatically built so that you can get the most optimized strategies to maximize your profit._
_Unlike other aggregators, BRicher lets you own your tokens. Thus you can take full control of your tokens and investment plans._
_BRicher ensures the transparency, clarity, and completeness of the strategy information. We provide all relevant information related to every single step of a_** _composite strategy,_**_and you can easily verify it by yourselves._
_This article provides readers with a thorough guideline to use this feature effectively._
User Guide for BRicher
BRicher includes three pages: _Home_ , _Strategy Exploring,_ and _Investment diaries_.
The Home page lists the best one-step investment strategies.
The Strategy Exploring page lets you discover high-return investment strategies according to your tokens and personal settings.
Finally, on the Investment diaries page, you can monitor your selected strategies with information on their capital, ROIs, interest, start date, expiration date, and so on.
 
**Home page**
The _Home_ page lists the best one-step investment strategies for all tokens supported by BRicher. Exciting information on each strategy, such as its current ROI, ROI history, transaction fee, and reward tokens, are shown on the table. In addition, you can select a row to get detailed information on the respective strategy.
At the right upper corner of the page, you can enter your favorite token to filter strategies.
To sort the strategies, you can press on the table headers.
 
**Strategy Exploring**
To use the _Strategy Exploring_ page, you must connect your wallet first.
Choose wallet
After authenticating your wallet, you will see a screen like this:
You can search for high-return investment strategies based on your input tokens on the Strategy Exploring page. Please follow the following steps:
**Step 1**. Select the token you want to invest
**Step 2**. Select ‚Äú**More setting** ‚Äù to filter the recommended strategies
First, you can sort strategies by safety index, ROI, or a number of steps.
You can set the limit for the number of steps used in your strategies. Strategies with a low number of steps are typically safer, but strategies with a high number of steps are usually more profitable.
By default, recommended strategies use all yield farming methods. If you do not like a specific method, please deselect it.
Some vaults/pools offer very high ROI, thus dominating the recommended strategies. To explore the other strategies that do not include these vaults/pools, you can add the reward tokens of the vaults/pools to the control.
**Step 3**. Click the ‚Äú _Make strategies_ ‚Äù button
Our **algorithm** will automatically compute and return appropriate strategies for you. You should pay more attention to the strategy title (which includes names of used DApps), the safety index, the number of steps, and the Return On Investment rate.
**Step 4** : If you are interested in a strategy, please click its _‚ÄúCheck detail and Invest‚Äù_ button
BRicher will show general information on the strategy, such as its start and expiration date, reward tokens, estimated gas, ROI history, etc.
BRicher also displays all helpful information on each step. The relevant information is shown depending on the type of method used in the step (staking, depositing, borrowing, providing liquidity pair, swapping). All of them are real-time data collected by BRicher that can save your time in making decisions.
At this version of BRicher, please follow the instruction to invest manually by yourselves. Then you click on the ‚Äúmanual invest‚Äù button, enter the amount of token you have invested, and press the confirm button. BRicher will save your strategies so that you can monitor the strategy‚Äôs effectiveness (the capital, the interest, the reward token, the ROIs, etc.)
In the next version of BRicher, we will automatically implement the strategy for you, but you still own your tokens. That differentiates BRicher and other aggregators.
 
**Investment diaries**
BRicher lists all of your strategies on the _Investment diaries_ page.
You can change the name of a strategy to recognize it easily by clicking the ‚ÄúPen‚Äù icon as below:
You can also delete a strategy with the ‚ÄúTrash bin‚Äù icon:
To get detailed information on a strategy, please click the ‚ÄúDetail‚Äù button.
In addition to the basic information, BRicher helps you to estimate your interest in this strategy, based on your original capital and the ROI history.
The ROI History is illustrated in a chart. The starting point of the solid line represents the time you start your strategy.
It also displays other interesting information on your strategy that you can monitor.

- After all these steps, you still need to keep track of the progress status:

+ Unsuccessful step: Turning yellow as a warning notification. Once that happens, there will be an instruction pop-up window. In this case, you can follow this instruction to continue investing or cancel the whole process.
- Because of the typical requirements of each DApp, there will be some strategies that can not be invested automatically (Only Manual Investing and Semi-auto Investing are available)

- Users can only execute one investment strategy at one time. That means they must finish or cancel the previous investing progress if they want to implement the other plans. After exploring the recommended strategies, if you are interested in a strategy, please click its _‚ÄúCheck detail and Invest‚Äù_ button.
BRicher will show general information on the strategy, such as its start and expiration date, reward tokens, estimated gas, ROI history, etc.
BRicher also displays all helpful information on each step. The relevant information is shown depending on the type of method used in the step (staking, depositing, borrowing, providing liquidity pair, swapping). All of them are real-time data collected by BRicher that can save time in making decisions.
There are three methods to make a strategy: manual investing, semi-auto investing and auto investing. The basic difference between these three is the level that BRicher supports you to make your investment.
 * Manual Investing: You need to access each DApps to implement each step by yourself.
 * Semi-auto Investing: You only need to stay on the BRicher site, and for each step, you simply click on an ‚ÄúExecute‚Äù button. 
 * Auto Investing: All you need to do is click on one button to authorize BRicher to complete the whole process.

**Step 3.** A list of steps will appear.

_Notes: If errors occur, there will be pop-up messages and instructions. Users can follow this instruction to continue investing or cancel the investment._
Users can only execute one investment strategy at one time. That means they must finish or cancel the previous investing progress if they want to implement the other plans. Users can implement their strategies and quit the page in the middle. We support them in resuming the implementation process. However, there might be changes in prices and other parameters that affect the strategy.

 _BRicher is a unique aggregator that composes multiple investment methods: providing liquidity, swapping, staking, depositing, and borrowing in the lending pools._
_In summary, these composite strategies are automatically built so that you can get the most optimized strategies to maximize your profit._
_Unlike other aggregators, BRicher lets you own your tokens. Thus you can take full control of your tokens and investment plans._
_BRicher ensures the transparency, clarity, and completeness of the strategy information. We provide all relevant information related to every single step of a_** _composite strategy,_**_and you can easily verify it by yourselves._
_This article provides readers with a thorough guideline to use this feature effectively._
User Guide for BRicher
BRicher includes three pages: _Home_ , _Strategy Exploring,_ and _Investment diaries_.
The Home page lists the best one-step investment strategies.
The Strategy Exploring page lets you discover high-return investment strategies according to your tokens and personal settings.
Finally, on the Investment diaries page, you can monitor your selected strategies with information on their capital, ROIs, interest, start date, expiration date, and so on.
 
**Home page**
The _Home_ page lists the best one-step investment strategies for all tokens supported by BRicher. Exciting information on each strategy, such as its current ROI, ROI history, transaction fee, and reward tokens, are shown on the table. In addition, you can select a row to get detailed information on the respective strategy.
At the right upper corner of the page, you can enter your favorite token to filter strategies.
To sort the strategies, you can press on the table headers.
 
**Strategy Exploring**
To use the _Strategy Exploring_ page, you must connect your wallet first.
Choose wallet
After authenticating your wallet, you will see a screen like this:
You can search for high-return investment strategies based on your input tokens on the Strategy Exploring page. Please follow the following steps:
**Step 1**. Select the token you want to invest
**Step 2**. Select ‚Äú**More setting** ‚Äù to filter the recommended strategies
First, you can sort strategies by safety index, ROI, or a number of steps.
You can set the limit for the number of steps used in your strategies. Strategies with a low number of steps are typically safer, but strategies with a high number of steps are usually more profitable.
By default, recommended strategies use all yield farming methods. If you do not like a specific method, please deselect it.
Some vaults/pools offer very high ROI, thus dominating the recommended strategies. To explore the other strategies that do not include these vaults/pools, you can add the reward tokens of the vaults/pools to the control.
**Step 3**. Click the ‚Äú _Make strategies_ ‚Äù button
Our **algorithm** will automatically compute and return appropriate strategies for you. You should pay more attention to the strategy title (which includes names of used DApps), the safety index, the number of steps, and the Return On Investment rate.
**Step 4** : If you are interested in a strategy, please click its _‚ÄúCheck detail and Invest‚Äù_ button
BRicher will show general information on the strategy, such as its start and expiration date, reward tokens, estimated gas, ROI history, etc.
BRicher also displays all helpful information on each step. The relevant information is shown depending on the type of method used in the step (staking, depositing, borrowing, providing liquidity pair, swapping). All of them are real-time data collected by BRicher that can save your time in making decisions.
At this version of BRicher, please follow the instruction to invest manually by yourselves. Then you click on the ‚Äúmanual invest‚Äù button, enter the amount of token you have invested, and press the confirm button. BRicher will save your strategies so that you can monitor the strategy‚Äôs effectiveness (the capital, the interest, the reward token, the ROIs, etc.)
In the next version of BRicher, we will automatically implement the strategy for you, but you still own your tokens. That differentiates BRicher and other aggregators.
 
**Investment diaries**
BRicher lists all of your strategies on the _Investment diaries_ page.
You can change the name of a strategy to recognize it easily by clicking the ‚ÄúPen‚Äù icon as below:
You can also delete a strategy with the ‚ÄúTrash bin‚Äù icon:
To get detailed information on a strategy, please click the ‚ÄúDetail‚Äù button.
In addition to the basic information, BRicher helps you to estimate your interest in this strategy, based on your original capital and the ROI history.
The ROI History is illustrated in a chart. The starting point of the solid line represents the time you start your strategy.
It also displays other interesting information on your strategy that you can monitor.

Published in

Introduction to BRicher‚Äôs new functions
 _BRicher is a unique aggregator that composes multiple investment methods: providing liquidity, swapping, staking, depositing, and borrowing in the lending pools._
_In summary, these composite strategies are automatically built so that users can get the most optimized one to maximize their profit. Moreover, unlike other aggregators, BRicher lets investors own their tokens so that they can take complete control of capital and investment plans._
 
The first version of BRicher
In the first version, BRicher provided users with effective investment strategies with high returns and helped them keep track of their diaries (ROI and other critical parameters).
_An investment strategy suggested by BRicher_
However, the problem is that after discovering their best investment suggestion, users need to implement all the investing processes by themself, which is significantly time-consuming. Additionally, some ‚Äúnewbies‚Äù unfamiliar with various DApps may find it challenging to accomplish complicated operations independently.
To address these problems and provide users with more optimized options, we would like to offer new functions: Auto Investing and Semi-auto Investing.
As their name ‚Äî ‚ÄúAuto‚Äù- these two new functions will automatically simplify the investment process and save investors much time.
 
Introduction to Semi-auto Investing function
 
Introduction to Semi-auto Investing function

** _What is the Semi-auto Investing function?_**
_Semi-auto Investing is a new feature that allows users to finish different stages of the investment strategies directly on the BRicher interface rather than on other DApps._
In more detail, recommended strategies usually consist of several steps, each with smaller operations. Performing all of these tasks in multiple DApps can be challenging and time-consuming.
In this case, the Semi-auto Investing function supports users effectively by allowing them to gradually execute the strategies on only one site ‚Äî BRicher. That means even though users still need to invest step by step, there will be one button for each stage on BRicher‚Äôs interface for them to click on and complete the process easier.
 
Introduction to Semi-auto Investing function

**_What benefit does it bring to users?_**
 * It is much more convenient than the Manual Investing feature, which requires users to access each DApps and execute the required steps.
 * Investors can control and keep track of each step of the investment implementation. That helps them to deeply understand the progress and, more importantly, make the modification in each step (cancel, for example) if necessary.


 
Introduction to Auto Investing function.
 
Introduction to Auto Investing function.

**_What is the Auto Investing function?_**
Upgraded from Semi-auto Investing, the Auto investing function requires users nothing but to click one only button. By doing that, the user authorizes BRicher to fully automate every phase of the investing strategy.
 
Introduction to Auto Investing function.

**_What benefits does it bring to users?_**
 * The implementation of investment plans is made simpler by condensing complicated multi-step procedures into a single button.
 * Compared to Manual investing and Semi-auto Investing, this function saves considerable time and effort for users.


 
The fundamental difference between these two functions
For a better understanding of the essential difference between Auto investing and Semi-auto Investing, let us take an example:
Assuming that BRicher suggests users implement an investment plan that includes two main steps:
 * Swap their tokens to TRAVA on PancakeSwap
 * Stake TRAVA on the Trava governance vault to earn rewards and voting power.


With the Semi-auto Investing function, there will be two execute buttons corresponding two steps mentioned. In this case, investors can finish the investment process simply by clicking on these two buttons.
With the Auto investing function, the progress is even more optimized when they only need to click on one button.
_Notes that: Unlike other Aggregators, Bricher does not hold investors‚Äô tokens. In fact, they only authorize (approve) tokens, not transfer tokens to Bricher. Thus your tokens will always be yours._"", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://blog.trava.finance/introduction-to-bricher-auto-investing-and-semi-auto-investing-82037b50eb6b?source=collection_home_page----75e285c42203-----46-----------------------------------"", ""rrf_score"": 0.10416666666666666 }, { ""content"": ""M

Fill in the amount of capital you want to invest  Step 2. Click the ‚ÄúAuto Invest‚Äù button  After that, a list of steps and gas fee information will appear Make sure you will check all this information Step 3. To make an investment, click the ‚ÄúApprove‚Äù button to delegate BRicher to finish the whole progress for you.  Step 4. After approving the progress successfully, click the ‚ÄúExecute‚Äù button. Notes:       - After all these steps, you still need to keep track of the progress status:              + The completed step: Turning Green              + Unsuccessful step: Turning yellow as a warning notification. Once that happens, there will be an instruction pop-up window. In this case, you can follow this instruction to continue investing or cancel the whole process.       - Because of the typical requirements of each DApp, there will be some strategies that can not be invested automatically (Only Manual Investing and Semi-auto Investing are available)       - Users can only execute one investment strategy at one time. That means they must finish or cancel the previous investing progress if they want to implement the other plans. Users can implement their strategies and quit the page in the middle. We support them in resuming the implementation process. However, there might be changes in prices and other parameters that affect the strategy. ']",0.8804774284362793,0.8724768161773682,True,True

All you have to do is choose a package, answer the questions within the time limit, and receive a well-deserved reward. To participate, the only requirement is that you must own BAB tokens (Binance Account Bound). You can get some extra benefits if you invite friends to join in as well. To understand more about this event, you can refer to the content at Pottery Mechanism.
The following article will guide you in detail on how to participate and receive worthy rewards with Trava Pottery. Note that all the example images used are from the desktop interface, but don‚Äôt worry because in general, it is quite similar on other mobile devices.
 

How to join Trava Pottery

Choosing the quiz packages
There are quite a few ways for you to choose for yourself a quiz package as desired. First, you can find them right on the main screen, including the most trending ones in the system.

You will then be taken to the quiz collection page as following, where all the live quiz packages will appear, in addition, you can search for a specific package:
Or you can optionally customize your search requirements based on:
 * **Status of quiz packages,** by clicking on the ‚ÄúLive‚Äù or ‚ÄúFinished‚Äù button.


 * **Remaining time** , by clicking on the ‚ÄúTime Left‚Äù button and choosing 1 option.


 * **Reward type** , by clicking on the ‚ÄúAll Reward‚Äù button and choosing 1 option.


 

How to join Trava Pottery

Answering the questions
From the overall interface of a quiz package, you can get its name, topic, reward, and time left.
After clicking on a satisfactory package and being taken to the following interface, you press the blue ‚ÄúStart‚Äù button to start playing:
Then demonstrate your knowledge of the field by answering all questions in the package. After choosing the answer, click ‚ÄúNext‚Äù to go to the next question or ‚ÄúBack‚Äù to check and change your previous answer. For each of these questions, choose one best answer.
There is also type of questions with multiple answers, and the ‚ÄúSubmit‚Äù button only lights up when you finish answering all the questions in the package.
Accept the gas fee:

How to join Trava Pottery

Receive reward
When the quiz packages‚Äô running period has ended, users who have **correctly answered all** the questions must return to claim the reward **WITHIN 1 WEEK** , otherwise, it‚Äôll be gone.
 

Checking profile

Rewards Mechanism
You can read more details about the rewards mechanism of the Pottery here.

Vesting Pool
This includes 40% of Pottery‚Äôs total reward, which you can claim daily (24 hours), with the amount depending on the number of friends you have successfully invited to join Pottery. All you have to do is click on ‚ÄúVesting Pool‚Äù on the Profile page, then the ‚ÄúClaim‚Äù button.
 

Rewards Mechanism
You can read more details about the rewards mechanism of the Pottery here.

Leaderboard
At the bottom are the ‚ÄúLeaderboard‚Äù section, with time left in the counting period, and FAQ. They will have the following look if you have connected your Wallet:
You can click the ‚ÄúClaim‚Äù button to get your reward:
 

Rewards Mechanism
You can read more details about the rewards mechanism of the Pottery here.

Referral system
Basically, its mechanism is that those who invite friends and the friends themselves will receive a reward distributed from the referral fund, which is 10% of the total reward. In addition, the number of referees will have an impact on the percentage of rewards you can claim from the vesting pool, which has been discussed in the previous section.

Referring friends

After that you can send the code to your friends ‚Äì these referees will bring you additional rewards and some other benefits. When they use your code, your friends will appear in the referral list:
 

Rewards Mechanism

As the referee

 _To celebrate the launch of Trava Governance, we would like to open a series of_** _mini-games_** _for the Trava community, which are expected to be a fresh breeze for the whole ecosystem._
_To kick off this series, the Trava Governance Lottery program will be released on May 19, 2022._
Trava Governance ‚Äî The Lottery Program
 
**What is the Trava Governance Lottery?**
This unique, exclusive event provides users who lock TRAVA, rTRAVA, and LP BNB/TRAVA in the Trava Governance vault the chance to gain rewards.
Depending on the voting power that you own, you can get a list of random numbers. Those who own the lucky number chosen by the program‚Äôs smart contract will earn rewards.
 
**How does it work, and how to participate in the lottery?**
To join the lottery, first, you need to lock TRAVA, rTRAVA, or LP BNB/TRAVA to the Trava governance vault. By doing that, you will gain the voting power that helps you to get the random numbers. The more voting power you have, the more numbers you attain. That also means you will have a better chance of winning the lottery if you have more voting power.
Note that, the amount of lottery numbers you have will be determined by the real-time voting power at 3 P.M UTC on 19th, May 2022. You can check this information on our dashboard.
In more detail, the correspondence between the voting power and lottery numbers amount you own is shown below:
Before running the lottery, you can keep track of your lottery number on the dashboard
 * There will be ten rolls in 10 hours (1 roll for each hour).
 * For each roll, the lucky number will be revealed on our dashboard.
 * Users who own this number will gain one ticket to buy a Trava Knight NFT chest that is usually set at 5000 TRAVA.


 
**_To sum up, what do you need to attain the benefits?_**
 * Lock your tokens (TRAVA, rTRAVA, LP TRAVA/BNB) now to get the lucky numbers https://app.trava.finance/governance/locker
 * Update the lucky number for each lottery roll
 * If you are the lucky one, congratulations, you have the chance to earn the NFT ticket
 * If not: Don‚Äôt worry, let‚Äôs try your luck the next time.

 * If not: Don‚Äôt worry, let‚Äôs try your luck the next time.

_To ensure transparency, we will make all the information relating to this lottery public, including:_
 * The lucky number of each roll
 * The wallet address of people who own the lucky numbers
 * The code will be fully revealed

Trava Pottery is a Quiz-to-earn game developed by Trava.Finance with the purpose to improve users‚Äô understanding of this Ecosystem. We will provide you with various packages of questions with different topics, rewards, and time limits. All you have to do is choose a package, answer the questions within the time limit, and receive a well-deserved reward. To participate, the only requirement is that you must own BAB tokens (Binance Account Bound). You can get some extra benefits if you invite friends to join in as well. To understand more about this event, you can refer to the content at Pottery Mechanism.
The following article will guide you in detail on how to participate and receive worthy rewards with Trava Pottery. Note that all the example images used are from the desktop interface, but don‚Äôt worry because in general, it is quite similar on other mobile devices.
 

How to join Trava Pottery
 

How to join Trava Pottery

Trava Pottery Entrance
Visit the main site of Trava Pottery: https://pottery.trava.finance/
You will be reminded to connect your wallet if you haven‚Äôt. You can select and authorize the wallet you want depending on your preferences, but make sure that it has a BAB token. BAB is a non-transferable token with no monetary value ‚Äì its main use is to prove that the owner of the wallet has verified their identity. You can check how to mint BAB tokens .
The main frame of the Trava Pottery looks like this:"", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://docs.trava.finance/user-guide/trava-pottery-user-guide"", ""rrf_score"": 0.125 }, { ""content"": ""As mentioned, with each quiz package, we will set a particular reward amount to distribute equally to the winners of each package. For example, if the total rewards of the Trava Pool Creation Package are 1000$ and there are 10 winners, each can get up to 100$.
However, this amount will not be fully sent to the winner but also be contributed to the other funds used for philanthropy activities, or rewarding the Governance, Top user, etc.
In particular, the reward (as in the example is 100$) will be spent as below:
 * 40%: For winners directly through their wallets (claimable within one week after the quiz end)**.**
 * 40%: For winners through the vesting pool.
 * 5%: For the top 5 users of all quiz packages.
 * 5%: For the Governance (veTRAVA holders).
 * 10%: For referral rewards - If there is no referral, this amount will be used for philanthropy.

Choosing the quiz packages
There are quite a few ways for you to choose for yourself a quiz package as desired. First, you can find them right on the main screen, including the most trending ones in the system.
If you‚Äôve answered all of them or don‚Äôt see a satisfactory quiz package, you can expand your search by clicking ‚ÄúExplorer‚Äù located on the top, or the ‚ÄúView all‚Äù button on the right-hand side.
You will then be taken to the quiz collection page as following, where all the live quiz packages will appear, in addition, you can search for a specific package:
Or you can optionally customize your search requirements based on:
 * **Status of quiz packages,** by clicking on the ‚ÄúLive‚Äù or ‚ÄúFinished‚Äù button.


 * **Remaining time** , by clicking on the ‚ÄúTime Left‚Äù button and choosing 1 option.


 * **Reward type** , by clicking on the ‚ÄúAll Reward‚Äù button and choosing 1 option.


 

How to join Trava Pottery

Answering the questions
From the overall interface of a quiz package, you can get its name, topic, reward, and time left.
After clicking on a satisfactory package and being taken to the following interface, you press the blue ‚ÄúStart‚Äù button to start playing:
Then demonstrate your knowledge of the field by answering all questions in the package. After choosing the answer, click ‚ÄúNext‚Äù to go to the next question or ‚ÄúBack‚Äù to check and change your previous answer. For each of these questions, choose one best answer.
There is also type of questions with multiple answers, and the ‚ÄúSubmit‚Äù button only lights up when you finish answering all the questions in the package.
Accept the gas fee:
If there‚Äôs still time left for the quiz package, you will have to wait before you can claim the reward. During that time, you can join other packages, possibly ones with the same topic.
 

How to join Trava Pottery

Receive reward
When the quiz packages‚Äô running period has ended, users who have **correctly answered all** the questions must return to claim the reward **WITHIN 1 WEEK** , otherwise, it‚Äôll be gone.
 

Checking profile
Click on your account number to access the profile page:
On the profile page, you will know the information about your level, the amount of rewards earned and claimed, the number of people referred, and your quiz packages organized by their status:
 * Pending (your finished quiz packages waiting to end)
 * Claimable (your quiz packages that ended but you have not received the reward)
 * Claimed (your quiz packages that you have received rewards)
 * Lost (quiz packages for which you do not receive a reward)"", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://docs.trava.finance/user-guide/trava-pottery-user-guide"", ""rrf_score"": 0.09545454545454546 }, { ""content"": ""Trava Pottery is a quiz-to-earn game for the Trava Community to dig deeper into the Trava Ecosystem while still gaining significant rewards.

Thus, players completing the quiz on time will receive appropriate rewards.

The veTRAVA Marketplace is a peer-to-peer (P2P) trading platform within Trava where users can:

""content"": ""Introduction
veTRAVA Marketplace is a fresh move toward furthering Trava Governance, and perfecting a fully decentralized market. With its launch, you will be able to freely buy and sell veTRAVA, which represents voting power in the ecosystem. Therefore, veTRAVA Marketplace helps to distribute decision-making rights in the community, implementing decentralization. It also brings along many other benefits, which you can learn more in this article about veTRAVA Marketplace.
The following article will guide you through how to operate on the veTRAVA Marketplace, with details on the two main topics of buying and selling veTRAVA.
 

Join veTRAVA Marketplace
**Step 1:** Visit the main site of veTRAVA Marketplace: https://nft-app.trava.finance/marketplace/ve-trava.
**Step 2:** Connect your wallet.
 

How to buy veTRAVA
In the main area of veTRAVA Marketplace, you will see sales orders being put up by other members of the community. Each of them is shown with detailed information such as voting power, price, ‚Ä¶ so that you can choose the one that best suits your requirements.
 

How to buy veTRAVA
In the main area of veTRAVA Marketplace, you will see sales orders being put up by other members of the community. Each of them is shown with detailed information such as voting power, price, ‚Ä¶ so that you can choose the one that best suits your requirements.

_Customizations_
You can also set requirements to find exactly what you want to buy:
  * Search for anything, or find a specific veTRAVA Owner and sale ID by clicking ‚ÄúSearch All‚Äù and then type in what you are looking for:


  * Sort sales orders in veTRAVA Marketplace by clicking the ‚ÄúSort by‚Äù button.


  * Filter sales orders by Rank and Price Range you can offer, by clicking the ‚ÄúFilters‚Äù button and then customize according to your requirements.


 

How to buy veTRAVA
In the main area of veTRAVA Marketplace, you will see sales orders being put up by other members of the community. Each of them is shown with detailed information such as voting power, price, ‚Ä¶ so that you can choose the one that best suits your requirements.

_Buying veTRAVA_
**Step 1:** Just click on any sale slot:
**Step 2:** You will be directed to this page, click the ‚ÄúBuy‚Äù button:
**Step 3:** Confirm the money in the transaction and wait for it to be done:
 

How to sell veTRAVA
**Step 1:** Click the ‚ÄúCreate‚Äù button on the main site of veTRAVA Marketplace.
**Step 2:** Choose the amount of veTRAVA you want and click the ‚ÄúSell‚Äù button.
**Step 3:** Choose between two tokens, TRAVA and BUSD, and then enter the number you want for your veTRAVA.
**Step 4:** Click the ‚ÄúSell‚Äù button.
**Step 5:** Confirm your Transaction.
 

Important notes - How reasonable prices of veTRAVA are set?
Exchanging veTRAVA on the veTRAVA marketplace also means exchanging: 
  * Voting power.
  * Initial tokens locked: Buyers will get all token amounts locked in the first place.
  * Total rewards: Buyers will receive total rewards including both weekly rewards and warm-up rewards sellers received during their locking period.


That means when selling or buying veTRAVA, you should consider all these factors to set (if you‚Äôre a seller) or to choose (if you‚Äôre a buyer) a reasonable price. 
After clicking on each veTRAVA spot, all this information will be shown as follows:

Published in
3 min readFeb 9, 2023
Share
Introduction to veTRAVA Marketplace
 _Along with the launch of Trava Governance, veTRAVA Marketplace brings Trava Finance to the next level of ‚ÄúDecentralized‚Äù by enabling peer-to-peer exchanging voting power, fostering the decision-making power of the whole ecosystem._ # What Is veTRAVA And Its Benefits?
 ## What is veTRAVA?
To fulfill the ‚Äúdecentralized‚Äù part of the Trava Decentralized Marketplace, we launched Trava Governance, based on the Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO) model, to give users decision-making power. In this case, veTRAVA, in the form of NFT, represents this power and is determined by the time and amount of locked tokens (as they show your commitment toward the future of Trava Finance).
With the implementation of the Trava Governance Vault, users can lock their TRAVA, rTRAVA, and LP TRAVA/BNB into this vault to receive a certain amount of veTRAVA representing their powers: the more veTRAVA you own, the higher your voting power in the Trava ecosystem. ## The Benefits Of Owning veTRAVA
The key value of veTRAVA is its representative of users‚Äô power and their commitment to the project. As a result, in the long term, users who own veTRAVA can receive significant benefits:
 * Deciding on crucial parameters such as LTV, risk parameters, etc., in the lending pools (Trava Lending Pool and Users-owned Pools).
 * Receiving share profit coming from the fee charged by borrowers
 * Receiving boosting rewards **in rTRAVA** by providing liquidity and holding veTRAVA at the same time.
 * Earning TRAVA reward: the APR will be revealed soon.


As mentioned, veTRAVA is utilized as a form of NFT. For now, it can only be available for those who lock their token into the Governance Vault. However, it will be exchanged peer-to-peer with the launch of veTRAVA Marketplace. # veTRAVA Marketplace: Overview
As its name suggests, the veTRAVA marketplace is for users to buy and sell their veTRAVA. It means they can freely exchange their voting power. The main reason we came up with this idea is to optimize users‚Äô experience, bringing them as much freedom as possible. It‚Äôs the ‚ÄúDecentralization‚Äù we are heading for.
Besides bringing more freedom to users, veTRAVA Marketplace increases liquidity for veTRAVA and thus benefits both sellers and buyers. In more detail, buyers can buy veTRAVA (voting power) easily on Marketplace and then earn voting power immediately. In this case, the remaining locking time will be more flexible, no longer limited to a particular period set in the Governance Vault. When it comes to sellers, they can easily utilize crypto assets in a more liberal way and get benefits from it. ## The Influences of veTRAVA Marketplace
veTRAVA Marketplace is an important feature that contributes to the development of Trava Governance. As mentioned above, users who hold many veTRAVA will have a crucial role in the decision-making process of the Trava Finance ecosystem. The veTRAVA holders can alternate the voting results, and through the Marketplace, users can buy or sell the voting power with others.
With the fact that users can trade their voting power to each other, anyone in the ecosystem will have a chance to vote for the changes they want to make in Trava Finance. The more users have veTRAVA, the more voting power is distributed, and users will be given the full power to make the decisions that can affect the Decentralized Lending Marketplace, which will elevate the decentralized side of Trava Finance‚Äôs ultimate goal."", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://blog.trava.finance/introduction-to-vetrava-marketplace-c9092a0c51c8"", ""rrf_score"": 0.0625 }, { ""content"": ""## Introduction of Trava Ticket Marketplace

Introduction
veTRAVA Marketplace is a fresh move toward furthering Trava Governance, and perfecting a fully decentralized market. With its launch, you will be able to freely buy and sell veTRAVA, which represents voting power in the ecosystem. Therefore, veTRAVA Marketplace helps to distribute decision-making rights in the community, implementing decentralization. It also brings along many other benefits, which you can learn more in this article about veTRAVA Marketplace.
The following article will guide you through how to operate on the veTRAVA Marketplace, with details on the two main topics of buying and selling veTRAVA. ##
Join veTRAVA Marketplace
**Step 1:** Visit the main site of veTRAVA Marketplace: https://nft-app.trava.finance/marketplace/ve-trava.
**Step 2:** Connect your wallet. ##
How to buy veTRAVA
In the main area of veTRAVA Marketplace, you will see sales orders being put up by other members of the community. Each of them is shown with detailed information such as voting power, price, ‚Ä¶ so that you can choose the one that best suits your requirements. ###
_Customizations_
You can also set requirements to find exactly what you want to buy:
 * Search for anything, or find a specific veTRAVA Owner and sale ID by clicking ‚ÄúSearch All‚Äù and then type in what you are looking for:


 * Sort sales orders in veTRAVA Marketplace by clicking the ‚ÄúSort by‚Äù button.


 * Filter sales orders by Rank and Price Range you can offer, by clicking the ‚ÄúFilters‚Äù button and then customize according to your requirements. ###
_Buying veTRAVA_
**Step 1:** Just click on any sale slot:
**Step 2:** You will be directed to this page, click the ‚ÄúBuy‚Äù button:
**Step 3:** Confirm the money in the transaction and wait for it to be done: ##
How to sell veTRAVA
**Step 1:** Click the ‚ÄúCreate‚Äù button on the main site of veTRAVA Marketplace.
**Step 2:** Choose the amount of veTRAVA you want and click the ‚ÄúSell‚Äù button.
**Step 3:** Choose between two tokens, TRAVA and BUSD, and then enter the number you want for your veTRAVA.
**Step 4:** Click the ‚ÄúSell‚Äù button.
**Step 5:** Confirm your Transaction. ##
Important notes - How reasonable prices of veTRAVA are set?
Exchanging veTRAVA on the veTRAVA marketplace also means exchanging: 
 * Voting power.
 * Initial tokens locked: Buyers will get all token amounts locked in the first place.
 * Total rewards: Buyers will receive total rewards including both weekly rewards and warm-up rewards sellers received during their locking period.


That means when selling or buying veTRAVA, you should consider all these factors to set (if you‚Äôre a seller) or to choose (if you‚Äôre a buyer) a reasonable price. 
After clicking on each veTRAVA spot, all this information will be shown as follows:

Published in
3 min readNov 17, 2022
Share
The Trava Ticket Marketplace Mechanism
 _Besides Trava Counter, Ticket Marketplace is also a platform for users to buy, sell and exchange Tickets. Moreover, now with the new mechanism of Liquidity Pool for TRAVA/Ticket, the Marketplace is becoming more and more attractive than ever! Let‚Äôs have a better understanding of The Ticket Marketplace before it launches._ # What is Ticket Marketplace?
Ticket Marketplace is where users can come to buy or sell Tickets. Just like other NFT Marketplaces, this platform supports peer-to-peer transactions, in which sellers can determine the Ticket prices and buyers can freely choose the suitable prices to buy.
Moreover, in order to celebrate the events of Presale and Public Offering, Ticket Marketplace applies the Liquidity Pool mechanism, including swapping and providing liquidity, so that users can gain additional profits. # Ticket Marketplace Sell and Buy Mechanisms
Similar to other NFT Marketplaces, the Trava Ticket Marketplace basis mechanism supports peer-to-peer transactions. Sellers can set their own preferred prices for Tickets and sell them. Moreover, sellers can pay an extra fee in TRAVA to pin their Tickets on the top page and attract more buyers. Sellers can set the Ticket prices and gain more profit depending on the gap between the selling price and purchasing cost.
In terms of buyers, they can find good Ticket prices on the Marketplace to purchase. Instead of buying from the Counter, buyers can freely choose the Ticket on the Marketplace at a much more affordable price.
This Sell and Buy Mechanism of Ticket Marketplace can be applied for all three types of Tickets, including Counter Ticket, Presale Ticket, and Incentive Ticket. # Presale Ticket/TRAVA Pool
After the Presale and the ongoing Public Offering, Trava Team has decided to implement a Liquidity Pool in the Ticket Marketplace. This mechanism consists of 2 main actions, swapping and providing liquidity.
**‚ÄºÔ∏è Note:** **This pool is FIRST APPLIED FOR PRESALE TICKETS.** ## Swap Ticket or Trava
Users can swap Presale Ticket to Trava or Trava to Presale Ticket with the listing price of $1.2. The price will be converted to TRAVA price at the listing time.
For example, Alice wants to swap 1 Presale Ticket to TRAVA with the price of TRAVA at that time was $0,000415, and the listing price is fixed at $1.2
=> Alice will receive ~2.891 TRAVA.
With the swapping Ticket or Trava mechanism, users can gain benefits by receiving larger profits than buying Ticket from Presale or Public Offering. Instead of owning a Ticket that has the price of $0.6 from Presale, the Ticket from swapping has a higher value and can be swapped with a larger amount of TRAVA. ## Provide Liquidity
Besides swapping, there will also be a pool for TRAVA/Ticket. Users will have to provide Presale Tickets and TRAVA to receive TRAVA/Presale Ticket pair.
With this mechanism, liquidity providers can receive trading fees as rewards when the pool starts to facilitate trades.
**‚ÄºÔ∏è NOTE:_THE LIQUIDITY POOL WILL BE LAUNCHED ON NOVEMBER 21, 2022!_**"", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://blog.trava.finance/introduction-of-trava-ticket-marketplace-5a04826eebf5?source=collection_home_page----75e285c42203-----37-----------------------------------"", ""rrf_score"": 0.08391608391608392 }, { ""content"": ""##
**Does Trava apply NFTs in the ecosystem?**
Yes, TRAVA allows users to use all of these asset types as collaterals. Before that, the special digital assets must be priced through auctions. The auction winners are involved in the lending contract. They can either possess the digital asset at a low price or earn a considerable profit from the contract. ##
**How does Trava price NFTs?**
Trava will provide the auction function for NFT assets. Thus, the NFT's owners can open an auction session to price the NFT. The auction winner can buy directly the NFT or he/she can join in a collateral smart contract by locking their NFT's payment. In this way, we can price, and put NFT into the lending process. Besides, our approach also helps increase the liquidity for NFT because the asset can be used in the lending business in an easy way. We also avoid the price fluctuation of NFT because the NFTs have been priced in the auction contract before. ##
**What can I do with NFTs after the auction?**
TRAVA.FINANCE auction mechanism is divided into two modes: auction-to-sell and auction-for-buy-right. The difference between two modes is the ownership of the digital asset after the auction. In the auction-to-sell mode, as soon as the auction ends and the auction winner pays the fee, he/she will immediately receive the auctioned NFT.
Meanwhile, in the auction-for-buy-right mode, the winner cannot immediately buy the digital asset. After a certain amount of time specified in the auction, if the NFT owners cannot repay the loan, the auction winner can buy it at a low price. Otherwise, they get a considerable interest if the NFT owners repay the loan and get their NFT back.

Published in
3 min readFeb 9, 2023

Introduction to veTRAVA Marketplace
 _Along with the launch of Trava Governance, veTRAVA Marketplace brings Trava Finance to the next level of ‚ÄúDecentralized‚Äù by enabling peer-to-peer exchanging voting power, fostering the decision-making power of the whole ecosystem._ # What Is veTRAVA And Its Benefits?
 ## What is veTRAVA?
To fulfill the ‚Äúdecentralized‚Äù part of the Trava Decentralized Marketplace, we launched Trava Governance, based on the Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO) model, to give users decision-making power. In this case, veTRAVA, in the form of NFT, represents this power and is determined by the time and amount of locked tokens (as they show your commitment toward the future of Trava Finance).
With the implementation of the Trava Governance Vault, users can lock their TRAVA, rTRAVA, and LP TRAVA/BNB into this vault to receive a certain amount of veTRAVA representing their powers: the more veTRAVA you own, the higher your voting power in the Trava ecosystem. ## The Benefits Of Owning veTRAVA
The key value of veTRAVA is its representative of users‚Äô power and their commitment to the project. As a result, in the long term, users who own veTRAVA can receive significant benefits:
 * Deciding on crucial parameters such as LTV, risk parameters, etc., in the lending pools (Trava Lending Pool and Users-owned Pools).
 * Receiving share profit coming from the fee charged by borrowers
 * Receiving boosting rewards **in rTRAVA** by providing liquidity and holding veTRAVA at the same time.
 * Earning TRAVA reward: the APR will be revealed soon.


As mentioned, veTRAVA is utilized as a form of NFT. For now, it can only be available for those who lock their token into the Governance Vault. However, it will be exchanged peer-to-peer with the launch of veTRAVA Marketplace. # veTRAVA Marketplace: Overview
As its name suggests, the veTRAVA marketplace is for users to buy and sell their veTRAVA. It means they can freely exchange their voting power. The main reason we came up with this idea is to optimize users‚Äô experience, bringing them as much freedom as possible. It‚Äôs the ‚ÄúDecentralization‚Äù we are heading for.
Besides bringing more freedom to users, veTRAVA Marketplace increases liquidity for veTRAVA and thus benefits both sellers and buyers. In more detail, buyers can buy veTRAVA (voting power) easily on Marketplace and then earn voting power immediately. In this case, the remaining locking time will be more flexible, no longer limited to a particular period set in the Governance Vault. When it comes to sellers, they can easily utilize crypto assets in a more liberal way and get benefits from it. ## The Influences of veTRAVA Marketplace
veTRAVA Marketplace is an important feature that contributes to the development of Trava Governance. As mentioned above, users who hold many veTRAVA will have a crucial role in the decision-making process of the Trava Finance ecosystem. The veTRAVA holders can alternate the voting results, and through the Marketplace, users can buy or sell the voting power with others.
With the fact that users can trade their voting power to each other, anyone in the ecosystem will have a chance to vote for the changes they want to make in Trava Finance. The more users have veTRAVA, the more voting power is distributed, and users will be given the full power to make the decisions that can affect the Decentralized Lending Marketplace, which will elevate the decentralized side of Trava Finance‚Äôs ultimate goal."", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://blog.trava.finance/introduction-to-vetrava-marketplace-c9092a0c51c8"", ""rrf_score"": 0.07142857142857142 }, { ""content"": ""##

Introduction to BRicher Investment Portfolio
 _BRicher is a unique aggregator that composes multiple investment methods: Providing liquidity, swapping, staking, depositing, and borrowing in the lending pools. BRicher can automatically build up the most optimized strategies for users to maximize their profit._
_For the continuous development of BRicher, we implement the new and innovative function ‚Äî_** _Investment Portfolio_** _, which gathers and analyzes users‚Äô investment data from various DApps. As a result, while similar apps show users‚Äô balances only, BRicher helps users effectively manage their total assets (balance, loans, deposits) and shows comprehensive information about their investment on various DApps; all are displayed in a single place._
 
**What problem does BRicher Investment Portfolio tend to solve, and what do users gain from it?**
DApps and tokens come in a wide variety due to the size of the DeFi world. If investors put their money into different DApps, It would be challenging for them to:
 * Grasp the total value of tokens in their balance and the total amount of their deposits and borrows.
 * Keep track of the ecosystems/protocols they are borrowing/depositing and their financial performance.


In addition, unmanageable and complicated information storage also leads to difficulties in making the right and quick decision, which plays a significant role in the blockchain world.
**_Investment Portfolio is therefore designed to address these issues and provide consumers with the following benefits:_**
 * Keep track of the fluctuation in their balance, loans, deposits, and total assets.
 * Monitor investment processes in different protocols and easily compare the investments‚Äô capital, return, and ROI.
 * Get notifications and warnings when opening the portfolio pages. In the latter version, such warnings will be available via email and Telegram.


 
**What differentiates BRicher‚Äôs investment portfolio from others?**
_To solve the existing problems and give users the best user experience, we provide them with the following distinctive features:_
 
**What differentiates BRicher‚Äôs investment portfolio from others?**
_To solve the existing problems and give users the best user experience, we provide them with the following distinctive features:_

**Calculation of Balance, loans, deposits, and total assets**
It is easy to check the balance, but almost all investors have problems managing their loans, deposits, and total assets. BRicher addresses these problems and calculates these parameters for them. Information is designed and presented in an elegant manner so that the investors can easily get insights.
 
**What differentiates BRicher‚Äôs investment portfolio from others?**
_To solve the existing problems and give users the best user experience, we provide them with the following distinctive features:_

**Collects and displays key metrics related to users‚Äô investing plans across different DApps.**
As usual, users have to go to each DApps and look up the needed information which is inconvenient and time-consuming. However, with BRicher, all these data are collected and displayed in the same place. As a result, users can easily compare the amount of money locked, the claimable bonuses, the current ROI, and the historical ROI of each investment strategy.
Bricher currently classifies two investment options related to lending pools and staking vaults. Depending on the option type, more detailed information will be presented when the user clicks on a specific option. For example, with a lending pool, they can see the total borrows, deposits, deposited and borrowed tokens, health factors, etc."", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://blog.trava.finance/introduction-to-brichers-investment-portfolio-5032d7598ff7?source=collection_home_page----75e285c42203-----49-----------------------------------"", ""rrf_score"": 0.15476190476190477 }, { ""content"": ""To make it easier for you to track your position and assets, we have added the Portfolio feature.
This feature will display your position in the Lending Pool when you use Smart Wallet to perform actions in the pools in the Trava ecosystem. Or if you create an order to sell Armoury items, Portfolio will display those NFTs for sale, and the amount of money you have in your Smart Wallet from the sale. With more actions and features added in the future, the Portfolio page will also show more user information and details related to the Station.

BRicher includes three main pages: Home, Strategy Exploring and Portfolio.


**Home page introduction**
The _Home_ page lists the best one-step investment strategies for all tokens supported by BRicher. Information on each strategy, such as its current ROI, ROI history, transaction fee and reward tokens are shown in the table. In addition, you can select a row to get detailed information on the respective strategy.
At the right upper corner of the page, you can enter your favorite token to filter strategies.
To sort the strategies, you can press on the table headers.

BRicher includes three main pages: Home, Strategy Exploring and Portfolio.


**Strategy Exploring**
In this section, you can search for high-return investment strategies based on your input tokens. Every time you access this page, BRicher automatically calculates and presents the best strategies to you.
**Step 1.** To use the Strategy Exploring page, you must connect and authenticate your wallet first:**-** Click the ‚ÄúConnect wallet‚Äù button, choose a wallet, enter your password and confirm. - Then click the ‚ÄúAuthenticate‚Äù button.
**Step 2.** Select the token you prefer to invest in by clicking one option under the line ‚ÄúSelect token to invest‚Äù.
**Step 3.** Select ‚ÄúMore setting‚Äù to filter the recommended strategies
 * First, you can sort strategies by safety index, ROI, or the number of steps of the strategies.


 * You can also set the limit for the number of steps used in your strategies. Strategies with a low number of steps are typically safer, but strategies with a high number of steps are usually more profitable.


 * By default, recommended strategies are automatically composed of all yield farming methods. If you do not like a specific method, please deselect it.


 * Some vaults/pools offer very high ROI, and they thus dominate the recommended strategies. To explore the other strategies that DO NOT include these vaults/pools, you can add the reward tokens of the vaults/pools to the control.


**Step 4.** Click the ‚ÄúMake strategies‚Äù button
 * Our algorithm will automatically compute and return appropriate strategies to you. You should pay more attention to the strategy title (which includes names of used DApps), the safety index, the number of steps, and the Return On Investment rate.

BRicher includes three main pages: Home, Strategy Exploring and Portfolio.


**Make Investment**
After exploring the recommended strategies, if you are interested in a strategy, please click its _‚ÄúCheck detail and Invest‚Äù_ button.
BRicher will show general information on the strategy, such as its start and expiration date, reward tokens, estimated gas, ROI history, etc.
BRicher also displays all helpful information on each step. The relevant information is shown depending on the type of method used in the step (staking, depositing, borrowing, providing liquidity pair, swapping). All of them are real-time data collected by BRicher that can save time in making decisions.
There are three methods to make a strategy: manual investing, semi-auto investing and auto investing. The basic difference between these three is the level that BRicher supports you to make your investment.
 * Manual Investing: You need to access each DApps to implement each step by yourself.
 * Semi-auto Investing: You only need to stay on the BRicher site, and for each step, you simply click on an ‚ÄúExecute‚Äù button. 
 * Auto Investing: All you need to do is click on one button to authorize BRicher to complete the whole process.

Website: https://app.trava.finance/bricher/
BRicher includes three main pages: Home, Strategy Exploring and Portfolio.


**Portfolio**
_You first need to connect your wallet to use these functions._
Then, click the ‚ÄúPortfolio‚Äù button, and a list of sub-functions will appear, including Asset, BRicher Diaries, Your Investment and Notification.

**‚ÄúYour Investment‚Äù section**
This section will display key metrics related to users‚Äô investing plans across different DApps.
As you can see, you can check the total investment and average ROI on the main site.
We categorize your investment into two types, lending, and vault. You can click on the three buttons ‚ÄúAll‚Äù, ‚ÄúLending‚Äù and ‚ÄúVault‚Äù to check your TVL, ROI, your reward, your deposit, your borrow and ROI history. You can click the protocol name for more detailed information.

Now, Trava Station does help reduce the time-consuming steps of changing dApps, but you still need to drag and drop from the start again. Or you would have to spend time figuring out which actions are required and in what order. All these operations can be so boring and laborious.
Therefore, we would like to introduce Tramlines, a new feature added into Trava Station on October 11, 2023 üëâ https://app.trava.finance/station/tramlines.
It provides users with common sets of pre-arranged actions to import, which are called Routes. In each route, the name will be displayed, followed by the description, requirements and so on. Tramlines also estimates the amount of gas needed using Trava Station, then compares it to the amount when performing each action separately like normal. After choosing, now you can edit the amount for each factor in Freight according to your needs.
If you have any wanted actions in your mind, feel free to suggest them to us ‚Äî even though the Bug Hunt has ended, Suggestions topic in Trava Forum will continue to be open. Tramlines are constantly being improved and we will add more Routes to make your experience more convenient. For now, here are the ones already been released:
_**Borrowing needed assets with TRAVA**_
Using this route, you will only need to choose the needed amounts of TRAVA and assets you want. For the rest, Trava Station will help you complete the middle steps including swapping TRAVA for USDT and depositing into the Lending Pool to borrow wanted assets.
 * Pull TRAVA
 * Swap TRAVA for min USDT
 * Deposit USDT in Trava Lending Pool
 * Borrow USDT from Trava Lending Pool
 * Send USDT


 _**Buying NFT Armoury items with BNB**_
With this route, you can use your BNB to buy Armoury items. Actions are already available for you to wrap BNB to WBNB to convert to TRAVA while ensuring the excess amount will not stay in your Smart wallet for safety.
 * Wrap
 * Swap WBNB for min TRAVA
 * Buy armoury in Trava NFT Marketplace
 * Send WBNB
 * Send TRAVA


 _**Staking your TRAVA after the NFT Auction.**_
Instead of having to go through the trouble of finalizing your NFT Auction, getting TRAVA, and then moving to the Staking website to do the rest, Trava Station will complete it all for you in just one transaction. With this route, the amount of TRAVA earned from your NFT Auction will be directly staked to Trava Vault in Staking.
 * Finalize your auction on Trava NFT _(Coming soon)_
 * Stake TRAVA in Trava Staking
 * Send TRAVA action


 _**Claiming rTRAVA from Trava Lending Pool to stake to**_
This route includes actions for you to claim rTRAVA rewards from our Lending Pool, then pull that amount of token to Smart Wallet to stake directly into rTrava vault in Trava Staking, without needing to change dApps in between actions.
 * Claim rTRAVA from Trava Lending Pool
 * Pull rTRAVA
 * Stake rTRAVA in Trava Staking


 _**Claiming rewards from Trava Lending Pool and Staking**_
This route includes actions for you to claim rTRAVA from our Lending Pool, and TRAVA rewards from vaults belonging to Trava Staking, then send that amount of rTRAVA/TRAVA from Smart Wallet to your original Wallet.
 * Claim rTRAVA from Trava Lending Pool
 * Withdraw rTRAVA in Trava Staking
 * Withdraw BNB/TRAVA in Trava Staking
 * Withdraw TRAVA in Trava Staking
 * Withdraw rTRAVA in Trava Staking
 * Send TRAVA
 * Send rTRAVA


 _**Joining Trava Governance with your staked**_
This route will help you get the staked BNB/TRAVA, lock it into Trava Governance, and claim your rewards from the Vault. Trava Station has neatly arranged a process that includes many steps so that you can operate as easily as possible.
 * Withdraw BNB/TRAVA in Trava Staking
 * Create lock on Trava Governance _(Coming soon)_
 * Claim TRAVA from Trava Staking


 _More coming soon‚Ä¶_

 _On November 9, Trava Team organized an AMA session with the agenda: our ongoing projects and next steps, presenting our Roadmap for 2024._
Recap Text AMA Trava Finance Insights: Leading The Way Forward
Recently, Trava Finance announced the Roadmap for 2024 and prepared to turn for a new direction. There were also a lot of new products being released, and will be released soon. That‚Äôs why we decided to launch the AMA ‚ÄúArrive at Trava Station‚Äù on November 9 (2023), with the attendance of Ms. Tilly ‚Äî Community Mod, Mr. Minh Nguyen ‚Äî CEO & Co-founder of Trava Finance and Mr. Dat Trinh ‚Äî Head of Data Analysis & Co-founder of Trava Finance. The main agenda of this TEXT AMA was:
üëâ Discussion on Trava products at the moment, especially Trava Station.
üëâ Information about upcoming activities and product releases.
üëâ Community questions.
 
Discuss about the present product, especially Trava Station
 
Discuss about the present product, especially Trava Station

It‚Äôs clear that lately the focus of Trava Finance has been Trava Station. Can you tell us what it is and the features this new product currently has, Mr. Minh?
> _Mr. Minh Nguyen:_
Launched on Mainnet on September 21, Trava Station is a product we created with the goal of giving users the most convenient experience in the Trava ecosystem. At this transit point, you can combine all DeFi actions in just one transaction, reducing time and fees compared to making multiple transactions on different platforms.
The ultimate goal of Trava Station is to enhance user performance. I think this is a very good feature for our users. You can experience it here üëâ https://app.trava.finance/station
For new users, Trava Station has a total of 4 main functions, including Freight, Portfolio, Tramlines and Junction, with the first three already launched as of now. The users can use Portfolio to track information, positions, and assets of their Smart Wallet in Trava Station.
Meanwhile, Freight is where you can click, drag, and drop multiple actions in the Trava ecosystem to make a single transaction. The latest feature released ‚Äî Tramlines ‚Äî include a set of pre-created Routes of common actions that you can import for personal uses in Trava Station üëâ https://app.trava.finance/station/tramlines
 
Discuss about the present product, especially Trava Station

The product is really easy to use and convenient, right everyone? It can be seen that Trava Station has been developed to a certain level, so is there anything else the team is preparing to make it even better, Mr. Dat?
> _Mr. Dat Trinh:_
Of course there is! If you have been following our newly released Roadmap, you can see that we have planned many stages for this product. First of all, we have been updating existing features in Trava Station, adding actions to Freight and routes to Tramlines. If you have any suggestions, please voice it in the community or go to the Forum topic.
We will also release the last feature in the group, which is Junction. It can essentially allow users to create Routes that only execute when a certain index or criteria that you have preset appears. In addition, to achieve the goals in our roadmap, we will also incorporate data analytics into Trava Station. This will provide the necessary information for developing and applying Generative AI technology to our system.
