Published in
4 min readMay 31, 2022
Share
 _Trava Finance is a decentralized, transparent, and secured lending marketplace that offers users a flexible mechanism to create and manage their lending pools to start a lending business._
_In May 2022, we have achieved some critical milestones in reaching our long-term goals. This article will bring you an_ _overview_ _of these achievements._
_Check out the two infographics below:_
Trava ecosystem in May 2022Trava ecosystem in May 2022
 
Trava Governance
Trava Governance module aims to bring the protocol to a new level of decentralization ‚Äî Trava DAO. This module presents an on-chain governance mechanism, where the Trava community can propose and vote on protocol changes and improvements to participating in the protocols‚Äô decision-making process.
On May 19th, 2022, we officially launched the Trava Governance, the power now in the hand of the community. To prepare for this important event and to enrich this whole ecosystem, we implement essential features, including:
 
Trava Governance
Trava Governance module aims to bring the protocol to a new level of decentralization ‚Äî Trava DAO. This module presents an on-chain governance mechanism, where the Trava community can propose and vote on protocol changes and improvements to participating in the protocols‚Äô decision-making process.
On May 19th, 2022, we officially launched the Trava Governance, the power now in the hand of the community. To prepare for this important event and to enrich this whole ecosystem, we implement essential features, including:

Trava Governance Vault
Trava Governance Vault is a practical feature used for determining the voting power and reward of users who lock TRAVA, rTRAVA, or LP TRAVA/BNB in this vault.
In fact, Trava Governance Vault offers flexible locking terms to provide multiple choices for users to choose from 1 week to 4 years. The more tokens they lock and the longer the locking period, the higher power they attain.
Enter app: https://app.trava.finance/governance/locker
 
Trava Governance
Trava Governance module aims to bring the protocol to a new level of decentralization ‚Äî Trava DAO. This module presents an on-chain governance mechanism, where the Trava community can propose and vote on protocol changes and improvements to participating in the protocols‚Äô decision-making process.
On May 19th, 2022, we officially launched the Trava Governance, the power now in the hand of the community. To prepare for this important event and to enrich this whole ecosystem, we implement essential features, including:

Security Advisory Board
The Security Advisory Board (SAB) is established as a group of people in charge of protecting Trava Governance against potential insecurity: an attempt to manipulate the market by centralized factors, the effort to attack the protocol, etc.
At first, the SAB consists of 5 members from the Trava team and our advisor. However, the community members are welcome in the future, and Trava Governance will decide who is in this group.
Click here for more information.
 
Trava Governance
Trava Governance module aims to bring the protocol to a new level of decentralization ‚Äî Trava DAO. This module presents an on-chain governance mechanism, where the Trava community can propose and vote on protocol changes and improvements to participating in the protocols‚Äô decision-making process.
On May 19th, 2022, we officially launched the Trava Governance, the power now in the hand of the community. To prepare for this important event and to enrich this whole ecosystem, we implement essential features, including:

The Assembly of 12 Knights for the Trava Governance
12 Knights of the Trava Governance is determined as the Crown, the Wings, the Shield, the Eye, the Spear, the Sword, the Bow, the Cloak, the Helm, the Armor, the Gauntlet, and the Shadow. The Crown of the Twelve is held by King Svitanae, while the Wings had been appointed to Sir Kuana, Commander of TraDAO.
On May 26th, 2022, we introduced the first Heroine member of the Twelve assembly ‚Äî Dame Johanna, Shield of the Twelve. The other 9 Knights will be revealed shortly.
To recruit Johanna to your Knight Army: **CLICK HERE**
 
Data Analytics
In May 2022, two features related to data analytics were published, including Trava NFT Dashboard and the Trava Lending Monitoring module.
 * _Trava NFT Dashboard_ : a feature that helps users examine the statistics of Trava Knight NFT: The total volume, the number of new armoury sales, the Trava market cap, etc.


Enter app: https://nft-app.trava.finance/leaderboard/statistic
 * _Trava Lending monitoring module_ : An effective tool for ensuring clarity in the whole ecosystem and providing users with critical information affecting their investment decision.


Enter app: https://app.trava.finance/scoring/overview-analysis
 
Critical modification
With the TraDAO protocol, because of the implementation of TOD reputation, five new vaults relating to 5 different TOD reputation ranks were opened and replaced the previous single vault.
In addition, given the bear market, TraDAO has decided to stop buying back TOD from the market and use the Treasury in investment. Three main types of investment were considered, and the first one that will be used based on the community votes is investing in the Top Tokens.
Regarding Trava Knight NFT, the Heuristic Farming was opened. With this new mechanism, five current farming vaults will officially stop distributing TRAVA as a reward at 3 P.M UTC on May 15th. Instead, Trava provides five more vaults, and all of your Knights can participate in one or more vaults. Rewards from Heuristic Farming are rTRAVA tokens and EXP.
 
Partnership
Following the partnership announcement on 23th, May 2022, Trava Finance and TechFi have become partners and support each other in the field of technical support, business development, Marketing & communication development, and academic support."", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://blog.trava.finance/monthly-recap-trava-ecosystem-in-may-2022-157ffb2b9959?source=collection_home_page----75e285c42203-----57-----------------------------------"", ""rrf_score"": 0.0625 }, { ""content"": ""TRAVA.FINANCE

In addition to the Security Advisory Board, the Trava Governance is structured with several essential components: - **Trava Community**: The most valuable resource for ideas, discussions, and feedback regarding protocol changes. Community members can voice their opinions and participate actively through forums and social channels. - **DAO Committee**: A group entrusted within the Trava community that reviews and submits proposals after engaging in thorough discussions with the community. - **Governance Portal & Smart Contracts**: This includes the autonomous ‚ÄúHand of the King‚Äù feature that allows for governance contracts facilitating on-chain voting and the automation of changes to Trava Ecosystem's smart contracts. These components together support a decentralized governance model, allowing community involvement in decision-making processes and ensuring security against malicious actions. ### Follow-up Questions: <question>What role does the Trava community play in governance?</question> <question>How can members participate in the DAO Committee?</question> <question>What security measures does the SAB take to protect Trava Governance?</question>",True,,,,"['https://docs.trava.finance/governance', 'https://blog.trava.finance/introduction-to-the-security-advisory-board-for-the-trava-governance-8bcf6799e90f']","['In the big picture, there are four essential components in Trava Governance: the Trava community, the DAO Committee, the Security Advisory Board (SAB), and Governance Portal & smart contracts.      Trava community: The most valuable resource of ideas, discussions & feedback for protocol changes. Everyone can raise their voice & share their opinion on Trava Forum or any community social channels.      DAO Committee: The entrusted individuals in the Trava community to submit proposals after a thorough review with discussion & feedback.      Security Advisory Board: The guardian for the protocol‚Äôs security when some malicious actions are aimed at the protocol or in unexpected events.      Governance Portal & Smart contracts: The autonomous ‚ÄúHand of the King‚Äù consists of governance contracts for on-chain voting and multiple timelocks governing and automating the changes & updates of Trava Ecosystem‚Äôs smart contracts. ,Explain TRADAO and its public offering.,"TRADAO is the decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) that governs the Trava Finance ecosystem. column1: Would you like a visual timeline of TRADAO‚Äôs evolution or a simulation of how much veTRAVA voting power you‚Äôd get by locking TRAVA?",blog,"[

TRADAO is the world‚Äôs first protocol supporting multi-chain deployment in DeFi 2.0, and also Web 3.0 compatible. TraDAO is protocol owned liquidity (POL), accumulating value through such activities of bonding and auto-compound staking which are regulated by Trava Treasury. As a product in Trava ecosystem, the liquidity owned by TRADAO protocol could be deposited in Trava Lending Pool to generate more profit and this profit will be shared among users in the entire Trava ecosystem.

TRADAO Protocol will issue a decentralized reserve currency ‚Äî called TOD. The concept behind TOD token is that it is backed by a basket of assets in Trava Treasury that ensures it does not fall below its base value of $1. The TOD token will be released based on the ‚ÄúMint & Burn‚Äù mechanism, managed by no one other than TRADAO protocol.
Why is TRADAO different compared to other OHM forks?
In comparison to other initiatives in the DeFi 2.0 space, TRADAO Protocol offers a number of unique advantages to users.

Our Bonding allows users to buy TOD at a discounted price compared with exchanges in other assets such as stablecoins, LP tokens, and so on. The number of TOD tokens that the bonder is entitled to will be vested in a certain term.

Bond Installment is a one-of-a-kind feature that allows users to buy more TOD with a little initial amount of assets, then leverage benefits in Staking Strategy, and pay off the debt. Your bond shall be automatically staked after you use Bond Installment.

Wallet Reputation will be integrated with this product in the form of a reference to decide which user will have more benefits (i.e, lower prepaid rate, lower interest fee rate, higher liquidation discount rate,‚Ä¶). For example, holding assets in the Trava Ecosystem can be considered as a condition to gain a high wallet reputation.

Our Staking allows bonders to stake their TOD token in our auto-compounding vault and earn rebase rewards, after receiving TOD tokens from bond sales. The rebase rewards are also from bond sales held in Trava treasury, or profit of the protocol.""

content"": ""We are opening two public offering rounds to give our loyal users as well as our new investors more opportunities to take part in the TraDAO Protocol at the very first stage. In both rounds, participants will buy $TOD tokens in BUSD. The details of two rounds are as the table below:

To get off to a good start, Trava will contribute to TraDAO Protocol with $50,000 worth of 20,000 $TOD tokens. This support is to ensure initial liquidity of $TOD and show the commitment of Trava team in developing TraDAO protocol, thus bringing trust to our community and staying the true ideology of Trava since the beginning, that is a fair launch project and independent of any whale or VCs. The funds from sale will be used to back the $TOD sold and provide initial liquidity after listing.

If we are 100% subscribed, the sale will bring in $345,000. $105,000 will be deposited to the treasury to back initial supply. The remaining $240,000 will be added as liquidity. The LP will open on PancakeSwap with 240,000 BUSD and 20,000 $TOD, in addition to 85,000 $TOD from Public Offering and contribution of Trava Team. This means the starting price of $TOD is $12, and total initial liquidity on Pancakeswap is $480,000 of both tokens. Thus, the total Initial Supply of $TOD will be 105,000 $TOD.
How can I join Public Offering?

We will also open two (02) Rounds of Whitelist, which will then be merged to one Final Whitelist at the end. The two rounds open to welcome new Knights and incentives for Loyal Knights in the TRAVA ecosystem as follows:
Whitelist Round 1 (will be live on Jan 21st) ‚Äî Power up TRADAO ‚Äî To welcome new members into TRAVA Ecosystem
Whitelist Round 2 (will be live on Jan 28th) ‚Äî Cheer up Trava Knights ‚Äî To honor TRAVA loyal users

Participants in the Final Whitelist will have a lucky ticket in buying $TOD Token at the cheapest price before it hits the official launch on PancakeSwap. When you buy, you are removed from the whitelist; if some people buy less than their share, everyone who has not yet bought will get a higher allocation. The details of each Round will be released in our next announcements.

After the public offering rounds, we plan to open two strategies of Bonding and Staking for users to leverage their rewards and earn profit from them. We also have a plan to allow Bond Installment and Wallet Reputation for Bond purchases, which creates a perfect gateway for users with small funds to invest and profit from the protocol.""

**Initial Users Offerings Event ‚Äî** We will open a public sale for any early users to gain huge benefits when first participating in the protocol. If you get whitelisted, you will have a lucky ticket in buying TOD Token at the cheapest price before it hits the official launch on DEX(es). The details about the event will be published very soon.
And other incentive programs along with **_the launch of TRADAO main features in Q1_** that allow users to get high profits. **To Loyal Trava Knights, we will have incentive programs in purchasing bonds and public sale TOD tokens.**"", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://blog.trava.finance/introduction-to-tradao-protocol-a-breakthrough-into-defi-2-0-d549c782422c?source=collection_home_page----75e285c42203-----88-----------------------------------"", ""rrf_score"": 0.0992063492063492 }, { ""content"": ""**Introduction To TraDAO Protocol: A Breakthrough Into DeFi 2.0**

With the heat of our Public Offering Round 2, we are pleased to inform our community of our tentative plan for **Auto-compounding Staking** after listing $TOD.
The listing is expected to take place in the second half of February. After listing, Bond Sales will be enabled for users to bond at a discounted price and Auto-compounding Staking will be officially launched.
Rewards of Staking will be in both $TOD and $TRAVA
APY for $TOD reward will be published when auto-compounding staking officially runs.
**How can auto-compounding staking benefit Trava Ecosystem users and TraDAO Protocol?**
_For TraDAO Protocol:_
 * Users can gain huge earnings in both $TRAVA and $TOD tokens
 * Users will receive preferential treats when is applied for $TOD tokens.


_For Trava.Finance:_
 * Users with a high wallet reputation will be obtaining priority when bonding in the TraDAO Protocol in the future.
 * Trava ecosystem will benefit from assets in the Treasury, which could be added to Trava Lending Pool.


The **Auto-compounding Staking** will be based on Rebase Mechanism. The compounding period of approximately 8 hours explains the high APY, especially in the earlier stage when the total staked amount hasn‚Äôt bloomed. Also, the reward rate will be auto-tuned on smart contracts to ensure the protocol can protect users. You can read more about **Auto-compounding Staking** at:

With the heat of our Public Offering Round 2, we are pleased to inform our community of our tentative plan for **Auto-compounding Staking** after listing $TOD.
The listing is expected to take place in the second half of February. After listing, Bond Sales will be enabled for users to bond at a discounted price and Auto-compounding Staking will be officially launched.
Rewards of Staking will be in both $TOD and $TRAVA
APY for $TOD reward will be published when auto-compounding staking officially runs.
**How can auto-compounding staking benefit Trava Ecosystem users and TraDAO Protocol?**
_For TraDAO Protocol:_
 * Users can gain huge earnings in both $TRAVA and $TOD tokens
 * Users will receive preferential treats when is applied for $TOD tokens.


_For Trava.Finance:_
 * Users with a high wallet reputation will be obtaining priority when bonding in the TraDAO Protocol in the future.
 * Trava ecosystem will benefit from assets in the Treasury, which could be added to Trava Lending Pool.


The **Auto-compounding Staking** will be based on Rebase Mechanism. The compounding period of approximately 8 hours explains the high APY, especially in the earlier stage when the total staked amount hasn‚Äôt bloomed. Also, the reward rate will be auto-tuned on smart contracts to ensure the protocol can protect users. You can read more about **Auto-compounding Staking** at:

Published in
3 min readJan 22, 2022
Share
 _TraDAO Protocol is proud to be the pioneer in developing a unique mechanism for Reputation Tracking._
Wallet Reputation is one out of four salient features of TraDAO Protocol. It encourages users to build their own reputation and get special offerings and more benefits.
_Wallet Reputation will be officially launched at_** _3.00 P.M UTC January 24th_** a _nd will be used to select participants in Whitelist round 2 for Public Offering._
 
What is Wallet Reputation?
Wallet reputation to a set of token T (i.e., wallet T-reputation) is a parameter to evaluate the loyalty of holders to the tokens in the set, showing the trust and reputation of the holder in the community. A holder who owns a large number of tokens over a long period will have a high reputation.
In TraDAO Protocol, TRAVA, rTRAVA, farming TRAVA and farming rTRAVA are the tokens used to determine Wallet Reputation. TRAVA and rTRAVA are tokens kept in wallets of holders while farming TRAVA and farming rTRAVA are held in our vaults or that users deposit TRAVA and rTRAVA respectively. In the future, we will also add TOD token to evaluate the wallet reputation.
 
Benefits of high Wallet Reputation?
**_Lucky Tickets in Whitelist for TraDAO Public Offerings_** : Wallet reputation shall be used in selecting participants in one of two Whitelist rounds for Public Offering of TOD tokens. Users with a higher reputation will have a better chance of being whitelisted and getting the best deal on TOD.
**_Incentive Discounts in Bond Purchases/Exchanges:_** The typical benefit for reputable wallets is the discount on bond programs. Moreover, wallet reputation could also be integrated with our Bond Installment to offer high-reputation wallets more benefits such as lower prepaid rate, lower interest fee rate, higher liquidation discount rate, etc.
**_Other incentives in TRAVA Ecosystem such as TRAVA NFT Marketplace:_** Wallet Reputation also has a lot of room to expand and connect data from Trava Knight NFT and bring NFT owners a great profit.
 
How does it work?
In the initial version, the reputation tracking system is implemented based on the rules on time and balance. Generally, the larger the number of tokens a user holds or stakes for a certain period, the higher reputation rank the user will hold. There are five reputation ranks, from 1 to 5, where the fifth rank is the best one. Assume N is the minimum number of TRAVA, rTRAVA, farming TRAVA, and farming rTRAVA a wallet holds during the period of time from t1 to t2. Each rank Ri is associated with a threshold Ni. The reputation rank of the wallet is decided as shown in the following table:
**_For example_** , for N1= 150,000; N2 = 300,000; N3 = 500,000; N4 = 1,000,000; N5 = 10,000,000, a user holding 2,000,000 TRAVA for the period of 15 days would be at rank 4 and another one who holds 750,000 TRAVA in this period of time will be at rank 3.
 
Notes:
 * Since wallet reputation is determined over a period of time, the more TRAVA, rTRAVA, farming TRAVA and farming rTRAVA you hold as long as possible, the higher reputation rank your wallet will be, the more benefit you will get.
 * The tracking system, the threshold values, and the rules can be modified according to each bond program. Those are determined through the DAO."", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://blog.trava.finance/introduction-to-wallet-reputation-pioneering-feature-in-reputation-tracking-474281641a02?source=collection_home_page----75e285c42203-----84-----------------------------------"", ""rrf_score"": 0.07142857142857142 }, { ""content"": ""**Key notes**
 * Eligible whitelisted wallet addresses will be announced on 25th Jan
 * The Public offering round 1 will take place from Feb 4th, and Public offering round 2 is on Feb 9th
 * The Public offering currency is BUSD
 * The price of TOD token in two Public offerings and other details can be found 
 * The details for round 2 of the Whitelist will be announced on Jan 26th"", ""image_ids"": [], ""filename"": null, ""url"": ""https://blog.trava.finance/introducing-tradao-whitelist-round-1-c32fe90e78bf?source=collection_home_page----75e285c42203-----86-----------------------------------"", ""rrf_score"": 0.0625 } ] }",False,False,False,False,FALSE,False,,,,"['https://blog.trava.finance/introduction-to-tradao-protocol-a-breakthrough-into-defi-2-0-d549c782422c', 'https://blog.trava.finance/tradao-public-offering-announcement-eda810f6cb2']","['What is TRADAO?  TRADAO is the world‚Äôs first protocol supporting multi-chain deployment in DeFi 2.0, and also Web 3.0 compatible. TraDAO is protocol owned liquidity (POL), accumulating value through such activities of bonding and auto-compound staking which are regulated by Trava Treasury. As a product in Trava ecosystem, the liquidity owned by TRADAO protocol could be deposited in Trava Lending Pool to generate more profit and this profit will be shared among users in the entire Trava ecosystem.  TRADAO Protocol will issue a decentralized reserve currency ‚Äî called TOD. The concept behind TOD token is that it is backed by a basket of assets in Trava Treasury that ensures it does not fall below its base value of $1. The TOD token will be released based on the ‚ÄúMint & Burn‚Äù mechanism, managed by no one other than TRADAO protocol. Why is TRADAO different compared to other OHM forks?  In comparison to other initiatives in the DeFi 2.0 space, TRADAO Protocol offers a number of unique advantages to users. How does it work?  Our Bonding allows users to buy TOD at a discounted price compared with exchanges in other assets such as stablecoins, LP tokens, and so on. The number of TOD tokens that the bonder is entitled to will be vested in a certain term.  Bond Installment is a one-of-a-kind feature that allows users to buy more TOD with a little initial amount of assets, then leverage benefits in Staking Strategy, and pay off the debt. Your bond shall be automatically staked after you use Bond Installment.  Wallet Reputation will be integrated with this product in the form of a reference to decide which user will have more benefits (i.e, lower prepaid rate, lower interest fee rate, higher liquidation discount rate,‚Ä¶). For example, holding assets in the Trava Ecosystem can be considered as a condition to gain a high wallet reputation.  Our Staking allows bonders to stake their TOD token in our auto-compounding vault and earn rebase rewards, after receiving TOD tokens from bond sales. The rebase rewards are also from bond sales held in Trava treasury, or profit of the protocol.', 'We are opening two public offering rounds to give our loyal users as well as our new investors more opportunities to take part in the TraDAO Protocol at the very first stage. In both rounds, participants will buy $TOD tokens in BUSD. The details of two rounds are as the table below:  To get off to a good start, Trava will contribute to TraDAO Protocol with $50,000 worth of 20,000 $TOD tokens. This support is to ensure initial liquidity of $TOD and show the commitment of Trava team in developing TraDAO protocol, thus bringing trust to our community and staying the true ideology of Trava since the beginning, that is a fair launch project and independent of any whale or VCs. The funds from sale will be used to back the $TOD sold and provide initial liquidity after listing.  If we are 100% subscribed, the sale will bring in $345,000. $105,000 will be deposited to the treasury to back initial supply. The remaining $240,000 will be added as liquidity. The LP will open on PancakeSwap with 240,000 BUSD and 20,000 $TOD, in addition to 85,000 $TOD from Public Offering and contribution of Trava Team. This means the starting price of $TOD is $12, and total initial liquidity on Pancakeswap is $480,000 of both tokens. Thus, the total Initial Supply of $TOD will be 105,000 $TOD. How can I join Public Offering?  We will also open two (02) Rounds of Whitelist, which will then be merged to one Final Whitelist at the end. The two rounds open to welcome new Knights and incentives for Loyal Knights in the TRAVA ecosystem as follows:      Whitelist Round 1 (will be live on Jan 21st) ‚Äî Power up TRADAO ‚Äî To welcome new members into TRAVA Ecosystem     Whitelist Round 2 (will be live on Jan 28th) ‚Äî Cheer up Trava Knights ‚Äî To honor TRAVA loyal users  Participants in the Final Whitelist will have a lucky ticket in buying $TOD Token at the cheapest price before it hits the official launch on PancakeSwap. When you buy, you are removed from the whitelist; if some people buy less than their share, everyone who has not yet bought will get a higher allocation. The details of each Round will be released in our next announcements.  After the public offering rounds, we plan to open two strategies of Bonding and Staking for users to leverage their rewards and earn profit from them. We also have a plan to allow Bond Installment and Wallet Reputation for Bond purchases, which creates a perfect gateway for users with small funds to invest and profit from the protocol.']",0.8539471626281738,0.8596494793891907,True,True
